story:
Project Luna is a 3D, first person, story-driven, puzzle-adventure game with a post-apocalyptic setting. It’s been in development for over 1 year using Unreal Engine 4, and it’s primarily intended for the PC platform.
In the game you’ll search for clues, solve puzzles, and survive the dangers of this new world – all while untangling the mystery of the city, the world – and yourself.



- 6-10 hours of gameplay
- Challenging puzzles
- Non-linear puzzle and game structure
- Semi-open world to explore
- Parkour elements
- Fully story-driven with at least 2 different endings

Waking up in a Cryo Chamber right after falling asleep in her bed, Nina finds herself without some of her memories,inside an abandoned laboratory. Dazzled and confused, she’ll need to find a way out… both of this eerie place, and out of her predicament.

Explore the overgrown city of New Atlantis in all of its former glory, and discover the cause behind its current state.



Unlock doors, engage terminals, disable security systems, read emails, evade the many dangers in your way, and bring new life to the city as you make your way through the ruins.

The environment might be unsettling, but there are no monsters. Only you, and the world around you. Can you escape? What are you even escaping from?

You might just leave the final mark of humankind upon this world.


You can download and play the demo right here:

                          
 

Epilepsy warning: There are a few instances of lights suddenly flashing on and off - player discretion is advised.

I did my best to fix all bugs, and the build has been tested by a number of people. Still, software gremlins happen, so if you notice something weird, or manage to break the game - please let me know! All feedback is more than welcome!

There is no installer - simply unpack the archive to your desired location once you download it, and run the "LunaPROTnew.exe" file.

This demo is provided as-is, and is the current representation of the game. Things will change (for the better) in the future. Consider all current assets to be work in progress.



 


Hello, my name is Boris Kozma, and I’m super exited to showcase my project with you!

I’ve worked as a professional in the game industry (both virtual and in real life escape games) for 10 years now.  Making games, either virtual or in real life, is both my hobby and my passion.

Playing games like “Half Life 2”, “NieR:Automata”, “Metro 2033”, “STALKER”, and watching the anime “Girl’s Last Tour”, made me really appreciate the world building and lore of those worlds. I wanted to make a game where the focus is the world itself. So, instead of using your brawn, the main focus will be untangling the mysteries of New Atlantis, and the world itself.

This game project started right after I had to give up on a sidescroller I was working on with 2 of my friends. They didn’t have the time to continue working on it, and I didn’t have all the skills needed to carry it on my own. I decided to change that, and took a year and a half off work, in order to learn everything that I waslacking.

This project is the result of that labor, and I’d love to see it grow into a full-fledgedgame.

Currently, the game is fully playable and feature complete – but don’t just take my word for it, download the demo and try it!

The project is set up in a modular way that enables me to create new content very quickly.

The biggest obstacle are the assets – 3D assets in particular take the longest to make (especially since there is only one of me, and hundreds of them!)

I did end up using some marketplace and free assets to speed up the game creation process, but everything has been modified and customized in some way. From geometry, textures, models, code, etc. Nothing was simply dropped in.

Everything else is being completely developed and made by myself: including code, 2D, 3D, and sound files.The music is also completely original. I composed, played, and recorded it myself!



FEATURES YOU’LL HELP ME IMPLEMENT:

- New player and NPC models. The game right now uses MakeHuman assets. I would like to change them into more stylized, anime-like character models. Think of Final Fantasy or NieR:Automata.
- Visible character body in first person, particularly hand animations.
- Improved animations for player climbing.
- Improved and more varied props and environments.
- Smoothening out the movement transitions.
- Animal and predator implementation and AI.
- Optional light survival features.
- Weather effects.

Please note that this is more or less my future wishlist!

The final features to be implemented will depend on the amount of funds the campaign gets:



A lot of people underestimate how much time it takes to develop a game. Even with the proper skillset, you are still looking at a minimum of a few years for something decent. And that’s not even taking starting costs into account (equipment, rent, expenses, etc).

As I mentioned before, this project has been in development for a year now, and I made a chunk of the assets used here (albeit partially) in the year before that. Another thing people underestimate is the money needed for a project like this.
Why a minimum of 45K USD? Well, the game still needs about ~20 months of development time, and that is only if I work on the game full-time and get hired help.

The chart looks something like this:

This is why I need IndieGoGo and you for this. I wish to deliver the best experience that I can, within the limits presented, and make something truly memorable. For that, I will need all the help that I can get!



The detailed description of the perks go as follows:

NOTE: To claim your custom Discord handle and Backer chat access, mail me your proof of purchase, and Discord Username! You can reach me via AlbedoDev@gmail.com - or you can join my Discord server and message me there!

$5
Omega Tier
- Thank you for your support! Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Omega [Ω]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server

$15
Sigma Tier (Limited)
- Digital copy of the game
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Sigma [Σ]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server
- Blue discord handle
- Limited to 300 people

$25
Pi Tier
- Digital copy of the game
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Pi [π]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server
- Blue discord handle

$40
Lambda Tier
- Digital copy of the game
- Digital Walkthrough
- Digital Soundtrack
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Lambda [λ]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server
- Green discord handle

$70
Theta Tier
- 2x Digital copy of the game
- Digital Walkthrough
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital “making of” art book
- Exclusive physical poster
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Theta [Θ]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server
- Gold discord handle

$100
Delta Tier
- 2x Digital copy of the game
- Digital Walkthrough
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital “making of” art book
- Exclusive physical poster
- Exclusive Project Luna t-shirt
- An in-game reference to your name
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Delta [Δ]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server
- Purple discord handle

$150
Alpha Tier
- 4x Digital copy of the game
- Digital Walkthrough
- Digital Soundtrack
- Physical “making of” art book
- Exclusive Project Luna goodies set: t-shirt, physical poster, “making of” art book & sticker
- An in-game reference to your name
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “Alpha [α]” category
- Access to the special backer section on the Project Luna discord server
- Red discord handle

$200
Apollo Tier
- Everything from the Alpha Tier
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “V.I.P.” category.
- A datapad with a message from you will be added to the game in a random location (flavor text).
- A one on one discord voice chat with myself - AMA!


$500
Hades Tier (Limited)
- Everything from the Alpha Tier
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “V.I.P.” category.
- A datapad with a message from you will be added to the game in a random location (flavor text).
- Become part of the game! You can record a voice line for the player to hear in-game.
- A room in the game world will be created by your specification – it can be a resemblance to your house, or living room, along with some custom props!
- A one on one discord voice chat with myself - AMA!
- Limited to 5 people

$500
Ares Tier
- Everything from the Alpha Tier
- Your name will appear in the game credits under the “V.I.P.” category.
- A datapad with a message from you will be added to the game in a random location (flavor text).
- Become part of the game! You can record a voice line for the player to hear in-game.
- A one on one discord voice chat with myself - AMA!

$1000
Zeus Tier (Early Bird)
- Everything from the Alpha and Hades Tiers
- A statue depicting your likeness will be added to the game world, with a special commemorative plaque containing flavor text.
- Limited to 5 people

By supporting me with some of the more pricey perks, you can receive the following physical rewards!

Please note that if you buy a perk with any physical goodies to take into account your local customs charges.

All physical goods will be shipped around the same time as the game release!

You can find me on the following platforms:


 

This is my first ever crowdfunded project, and to be honest, it feels pretty scary, but also exciting. I am finally here.

While I did develop games before this, I never carried a project completely alone. I needed to know how far I can go, and how long would it take. I know that these days it’s hard to put money forward, especially since a lot of projects just end up fizzing out or under-delivering – this is the exact reason why I wanted to have a complete demo ready before I started a funding drive for this project.

If everything goes as planned and I receive the minimum required funding, I will aim to release this game within the next ~20 months. I have figured out a pretty quick and effective method to block out my levels, and with some hired help making 3D and sound assets – things that take me the longest to do – it should go pretty smoothly.

I will post constant updates and teasers on the whole process, and do Q&A’s with the community as much as I humanly can – I would like to avoid story spoilers as much as possible, but gameplay features should be a-ok.

In case of any delays or hiccups I promise to be fully transparent about them, and keep everyone informed as to the state of the project.

One way or another, it will be done – and you will know about every step of the way.

Thank you for your time!

story:
Take a look at these two cute girls from Atlanta, USA. They sent us this picture while receiving their "hunter pro pack perk" and after successful Shift game :)

KEEP WITH YOUR SUPPORT - THANKS!

So,,,, here is the first update for you guys :-)

We launched Shift  - and got great feedback from our users. The expression of the great feedback shown here on Indiegogo - We have reached 33% OF OUR GOAL in less than a week - thanks to YOU! 

PLEASE - KEEP ON WITH YOUR SUPPORT AND SHARE SHIFT WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW.

Here are the highlights for this week:

Article about Shift and Augmented Games was published in GeekTime, Israel's high-tech magazine: http://www.geektime.co.il/augmented-games/

Shachar is going to release new Shift version including some updates and cool features.

Dror has finished design of the new leader board, scores & achievements mechanism and passed Shachar for execution

Amir still has a head! and he takes a good care for Shift's PR

And last but not least - a new Shift hunting video with STEWIE GRIFFIN! Watch and enjoy :)

 

****************************************************************************


We don't think there is anyone who didn't like to play catch as a child. The excitement, the thrill and the adrenaline that came from chasing or running away from someone is deeply engraved into the memory of every one of us, and it doesn't matter if you were good at it or not so much.

During the past year, we thought a lot about how the times had changed and many of us became "couch potatoes" - playing Angry Birds and other such games that are basically just clicking the mobile device screen again and again. Mobile devices do empower our lives, but what about living?

Wouldn't it be really cool to play catch again, but better, using your mobile device for a much more exciting experience!

Well, its not a dream anymore!

We've created it

It's call SHIFT and it F**KING ROCKS

Press here to download Shift beta from Google Play

For any question please contact us via - indiegogo@aug-games.com



We have a clear target for this campaign - Asking you to assists us in finalizing and launching Shift worldwide - the most exciting location based mobile game ever. We founded Augmented Games with a vision - To be the #1 mobile gaming company that builds these new types of games.

What can I be? 

In Shift you can play as a hunter or an escapee. The hunter's goal is to capture the escapee, in the real world, and the escapee's goal is to avoid being captured by the hunter. 
Who can my opponent be?
Shift  automatically match's you with available players that are  around you and allows you start playing. You can always create your own private\customized game and invite your friends to play (Facebook or whatever). 

And how do I play?

As simple as that - the hunter's mission is to physically arrive within a reasonable distance (approximately 30yd) of the escapee while staying in the game zone and time frame, while the escapee needs to get away from the hunter (again while staying in the game zone) 


Its not that easy...

Your exact location is never completely presented to your opponent. You need to engage the opponent, meaning to get physically closer, in order to figure out his exact location. On the other end, your opponent can act as well... he can confuse you about his location by moving faster with a skateboard, bicycle, electrical bikes, a car, a boat, a rocketeer, a balloon, an airplane.. (yeah OK, I got too much excited here..)


What else?

Shift has a secret back-end intelligent agency that assist's you by providing real-time information about the opponent and his actions, like his approximate location, actions that he does, his status and more... This will help you to know how to act in the game itself. 
During the game you can also chat and send pictures to your opponent. 




Shift  was created with major assistance of "Shifts' Community" in our area - and we desire to expand this community as much as we can. 

By joining our community you help to expand it and will assist us in creating the best game ever - this will be our personal fulfillment.

We promise the community that Shift is going to be FREE FOR EVERYONE. We will also publish what we call "Shift's Journey Diary" - around once a week. The diary will include updates about our work and most importantly polls with you guys about major features, designs and capabilities that we wish to include in the game. 

Creating complex games like Shift is a serious mission that needs professional care from developers, graphic designers and more... You can be sure that 100% of the funds we raise will be fully dedicated to Shift. 

So - Whats next? We really hope that you are able to help us by FUNDING, but there are also other ways that will help. SHARING the campaign with everyone, FOLLOWING us here on Indiegogo & other social networks (see the bottom of this page) and of course DOWNLOADING THE GAME FROM GOOGLE PLAY, GETTING UP, PLAYING WITH PEOPLE AROUND YOU AND LETTING US KNOW HOW WE CAN MAKE IT BETTER.



Working in software for a long long (long) time. Began working with Android in 2008 (yes, when the first device was a big phone shaped like banana! or not...) and even started and owned a mobile development company with many geeky developers who develop hundreds of cool games & apps.

Shachar met Dror when they worked together in that mobile development shop. Dror was seeking for geeky developers and Shachar was by no doubt the geekiest. Although geeky, he runs really really fast! and has never lost a single game of Shift to Dror. 

                                                                Has a head. :-)


We founded Augmented Games in early 2014, and currently, all three of us are investing all our time and are fully dedicated to the start-up. We are "Bootstrapped" (meaning we are self funded and have no other incomes), working from Shachar's Garage and our resources are going end soon :(

We like Shachar's garage very much, and spend many hours there. Sometimes we need to get up and go test our cool new features out on the streets, where we run like crazy and never (ever!) capture Shachar. 

Just imagine Shift with awesome features like playing in groups, using power-ups or even playing against your friends for real money! 

Shift's beta version is now ready! 

You can download and play it NOW (US, Canada, UK and Israel)! Its AWESOME! 

Press here to download Shift beta from Google Play

The first funding round (30,000$) will help us to:

  • Launch Shift Worldwide (currently available only in US,Canada, UK and Israel)
  • Polish the game
  • Extend Shift's community
And add cool new features like:

  • Leader-boards - local and worldwide
  • Scoring systems
  • Achievements 
  • badges and trophies 

If we are successful with the fundraising, we will do our best to release the new Shift version during August 2015.

****IMPORTANT - All perks INCLUDE shipping cost via standard mail :-)****

The Poster

Shift's rare poster!! (size: 11" x 17" (A3) ) hand-singed by Augmented Games founders. Hang it on your office wall and tell everybody that you are a part of this AWESOME community.


The T-shirts

Special edition Hunter\Escapee T-shirts designed by our game designer. The man has a crush on turkeys (we couldn't figure out why) and the only place we allowed him to fulfill his weird turkey-design fetish is on our T-shirts.
Don't forget to let us know what color T-shirt you want and its size (Black\White\Green\Blue\Pink)   -    (S\M\L\XL\XXL\XXXL)

ITS STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO CHOOSE THE DOUBLE-BUNDLE-PRO-PACK INCLUDING BOTH HUNTER & ESCAPEE T-SHIRTS




The Shoes

A limited edition of Shift "ADIDAS mi" running shoes in a special design. Choose your own model:

HUNTER's "ADIDAS mi Kanadia TR 7" - Men\women style

ESCAPEE's "ADIDAS mi Duramo 6" - Men\women style

The shoes are specially designed by our game designer and will help you to hunt and escape during your game. Its like a real-life 'power-up'.

Remember to let us know the shoe model (see below) and the size (5.0-15.0 US)

WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO CHOOSE THE DOUBLE-BUNDLE-ULTIMATE-PACK INCLUDING HUNTER's & ESCAPEE's SHOES OF YOU CHOICE





The Meet & Greet (& Hunt) 

Shachar, our CTO, has never lost a games of Shift!  He runs very very fast.
Maybe its because he ran away from bullies as a geeky kid,
we are not completely sure. But whatever the reason is, it payed off! 

He will arrive at your area and let you try to hunt him down simultaneously with your friends. He will record the chase on his go-pro and upload a clip of it to YouTube.

HIS EGO IS SKY HIGH, SO ITS SUPER IMPORTANT FOR US THAT YOU BEAT HIM. A good dinner and a beer will be set too. Shachar will grant you in personally T-Shirts, Shoes and more cool perks.

 * Arriving only to US\EU countries



$60,000 - FEATURE CONTEST 

We strive to add two enormous features to Shift! 

  • Money based games - Hunt or escape for real money. Improve you skills and win $$$$.
  • Group games - Various types of multi-player games. Create groups of hunters and escapees. Play  together with many friends.
If a $60,000 will be raised, we will able to release only one of the features above. We love both of this two features, and can't decide what to release first. So - we will have a vote and YOU will decide what we develop first.
We will also makes an effort to add Power ups in this stage, allowing competitive edge (e.g. disappearing from map)
$90,000 - 2nd FEATURE 
As simple as that - We will develop and release the #2 feature from the previous vote

$120,000- iPhone VERSION

 A Shift iPhone version will be release until Easter 2016


Q: I really really want to share the campaign link with everyone. can I?

A: SURE! Share the campaign with everyone you know! We also have a Twitter page, a Facebook page, a LinkedIn page and a YouTube channel (see bottom of this page)  - find us there too.

Q: My perks disappear from the campaign page? why, god, why?

A: We are here for you, no worries... We are refreshing the perks once in a while. If you contributed us and secured a perk - you will receive it.

Q: Do i need to pay for playing Shift ?

A: NO! Shift applies to everybody that love gaming and has no purchasing cost, in addition its created with major assistance from the community and funded by YOU, indiegogo contributors - so its our honor to provide the game for free.

Q: There are shipping costs for delivering perks?

A: No. We will care of all shipping costs for you via standard mail.

Q: Are there any special rules while playing?

A: The Rules are very simple

  • Each player decides if he wants to be a hunter or an escapee.
  • You decide who you want to play against, a friend or someone else.
  • You choose when you play and for how long.
  • You decide the zone(area) that you play in. Beware! leaving this area is against the rules.
story_txt:
Take a look at these two cute girls from Atlanta, USA. They sent us this picture while receiving their "hunter pro pack perk" and after successful Shift game :)

KEEP WITH YOUR SUPPORT - THANKS!
So,,,, here is the first update for you guys :-)
We launched Shift  - and got great feedback from our users. The expression of the great feedback shown here on Indiegogo - We have reached 33% OF OUR GOAL in less than a week - thanks to YOU! 
PLEASE - KEEP ON WITH YOUR SUPPORT AND SHARE SHIFT WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW.
Here are the highlights for this week:
Article about Shift and Augmented Games was published in GeekTime, Israel's high-tech magazine: http://www.geektime.co.il/augmented-games/
Shachar is going to release new Shift version including some updates and cool features.
Dror has finished design of the new leader board, scores & achievements mechanism and passed Shachar for execution
Amir still has a head! and he takes a good care for Shift's PR
And last but not least - a new Shift hunting video with STEWIE GRIFFIN! Watch and enjoy :)
 ****************************************************************************


We don't think there is anyone who didn't like to play catch as a child. The excitement, the thrill and the adrenaline that came from chasing or running away from someone is deeply engraved into the memory of
every one of us, and it doesn't matter if you were good at it or not so much.

During the past year, we thought a lot about how the times had changed and many of
us became "couch potatoes" - playing Angry Birds and other such games that are
basically just clicking the mobile device screen again and again. Mobile devices do empower our lives, but what about living?
Wouldn't it be really cool to play catch again, but better, using your mobile device for a much more exciting experience!
Well, its not a dream anymore!
We've created it
It's call SHIFT and it F**KING ROCKS


Press here to download Shift beta from Google Play



For any question please contact us via - indiegogo@aug-games.com





We have a clear target for this campaign - Asking you to assists us in finalizing and launching Shift worldwide - the most exciting location based mobile game ever. We founded Augmented Games with a vision - To be the #1 mobile gaming company that builds these new types of games.

What can I be? In Shift you can play as a hunter or an escapee. The hunter's goal is to capture the escapee, in the real world, and the escapee's goal is to avoid being captured by the hunter. Who can my opponent be?
Shift  automatically match's you with available players that are  around you and allows you start playing. You can always create your own private\customized game and invite your friends to play (Facebook or whatever). 




And how do I play?

As simple as that - the hunter's mission is to physically arrive within a reasonable distance (approximately 30yd) of the escapee while staying in the game zone and time frame, while the escapee needs to get away from the hunter (again while staying in the game zone) 



Its not that easy...

Your exact location is never completely presented to your opponent. You need to engage the opponent, meaning to get physically closer, in order to figure out his exact location. On the other end, your opponent can act as well... he can confuse you about his location by moving faster with a skateboard, bicycle, electrical bikes, a car, a boat, a rocketeer, a balloon, an airplane.. (yeah OK, I got too much excited here..)

What else?
Shift has a secret back-end intelligent agency that assist's you by providing real-time information about the opponent and his actions, like his approximate location, actions that he does, his status and more... This will help you to know how to act in the game itself. During the game you can also chat and send pictures to your opponent. 








Shift  was created with major assistance of "Shifts' Community" in our area - and we desire to expand this community as much as we can. 
By joining our community you help to expand it and will assist us in creating the best game ever - this will be our personal fulfillment.
We promise the community that Shift is going to be FREE FOR EVERYONE. We will also publish what we call "Shift's Journey Diary" - around once a week. The diary will include updates about our work and most importantly polls with you guys about major features, designs and capabilities that we wish to include in the game. 

Creating complex games like Shift is a serious mission that needs professional care from developers, graphic designers and more... You can be sure that 100% of the funds we raise will be fully dedicated to Shift. 





So - Whats next? We really hope that you are able to help us by FUNDING, but there are also other ways that will help. SHARING the campaign with everyone, FOLLOWING us here on Indiegogo & other social networks (see the bottom of this page) and of course DOWNLOADING THE GAME FROM GOOGLE PLAY, GETTING UP, PLAYING WITH PEOPLE AROUND YOU AND LETTING US KNOW HOW WE CAN MAKE IT BETTER.











Working in software for a long long (long) time. Began working with Android in 2008 (yes, when the first device was a big phone shaped like banana! or not...) and even started and owned a mobile development company with many geeky developers who develop hundreds of cool games & apps.


Shachar met Dror when they worked together in that mobile development shop. Dror was seeking for geeky developers and Shachar was by no doubt the geekiest. Although geeky, he runs really really fast! and has never lost a single game of Shift to Dror. 
                                                                Has a head. :-)


We founded Augmented Games in early 2014, and currently, all three of us are investing all our time and are fully dedicated to the start-up. We are "Bootstrapped" (meaning we are self funded and have no other incomes), working from Shachar's Garage and our resources are going end soon :(



We like Shachar's garage very much, and spend many hours there. Sometimes we need to get up and go test our cool new features out
on the streets, where we run like crazy and never (ever!) capture Shachar. 



Just
imagine Shift with awesome features like playing in groups, using power-ups or even
playing against your friends for real money! 



Shift's beta version is now ready! 
You can download and play it NOW (US, Canada, UK and Israel)! Its AWESOME! 
Press here to download Shift beta from Google Play

The first funding round (30,000$) will help us to:


Launch Shift Worldwide (currently available only in US,Canada, UK and Israel)
Polish the game
Extend Shift's community
And add cool new features like:

Leader-boards - local and worldwide
Scoring systems
Achievements 

badges and trophies 


If we are successful with the fundraising, we will do our best to release the new Shift version during August 2015.




****IMPORTANT - All perks INCLUDE shipping cost via standard mail :-)****
The PosterShift's rare poster!! (size: 11" x 17" (A3) ) hand-singed by Augmented Games founders. Hang it on your office wall and tell everybody that you are a part of this AWESOME community.



The T-shirts

Special edition Hunter\Escapee T-shirts designed by our game designer. The man has a crush on turkeys (we couldn't figure out why) and the only place we allowed him to fulfill his weird turkey-design fetish is on our T-shirts.Don't forget to let us know what color T-shirt you want and its size (Black\White\Green\Blue\Pink)   -    (S\M\L\XL\XXL\XXXL)
ITS STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO CHOOSE THE DOUBLE-BUNDLE-PRO-PACK INCLUDING BOTH HUNTER & ESCAPEE T-SHIRTS






The Shoes




A limited edition of Shift "ADIDAS mi" running shoes in a special design. Choose your own model:
HUNTER's "ADIDAS mi Kanadia TR 7" - Men\women style
ESCAPEE's "ADIDAS mi Duramo 6" - Men\women style
The shoes are specially designed by our game designer and will help you to hunt and escape during your game. Its like a real-life 'power-up'.

Remember to let us know the shoe model (see below) and the size (5.0-15.0 US)


WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO CHOOSE THE DOUBLE-BUNDLE-ULTIMATE-PACK INCLUDING HUNTER's & ESCAPEE's SHOES OF YOU CHOICE













The Meet & Greet (& Hunt) 

Shachar, our CTO, has never lost a games of Shift!  He runs very very fast.Maybe its because he ran away from bullies as a geeky kid, we are not completely sure. But whatever the reason is, it payed off! 
He will arrive at your area and let you try to hunt him down simultaneously with your friends. He will record the chase on his go-pro and upload a clip of it to YouTube.
HIS EGO IS SKY HIGH, SO ITS SUPER IMPORTANT FOR US THAT YOU BEAT HIM. A good dinner and a beer will be set too. Shachar will grant you in personally T-Shirts, Shoes and more cool perks.
 * Arriving only to US\EU countries






$60,000 - FEATURE CONTEST 
We strive to add two enormous features to Shift! 

Money based games - Hunt or escape for real money. Improve you skills and win $$$$.

Group games - Various types of multi-player games. Create groups of hunters and escapees. Play  together with many friends.If a $60,000 will be raised, we will able to release only one of the features above. We love both of this two features, and can't decide what to release first. So - we will have a vote and YOU will decide what we develop first.
We will also makes an effort to add Power ups in this stage, allowing competitive edge (e.g. disappearing from map)

$90,000 - 2nd FEATURE 
As simple as that - We will develop and release the #2 feature from the previous vote

$120,000- iPhone VERSION A Shift iPhone version will be release until Easter 2016

Q: I really really want to share the campaign link with everyone. can I?A: SURE! Share the campaign with everyone you know! We also have a Twitter page, a Facebook page, a LinkedIn page and a YouTube channel (see bottom of this page)  - find us there too.Q: My perks disappear from the campaign page? why, god, why?A: We are here for you, no worries... We are refreshing the perks once in a while. If you contributed us and secured a perk - you will receive it.Q: Do i need to pay for playing Shift ?A: NO! Shift applies to everybody that love gaming and has no purchasing cost, in addition its created with major assistance from the community and funded by YOU, indiegogo contributors - so its our honor to provide the game for free.Q: There are shipping costs for delivering perks?A: No. We will care of all shipping costs for you via standard mail.Q: Are there any special rules while playing?

A: The Rules are very simple

Each player decides if he wants to be a hunter or an escapee.

You decide who you want to play against, a friend or someone else.
You choose when you play and for how long.
You decide the zone(area) that you play in. Beware! leaving this area is against the rules.

story:
• Download APK File from your mobile and install the game https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EM1rmzX4ujfWLuTUztSlGM_4PsGvgEJv/view?usp=sharing. OR https://univerzamb-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/g/personal/omar_ahmed_student_um_si/EWQXEtgUaeFMsqKMEMOpV9cBm2VFjEm95NDvQp2_rnNUkw?e=sK80SR
  • you will find a native unreal engine icon game installed with name "Unreal Forces" installed on your device .
  • Start the game.

Note:

  • There is a bug where the mic only works for first time when you start the game, if you closed the game and want to restart it, make sure you disable the mic permission manually first .
  • This demo is on very hard level, so make sure you do some real noise :D
  • This is demo version, you should expect it may be not be stable on your device .

The game mainly designed to reduce inner stress by encourage people to scream without limit, later on the idea evolved ,I found its awesome to be played outside using the surrounding noise in different scenario .

Just start the game and play it normally like any other shooter game , however, once you feel like you want more power, just do any of the following :

  • Scream loud say NOOOOOOOO or just say no gently, any noise which is detected by your microphone will has an effect
  • You can play it while you play your favorite music next to you.
  • Play it outside while you waiting for your school bus.
  • Long flights, car rides and train travels.
  • Boring lectures and parties .
  • While having lunch at noise restaurant and you waiting for your order.
  • There is infinite way after all.

Since the market is quite saturated with bullet shooter games, I added the noise detection feature to make it the only one on the market . this encourage folks to play it more frequently outside whenever they want to waste their time for any reason instead of picking those boring puzzle games. or when being stressed like me.

The scale of the projectiles and their colors represent how strong is the noise around you following thermal color range rule. Red is normal, violet is maximum that main weapon can reach. I did it this way for certain reason, From UX prospective, I dont want to have many UI element during gameplay .

But wait, this only 40% of the total noise that your mic can receive , the other 60% including lighting Strikes and energy field between your bullets and more awesome effects and power up will be added . feel free to comment with suggestion, bec I want to make this game a community driven too .

I've Huawei G8 which is 3 years old device, and the game run smoothly on 30 fps while Mobile HDR and Post processing are enabled .  and this is the only device I have . also I tested on Samsung Galaxy C9 and the game run 60fps . the game uses Unreal Engine Technology.

While I care about visual look of my game, I will keep the graphic setting customized so it become playable on most devices.  thats why I need more devices to test the game.

CG Shot for the boss of the first level

Level 1 boss - In Engine

Main Ship "just a sample, not final one"

Enemy Ship - In Engine

Enemy ship another variation - In Engine

Turret CG Shot

Low Poly Turret in game engine - In Engine

THIS IS THE LEVEL ONE WORLD TILES - In Engine

Enemy boss unreal engine blueprint 

8 levels with 3 levels of difficulties with awesome story line, each level will have its own theme, its own boss, and its fully 3D stunning environment , I'm aiming to bring Unreal Engine® visual power to mobile platform while I completely understand the limitation of mobile hardware .

Keep in mind that the number of levels may increase or decrease based on the deadline of release of the game bec after all I'm planning to add more levels even after release .

I've Introduced the game for first time at Slovenia Game Conference at October 2018, I called it that time Screaming Jet, and I got very +ve feedback from everyone, even from waiters which is completely surprised me, I dont think they were compliment me by anyway since they dont know me  , thats what encouraged me to take it to 2nd level making it official and crowdfund it. especially after I left my job on August 2018 .

I've prepared a demo version that is playable on controllers so everyone could try it during conference . this is me while showing the game to one of the visitors.

The reward will be global for everyone since its a mobile game.

Once we hit the target fund the game will be :-

  • 99% ads free, the other 1% will be an icon at main menu to give u a notification about an available ad, you can either tap and watch the ad and get a decent reward, or just ignore it, "I will never force any user to watch any ads under any condition. its your choice " , And since I'm a gamer, I will never ruin my game with ads banner , sudden ad videos between level or any things like that. Screaming Sky UI is ads free . 

  • Based on the ads explanation, you have to expect decent rewards to encourage you to watch an ad .

  • There is no in game currency , everything will be unlocked as long as you play. while I'm not planning to make heavy in game store , maybe just upgrade ores boosters .

  • This game build with love not greed , and I'm a gamer and will never add anything that bother me personally when I play a video game, even if its a mobile game.

  • This is the most important part , I will release all in-game engine assets on Unreal Marketplace for free just like Epic Games did for their paragon assets to enrich the community with more assets for learning purposes , and since all the assets are mobile friendly , I believe this will be a great addition to the community .

You are not just bringing this game to live, you become part of the game , thats why I'm sharing all in game engine assets with you upon release for learning purposes once we hit the target.

If we reach 30K $ , I will also release all source files for 3D assets including all :

  • Fbx files for low and HD models if they have one
  • Substance painter files .
  • Did someone said Nintendo Switch ? , however Switch doesn't have built in microphone, which means I will rework the game play to be driven by something else , Spoiler "♪♫♪♫♪♫"

For perks , I made them creative as I can since its a mobile game

  • You can just contribute , 5$ still cheaper than 2 double cheese burger, at least here at Slovenia , but instead of burger you will get a game that you will addict to it later on .
  • You can gift your partner to be feature as hero in the game
  • Gift a friend to be featured as survival to be rescued 
  • If you are group at work and want to gift your Boss, make it a surprise for him and make him an enemy boss "just dont blame me if you got fired ☻☻ xD" .

iOS version maybe it will be delayed upon lunch for the following reasons :

  • I havent tested the game on iOS before bec it need certain hardware since you cant build and compile a game that uses C++ on windows for IOS using unreal engine, and it must be done using Xcode which is exclusive on Mac . so this will may take time if it doesnt work smoothly as expected when getting the required hardware.

Its just me who did everything .its too much fun when switching between programming and art, there is no way you will get bored .

I'm Omar , my friends know me as Omar Vector , I'm from egypt, I moved to slovenia at 2016 to start my computer science studies at Maribor Univeristy FERI .

I'm 3D Generalist, game developer , I love piano, I adore Cats , I love playing shooter and strategy games , but once I started this project, whenever I work on it ,I feel the same pleasure of playing a video game but in addition to that I'm building something better than just a high score.

http://www.ScreamingSky.eu

Like Us On Facebook & Follow Us On Twitter

This is my LinkedIn Profile

 My ArtStation

Email : Omar@ScreamingSky.eu

Phone number : +386 31 017 240 

For Risks :

I already took the following risks :

  • I had an interview for possible job and I suppose to get their final decision after 3 days from the day of interview  , but I made my decision to push all I've left to this project and apologized to them before they even telling me their final decision while I was really looking for any job to cover my education fees , what could be more risky than this , beside they may reject me too , who knows .
  • I missed my mid-terms exams last weeks at 19.11.2018, didnt attend 95% of classes to focus, polish and prepare my campaign on Indiegogo , but good thing that I still have 2 months to recap what I've missed at university starting at december.
  • I set the funding goal as "Fixed Goal" . while I need any cash to cover my education fees, flexible funding would be the ideal solution, but I didnt choose this path, bec I want to fulfill my promise and bring this game to life, and hardware requirement is not that cheap especially iOS and Mac solutions.

Challenges :

The real challenge is Myself , facing high level of stress in daily basis is something that sucks anyone happiness, your life become slow in all aspect , thats the main reason I developed this game , when I shout or singing loud like retarded while playing , it makes me feel much better , not perfect solution, but it works.

But dont worry , once I open the game development agile board , I become suddenly forget about anything around and melt down inside the project whenever I feel down, this game revives me , so you all have to be sure that I will not cool down until this game is out however long it will take

I always say, Die for your dream and it will revive you .

If you cant contribute to this project but you liked the idea, just simply share it on facebook, twitter or whatever social media you use, if this campaign went viral and everyone contribute by 5$ will be enough , thats best thing you can do :))

story:
PC ONLY need at least 556mb ram

Play puzzles in dungeons like moving boulders!

               


About me

        

Hello my name is frank I am 16 and I'm sorry about my low talking in the beggining of the video but I am the only game designer in my company I am really hoping for people to donate some money because it will show me I have successfully put out a game and I can keep putting out more.

What We Need & What You Get

What I need is donations for my game because I would really like to put some towards a new laptop because I want to start making even more games. Also I need the money for hiring people and releasing a much more successful game. I would really like to also put alot of that money towards a new program to be using.

What you get: You can get the game and even more games when we release them I know it may not be much and im sorry but as time goes on ill start putting out more and more things. 

Add-Ons



If I raise $50 I will make cheat codes for Hallowed Grounds and post some up on our facebook page 

If I raise $100 or more I will make a special character that has higher Stats then all the other characters 

If $300 or more is raised I will Make Hallowed Grounds #2 

If $500 or more is raised I will post a huge thank you for helping me get my laptop on my facebook page to all who donated and I will definitely make more games I will also take suggestions for games to be made 

If my goal is raised i'm going to cry lol... that would be one amazing thing to see it would show me that I finally made something that people enjoy playing and I will continue making games


Ways everyone can help me 

Please Spread the word around to friends and family I would really appreciate that

Play puzzles in dungeons like moving boulders!



               



About me
        
Hello my name is frank I am 16 and I'm sorry about my low talking in the beggining of the video but I am the only game designer in my company I am really hoping for people to donate some money because it will show me I have successfully put out a game and I can keep putting out more.


What We Need & What You Get
What I need is donations for my game because I would really like to put some towards a new laptop because I want to start making even more games. Also I need the money for hiring people and releasing a much more successful game. I would really like to also put alot of that money towards a new program to be using.
What you get: You can get the game and even more games when we release them I know it may not be much and im sorry but as time goes on ill start putting out more and more things.

story:
Legendary Monsters is collectible toy line unlike anything else. Each of the four monsters comes with a real life eyewitness account right on the package! 

Each monster features 10-12 points of articulation and stands 5-7" tall. Each creature will be hand painted by a team of artists lead by myself!

 

Mothman

Sighting: November 15, 1966 Point Pleasant, West Virginia

The Jersey Devil

Sighting: December 1993 Pine Barrens, New Jersey

 

Chupacabra

Sighting:August 1995 Cano' Vanas, Puerto Rico

 

 The Missouri Monster

Sighting: July 11, 1972 Louisiana, Missouri

 

TOY PACKAGING EXAMPLE:

 

THE FIGURES YOU SEE ABOVE ARE BASED ON DESCRIPTIONS FROM REAL EYEWITNESS!

 

I have been drawn to these stories my entire life. These experiences have been told by people who believed in what they saw, what they experienced. Their emotions were very raw and very real, whether or not it was a dark human form covered in fur, darting in front of their car on a moonlit night, or a pair of glowing red eyes peering at them from the shadows on the side of the road. These experiences with the unknown live on, and are still a part of the curiosity and wonder that exist within us today. It is my pleasure to share these stories with you in the form of these action figures.

Read the descriptions below from real people and there experiences with creatures they could not comprehend or understand!

MOTHMAN
November 15, 1966 Point Pleasant, West Virginia

While driving through an abandoned munitions dump "locally known as the TNT area," Linda Scarberry, her husband Roger and another couple spotted a pair of glowing red eyes, two inches wide and six inches apart attached to something that was "shaped like a man, but bigger...maybe six or seven feet tall, and it had big wings folded against its back." Roger accelerated their vehicle trying to escape from the creature. Much to the couples' horror, "Mothman" gave case, squeaking audibly as it reached speeds over 100mph. The flying monster ended pursuit only as the car neared town.

THE JERSEY DEVIL
December 1993 Pine Barrens, New Jersey

Forest Ranger John Irwin was driving alongside the Mullica River in southern New Jersey when he found the road blocked by a creature. Irwin describes the monster as a six foot tall bipedal animal with horns and dark fur. The ranger and "The Jersey Devil" stared at each other for several minutes before the creature fled into the woods.

Origin: Pine Barrens 1730
The mistress of a British soldier known as "Mother Leeds" went into labor with her 13th child. During the delivery she suffered agonizing pain and cursed the child, wishing it out of her body. As the hateful words faded from her lips the Jersey Devil slithered out of her womb and into the world.

CHUPACABRA

August 1995 Cano' Vanas, Puerto Rico

At 4pm Madelyne Tolentino noticed that the driver of a vehicle parked in front of her house appeared frightened. As she approached the large front window she saw a creature walking upright in front of her house with its arms outstretched. At that point she screamed, sending her mother outside of the house to chase the creature. The monster took off in a hopping motion toward the nearby woods.

A typical Chupacabra is described as four to six feet in height covered in short fine grey hair with dark spots on the creature's back. Its powerful legs and long arms end in hands containing three to four long narrow fingers ending in claws. A series of protruding spikes run along the creature’s spine.

THE MISSOURI MONSTER

July 11, 1972 Louisiana, Missouri

Eight year old Terry Harrison was playing in the backyard when a creature appeared, splatted with blood, carrying a dog under its arm. The creature was luckily driven away by the screams of his eight year old sister Doris, who had just stepped out into the yard.

"Momo" is typically described as a creature six to seven feet tall, its body covered entirely in black hair. Manlike in appearance and stance, the creature is often referred to as the "Eastern Bigfoot."

 

 

EXAMPLES OF PROTOTYPES: All 4 monsters are shown here are examples of what the reward prototypes may look like.

 

 

 

 

TOY DESIGN

I have been fortunate to work in industries that I've been passion about my entire life. The first 5 of my 15 years were spent working for the toy industry as a designer. I was an action figure designer, can you believe that! Those were great years for me, spent with some truly talented artists working on what I loved; action figure toy lines. Over those 5 years I was able to work on many different toy lines including Spiderman, Batman, X-Men, Star Wars, Jurassic Park, Star Trek, Godzilla, Small Soldiers, GI Joe and many others product lines.

 

 

GAME DESIGN

I believe it was fate that that lead me to my first game studio, Bethesda Softworks. While at Bethesda Softworks, I worked both as an Lead Artist and Designer on a number of games for them which included Morrowind, Oblivion, The Shivering Isles and Fallout 3. Since then I've moved to another studio and just released a game called "XCOM: Enemy Unknown," where I spent the last 4 years as Lead Level Designer. I am still there as an artist and designer and my free moments are spent with my family and working on action figure toy lines like the one you see here.

 

THANK YOU

 I wish to thank all of you for your interest and support in helping me make this dream a reality!

Also, I thank all of you that pledged and supported us in our early attempts, we created new relationships and opportunities because of that!

To my wife Tema and children, Victoria, Avery and Wynter, I love you and could not have done this without you. Having the support of my family means everything to me. Also I wish to thank Jon Coe, my oldest and closest friend who has worked close in sharing this dream of putting out our own action figure product lines.

 COMING SOON!

THE NEXT FIGURE WAVE WILL INCLUDE SLENDERMAN AND SASQUATCH!

I am still there as an artist and designer and my free moments are spent with my family and working on action figure toy lines like the one you see here.

Also, I thank all of you that pledged and supported us in our early attempts, we created new relationships and opportunities because of that!
To my wife Tema and children, Victoria, Avery and Wynter, I love you and could not have done this without you. Having the support of my family means everything to me. Also I wish to thank Jon Coe, my oldest and closest friend who has worked close in sharing this dream of putting out our own action figure product lines.

THE NEXT FIGURE WAVE WILL INCLUDE SLENDERMAN AND SASQUATCH!

story:
Introducing...

Have you ever heard about Truth or Dare and play the games before? Then you know we have created the new "Truth or Dare Board Games"


We are the seven young designers who created the first Truth or Dare Board Game. This is the game where someone asks you truth or dare, if you choose truth, then you absolutely have to tell the truth on whatever they ask. If you choose dare, you have to do what they dared you to. 


This is the product and what you'll get 

This game created to be fair and square. If not they are only choose truth instead of dare, that is why we created Truth or Dare Board Game. It has chance card, a dice and 2 stick of Truth and Dare. It is easy to bring everywhere and small size.

A game played most frequently by teens and young adults.

The items all included in the box:

5 Icons

1 Dice

1 Set Sticks

2 Rules & Instruction Card

10 Chance Card

The stick to choose wether you pick a "truth" or "dare"

Red = Dare / Yellow = Truth

A sticker as a gift

The keychain also as a gift

So this is our poster launch advertisement


We will be needing your support:

·  Show your support by clicking ‘like’ from our page in Facebook !

   https://www.facebook.com/TODBG

·  Do follow us on twitter and instagram !

   @truthdare2013

·  You can also use the Indiegogo share tools too !


Please support and spread our project:

·  We will need $ 1000 to support our team to make this product

·  Your contribution will be used as our initial capital to start marketing the product to

   market

·  We will try our best to make this project succeded

·  The Perks we will send to you after this project is succesful

 

Thank You for your support !

You guys are AWESOME !

story:
Before anything else...

Play the demo!

  • Windows (EXE)

  • Mac (DMG)

  • Linux (DEB)

That's why you're here, right? :D

If you'd like a quicker look at the game, check out the gameplay trailer.

 

Who is this guy?

Hi! I'm Ruari O'Sullivan, aka randomnine. I used to work for Frontier Developments Ltd. Two years ago I decided to take the money I'd saved up, strike out for myself and go indie.

Through 2011 I did several smaller games. I made Beacon, a 15-minute platformer in space. I made Fear Is Vigilance, a game about punching people who don't have safety alarms until they're scared enough to take safety alarms. Both were covered on Rock, Paper, Shotgun; Fear Is Vigilance was sponsored by Newgrounds. I also did some contract work, a few small mods like this custom level for VVVVVV, and most importantly here helped out with later versions of Ido Yehieli's Cardinal Quest. 

It was a fun year, if a bit scattered. I worked on lots of small projects and managed to stay afloat - but I want to do something bigger. I asked Ido what he thought about making a full-blown sequel to Cardinal Quest. He said yes!

 

What's the game about?

Cardinal Quest 1 was a streamlined turn-based dungeon crawler. Cardinal Quest 2 is bigger, better and deeper; you've got way more control over how you make your character and the game's procedurally-generated environments and challenges are much more varied.

It's had a massive interface overhaul to make it sleeker and easier to play, including a snap-decision interface system to present you the important choices and get rid of fussy inventory management. The biggest new feature is the talent system - a range of unique upgrades for each of the six character classes which helps you build every character up in their own uniquely overpowered way.

I've been working on Cardinal Quest 2 since January. I think it's pretty fun already (but please, download the demo and judge for yourself!). However, I want it to be BETTER and THE MOST AWESOME IT CAN POSSIBLY BE.

I want to make it three chapters long, with unique environments, monsters, bosses and challenges in each. I want to flesh it out with little mini-sidequests. I want to add some real surprises in; rare items that'll really change your game when you find them. Most of all, I want to bring people in to completely redo the art, extend CQ1's soundtrack with all-new music just for CQ2. Maybe even to overhaul the sound and develop the setting.

Problem is... I'm broke!

 

So here's the deal.

You can play the demo of the current version, right now, for free. Go on - play it! Then come back.

If you pledge a little, you'll get the game for Windows, Mac or Linux at a discount when it comes out. If you want to continue your game before then, pledge a bit more and you'll get direct beta access within 24 hours. You'll get the entirety of the game's first chapter as it stands; you'll also get regular updates as the game improves, with full talent trees and improvements to the Ranger, Pugilist and Paladin coming up soon. You'll be able to see it taking shape and tell me how to make more fun for you.

Throw in a bit more and you'll get the first game's soundtrack, plus CQ2's once it's commissioned. Go further and there's a beta access bundle that gets you access for your friends at a discount.

If you bought Cardinal Quest 1 before December 8th 2011: as we've announced before, you'll get Cardinal Quest 2 for free - because you're awesome and we love you. If you pledge for beta access anyway, get in touch and we'll throw in the soundtracks gratis.

 

What will the money be used for?

Making the game! It'll be done by March 2013 at the latest - possibly sooner - and it'll be a heck of a lot better than it is now.

After Indiegogo and payment processing fees are deducted, here's where the money's going:

  • $8,500 art budget to redo all game artwork at a higher resolution
  • $6,000 programming budget to make the game much, much bigger
  • $2,000 music budget to expand the soundtrack
  • $1,500 in fees, software, hardware, sound effects and general contingencies

This is a fixed funding campaign. If it doesn't clear the goal then your money will be refunded. I'll then have to wrap up the game fairly quickly, put it out as it is now - one chapter long, with low-resolution artwork. It'll be OK, but with your help I think it could be so much more.

 

Awesome! I've pledged. How else can I help?

Well, Cardinal Quest 2 is on Greenlight. Vote it up! If it gets on Steam, all preorders will come with Steam keys as well as a DRM-free alternative.

If you pledged $25 or more, you'll receive an email with a link to beta downloads within 24 hours. Please bear with me - I need to go through the list once or twice a day and send out the emails manually, it's not automated. :)

Finally - tell everyone you know! Every single dollar pledged will help make the game you're getting better, so spread the word.

Thank you for being amazing.

 

Lots of love,

randomnine

Well, Cardinal Quest 2 is on Greenlight. Vote it up! If it gets on Steam, all preorders will come with Steam keys as well as a DRM-free alternative.
If you pledged $25 or more, you'll receive an email with a link to beta downloads within 24 hours. Please bear with me - I need to go through the list once or twice a day and send out the emails manually, it's not automated. :)
Finally - tell everyone you know! Every single dollar pledged will help make the game you're getting better, so spread the word.
Thank you for being amazing.
 
Lots of love,
randomnine

story:
Yes yet another indiegogo/kickstarter campaing for Wargaming related miniatures and accessories, but unlike many other we aren't a big lucrative company trying to piggy back on crowed funding just because its cool or because it "free money with no interests. No! We are a real start up company trying to make it in this world. You must ask your self if you don't know us already who are those crazy guys? Well let me introduce our selves to you! 

Ichiban studio is a collaboration between Hugo Matte and Dennis Zarnowski.

  • Hugo Matte is an accomplished painter and also youtuber, he won 2 golden demons and also many other famous painting contest. He hold a pretty impressive rating on coolminiornot
  • Dennis Zarnowski is the talented sculpter behinds all the wonderful miniature and accessories we will offer. He's also holding a very impressive rating on coolminiornot.

Now let's talk about the real things! Yes why are we using a crowd funding website. The reality of it is pretty easy. Although Hugo and Deniss are working hard developing new products amid the ones that we already have, doing this isn't first an easy thing and also producing a decent amount of them for you to enjoy is a real chalange. So we are resorting on crow funding to help us lauch the line. Think of this campaing as a pre launch with cool discounts!

  • What We Need & What You Get

So what do we need!

Thats a really good question!

  • First with the funds we will collect here we will buy resin! a lot of it to be able to produce the cool minis that you see in the perk section and and also for the future models that are in the concept phase.
  • Other things we will aquire with the funds from this campaing are hopfully a 3D printer and also a die cut cutter which will allow use to design more cool products and accessories for wargaming.
  • Last is pretty easy Me and Dennis have to eat :) 

What you get!! Thats the cool part

So here i will try and explain all the perks in detail for you, if you have any question regarding them feel free to contact us.

  • Please Note That Shipping isnt included in all the perk prices. All perks shipping information are included in the description of each perks and should be added to the pledge. 

THE SUPPORTER PERK 5$ AND 10$

This perk is for those that are willing to help us make everything happen but dont have the means to do so at higher level perks. Therefor this perk is for you! 

 

THE DISPLAY STYLE PERK 15$

This perk will give you a choice of one of the small display plinths from the Ichiban Studio. International shipping is included. Once you select the perk please let us know which one from the following you would like to get.

 

STOP THEM TANKS 15$

Need to stop those pesky tanks on your favorite table top game? Here you go! With this perk youll get a set of tanks stoppers from Ichiban Studio.

 

PAVE THE WAY 20$ per section

With this perk you will secure your self one road section of your choice. You can choose from straight section with crater, straight without crater, T section and 90 degree section. More pictures will be up soon of the other road sections.

 

 

THE BIG ON DISPLAY PERK 20$

With this perk you will get on big display base of your choice from Ichiban Studio

 

GET YOUR SWAG ON 35$

With this perk youll be able to get your hands on an indigogo exclusive Ichiban Studio Tshirt. Sizes avalible S, M, L, XL, 2XL and 3XL in black

 

BUST THEM UP 35$

With this perk you get the choice of one of the 100mm bust from Ichiban Studio. The Bust choices are The Zombie, The Gargoyle and The Mean One.

 

 

DA BUNKER 40$

Here we have Da Bunker! hell yeah! This is a modular bunker system which mean the side barricades are removable and can be placed in any position that you want. Also the roof of the bunker can be taken off to accommodate your troops.The picture version is the prototype and the final version will be better and have even more details pics to come.

 

STEAMPUNK ANYONE 50$

With this perk you will get The Mr Cooper Smith bust standing tall at 190mm

 

DISPLAY MANIAC 50$

With this perk you will secure your self 2 small displayplinths and 2 large one from the ichiban studio you can choose from all the plinths we have here are just exemples of the possible combinasions.

 

BUST THEM ALL FOR 4 THE WIN 90$

This perk includes all the small 100mm bust from Ichiban Studio
 
 

THE MEAN ONE FULL SIZE EDITION 100$

With this perk you will get a full size Mean One as you can see in the picture bellow. Size of this bad boy is 23cm tall

 

 MINIATURE HEAVEN 240$

With this perk heaven is coming to you in the for of a miniature! Thats right with this you will get basically all the miniatures that we currently have! The Mean One, The Zombie, The Gargoyle, Mr Cooper Smith and a Full Size Edition Mean One

 

  • The Impact

The Impact.... hummmm... its pretty simple this campaing is really the launching stone of this venture. we either make it or break it. So if you support us we will then inturn be able to really focus on creating and working really hard to build a company that focuses on creating really cool miniatures for painter and also wargamers alike.

 

  • The Future


So what are we planing for the future? My sraight answer is a lot! of course it all depends on the out come of this campaing but we are planing on reasling  more big size 220mm models, more busts and smaller scale miniatures. Also we are working hard on a full line of gaming terrain accessorires including gaming bases and also cool buildings for 28mm scale wargames. 

Here is a concept drawing of the future model we will be releasing soon.

 

 

  • Other Ways You Can Help Us

That a really really important one guys and gals!

SHARE is the word of the day. Wheater or not you can help us by getting your self a cool Perk, sharing this Indigogo campaign will defenatly help us reach out to more ppl that might be ionterested into supporting us! All the help is needed and appreciated. Fortunatly for us we live in a world rich in technology and social media and a share on facebook or a tweet can go a long way in helping us reach our goal and beon.
story_txt:
Yes yet another indiegogo/kickstarter campaing for Wargaming related miniatures and accessories, but unlike many other we aren't a big lucrative company trying to piggy back on crowed funding just because its cool or because it "free money with no interests. No! We are a real start up company trying to make it in this world. You must ask your self if you don't know us already who are those crazy guys? Well let me introduce our selves to you! 
Ichiban studio is a collaboration between Hugo Matte and Dennis Zarnowski.

Hugo Matte is an accomplished painter and also youtuber, he won 2 golden demons and also many other famous painting contest. He hold a pretty impressive rating on coolminiornot
Dennis Zarnowski is the talented sculpter behinds all the wonderful miniature and accessories we will offer. He's also holding a very impressive rating on coolminiornot.

Now let's talk about the real things! Yes why are we using a crowd funding website. The reality of it is pretty easy. Although Hugo and Deniss are working hard developing new products amid the ones that we already have, doing this isn't first an easy thing and also producing a decent amount of them for you to enjoy is a real chalange. So we are resorting on crow funding to help us lauch the line. Think of this campaing as a pre launch with cool discounts!



What We Need & What You Get

So what do we need!
Thats a really good question!

First with the funds we will collect here we will buy resin! a lot of it to be able to produce the cool minis that you see in the perk section and and also for the future models that are in the concept phase.
Other things we will aquire with the funds from this campaing are hopfully a 3D printer and also a die cut cutter which will allow use to design more cool products and accessories for wargaming.
Last is pretty easy Me and Dennis have to eat :) 
What you get!! Thats the cool part
So here i will try and explain all the perks in detail for you, if you have any question regarding them feel free to contact us.


Please Note That Shipping isnt included in all the perk prices. All perks shipping information are included in the description of each perks and should be added to the pledge. 

THE SUPPORTER PERK 5$ AND 10$
This perk is for those that are willing to help us make everything happen but dont have the means to do so at higher level perks. Therefor this perk is for you! 

 
THE DISPLAY STYLE PERK 15$
This perk will give you a choice of one of the small display plinths from the Ichiban Studio. International shipping is included. Once you select the perk please let us know which one from the following you would like to get.


 
STOP THEM TANKS 15$
Need to stop those pesky tanks on your favorite table top game? Here you go! With this perk youll get a set of tanks stoppers from Ichiban Studio.

 

PAVE THE WAY 20$ per section
With this perk you will secure your self one road section of your choice. You can choose from straight section with crater, straight without crater, T section and 90 degree section. More pictures will be up soon of the other road sections.

 


 
THE BIG ON DISPLAY PERK 20$
With this perk you will get on big display base of your choice from Ichiban Studio


 
GET YOUR SWAG ON 35$
With this perk youll be able to get your hands on an indigogo exclusive Ichiban Studio Tshirt. Sizes avalible S, M, L, XL, 2XL and 3XL in black

 
BUST THEM UP 35$
With this perk you get the choice of one of the 100mm bust from Ichiban Studio. The Bust choices are The Zombie, The Gargoyle and The Mean One.

 

 
DA BUNKER 40$
Here we have Da Bunker! hell yeah! This is a modular bunker system which mean the side barricades are removable and can be placed in any position that you want. Also the roof of the bunker can be taken off to accommodate your troops.The picture version is the prototype and the final version will be better and have even more details pics to come.

 
STEAMPUNK ANYONE 50$
With this perk you will get The Mr Cooper Smith bust standing tall at 190mm

 
DISPLAY MANIAC 50$
With this perk you will secure your self 2 small displayplinths and 2 large one from the ichiban studio you can choose from all the plinths we have here are just exemples of the possible combinasions.

 

BUST THEM ALL FOR 4 THE WIN 90$
This perk includes all the small 100mm bust from Ichiban Studio
 
 

THE MEAN ONE FULL SIZE EDITION 100$
With this perk you will get a full size Mean One as you can see in the picture bellow. Size of this bad boy is 23cm tall

 
 MINIATURE HEAVEN 240$
With this perk heaven is coming to you in the for of a miniature! Thats right with this you will get basically all the miniatures that we currently have! The Mean One, The Zombie, The Gargoyle, Mr Cooper Smith and a Full Size Edition Mean One
 




The Impact


The Impact.... hummmm... its pretty simple this campaing is really the launching stone of this venture. we either make it or break it. So if you support us we will then inturn be able to really focus on creating and working really hard to build a company that focuses on creating really cool miniatures for painter and also wargamers alike.
 


The Future


So what are we planing for the future? My sraight answer is a lot! of course it all depends on the out come of this campaing but we are planing on reasling  more big size 220mm models, more busts and smaller scale miniatures. Also we are working hard on a full line of gaming terrain accessorires including gaming bases and also cool buildings for 28mm scale wargames. 
Here is a concept drawing of the future model we will be releasing soon.

 
 




Other Ways You Can Help Us


That a really really important one guys and gals!
SHARE is the word of the day. Wheater or not you can help us by getting your self a cool Perk, sharing this Indigogo campaign will defenatly help us reach out to more ppl that might be ionterested into supporting us! All the help is needed and appreciated. Fortunatly for us we live in a world rich in technology and social media and a share on facebook or a tweet can go a long way in helping us reach our goal and beon.

story:
Saga of Pandoria

Hello World, this is Martin from Team Monkey. Previously I had the chance to participate in titles such as "Crysis" or "Ankh", but today I am glad to work together with my mates at Team Monkey on the game of our dreams: Saga of Pandoria.


Despite what you might think, we are actually only a small indie game development team of less than 5 people across the globe working on this game in our spare time.


Saga of Pandoria is (previously known as "Return to Mana") is a 3 player COOP Action RPG in a unique fantasy environment.

 

Key features of the game

  • Homage to SNES action RPG classics

  • 3 Player Coop STORY Mode across LAN or Internet

  • Realtime Battlesystem (Blocking, Evasion, Combos)

  • Realtime Magic & Item system

  • Continuous leveling of both character and skills saved across games (Stored on local computer, similar to "Diablo")

  • Handcrafted unique fantasy environment with much love for detail.

 

Although the first episode of the game is almost finished, we decided to take our game to IndieGoGo to turn something GOOD into something GREAT.

If you read so far and you are still interested, please continue to find out WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP:

 

Why we need your help

Here is in short the answer to WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP:
 

  1. Licence Fee
    In order to make use of the full features of the SOURCE engine and turn this game into a standalone version, we need to form a licence agreement with VALVE. These licence fees will require the vast majority of the funds.

  2. Server costs.
    For many years we have been working on this title already, facing continuous expenses for not only the main website but also our internal development servers.

  3. Game content / Programming
    Although the content for the first episode is almost finished, we are hoping to get even more content into the game.

    Although the Story mode is already up and running, the "core" of the game principle, the XP system is not up and running yet. We will need many hours of programming to finalize this most important element of the game.

  4. Making it DRM free.
    We want to deliver this game to you DRM free on your hard drive. No third party publisher / software will limit your unlimited right to enjoy this game.

 

What You will get

One of the most unique game titles in recent history plus:

  • Early access to your own digital copy.

  • Standalone game with full access of the SOURCE engine features.

  • Special features such as game soundtrack or strategy/monster guide.

  • More content in the game than already included. More monsters to beat, more levels to reach, more islands to visit.

  • DRM free game with no third party limiting your gaming experience.

 

 

Why helping us

As an independent game developer it is very difficult for us to get funded by third parties. The only chance for us to make this game reality is to get funded by you, our future gamers.
 
At times when gamers are busy counting the "numbers" of endless sequels to existing game formulas, it is essential for you to ask yourself:
 

  • Do you want to support unique fresh game ideas?

  • Do you want to support independent game development?

  • Do you want to show the big game publishers that there are still people out there who want to play creative games?

 
If you answered one of these questions with "Yes", then please let us start changing the game industry - TODAY.
 
 

What else you can do

In case you want to help us, but cannot help us rise funds there are other many other ways to support us, such as:

  1. Tell your friends about this project.
  2. Make the video game cover this project.
  3. Share our video or articles on facebook.
  4. Share your thoughts and ideas with us.
  5. Help us to further improve the game

 

On behalf of all the people at Team Monkey I want to thank all the people who supported us during the last years and everyone for the upcoming support to finish this project!!


YOU GUYS ARE GREAT!!

 

Martin

story:
Why have we started this game?

The reason we started to develop this game is simple: we want to express our creativity while entertaining people. Create new from nothing is one of the most pleasant experience.
  • We are two young IT guys who want to show their inspiration to the world.
  • We would like to get questions and comments to collect more experience, so we could make the game better. This is why this project so important to us. We want to design a really enjoyable and good game considering your ideas and needs.
  • If you support us, you don't just help this project, but support our advancement to create more cool games.


Story

The main story is about a punk who has committed a lot of sin in his life, so he found himself in the hell after dead. But he has a beautiful lover, a girl. He loved her more than anything in the world. This girl is in the haven. He could be anywhere without her, but still feel like in hell, so he decides to escape. His escaping is adventurous, full of enemies, dangers and potential. His story is told by “story-boards”.

Atmosphere

We believe that game experience depends on not only the technical part, but the atmosphere and the graphics of the game. So we would like to produce a game that has some amazing visual effects. One of them is called “Leaf effect”. Of course it can be other than leafs, like snowflakes or little insects in another atmosphere.

Interesting elements & enemies

During the adventures you meet a lot of exciting elements trying to kill you. Some enemies can move in the air in a regular shaped path. Some are hidden until you get close. Some elements appear only when you touch another element and some disappear after leaving it. The goal is complete levels more quickly with less dead-count while collecting more points.


Player resize 

This game is not only an arcade game, but also a logic game. You need to figure out some connections and find several (maybe) hidden element to finish a level and the whole game. One part of the logic is an element that can change your size to fit somewhere you cannot fit otherwise.

Checkpoints

As we are in the hell there is no reason to deal with life. So our hero has no life. The game counts how many times you have died and how many rewards collected before completing a level. So when you die you will be actually put back to the last checkpoint and the dead-counter will be increased. The dead-counter and reward-counter values will give us the possibility to give achievements and create top-lists.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are really appreciate your feedbacks, comments, questions and all the help we can get. Please vote on Greenlight here.
