story:
tl;dr: If you want a box, get the O1: Lieutenant-perk or better.


What is this?

Traveller LIFTOFF is a starter set for the Traveller RPG made for young players and designed around a "plug-and-play" mentality that lets you start adventuring right along. Just grab a few friends, generate your characters, and LIFTOFF!

Created by 13Mann with support from Mongoose and many prominent Traveller artists, LIFTOFF is made for the next generation of Traveller players – and hence: the perfect gift any Traveller parent can give to his or her kids. Inside the box, new players will find everything they need to play, while experienced players, too, will find contents like the full-color Charted Space map and full-colour deck plans of popular Traveller starships both useful and incredibly "must have".

Who is 13Mann?

We are the German license holder for both Mongoose's Traveller RPG and Marc Miller's Traveller5. Beyond that, we publish several other tabletop roleplaying games – and we have had amazing success with our own ABOREA™ product line, a fantasy RPG targeted at young players which serves us as an introduction to the (rather complex) Rolemaster system.

We have seen 12 year olds playing ABOREA™ games with enthusiasm at toy trade fairs and being swayed by the ‘new and innovative’ game concepts. And we are very confident this can be done for Traveller as well.

Why crowdfunding?

As some of you may know, we at 13Mann believe in quality products and doing so comes with high initial costs. If we were to provide all the money upfront, it would be too much of a financial risk. Your support helps us achieve something no publisher (at least no Traveller publisher) would dare.

We predominantly produce for the German market but here we have the rare opportunity to work with Mongoose on a Traveller Starter Set both in English and German.

Why is this such a great opportunity?

LIFTOFF will introduce the classic and timeless awesomeness of Traveller to a new generation. The basic rules – which are a condensed and simplified version of the Mongoose rules – have already been written and are in a constant state of playtesting, re-evaluation and further simplification and fine-tuning -- just download and read the latest rules version here.

We want to make absolutely sure that the LIFTOFF rules deliver the fastest, smoothest, easiest and yet unmistakeably "Traveller" game experience possible -- AND at the same time give experienced players loads .of material they can use at their own gaming table.

What will you be getting?

The basic version of the LIFTOFF box will contain the following:

  • a Players’ Handbook (about 60 pages) will all the rules required for easy play, including ready-to-play characters. You can download the text for the Players’ Handbook here
  • a Referee’s Handbook containing all the important background, an introduction to referee’s job, a guide to the Traveller universe and some ready-to-play NPCs. You can download the text for the Referee’s Handbook here
  • an Adventure Handbook, containing 6 adventures which can be played as continuous session or as a string of simple 2h sessions, perfect for rainy afternoons, short introductions or convention play. It will see the characters develop their contacts while following a mission to uncover the truth about what happened to Outpost 14. You can download the text for the first adventure here (we don’t want to spoil everything)

  • a pack of six cheat sheets for players, so they (and probably the referee, too) have the most important rules at a glance
  • an A2 sized (16.5 × 23.4 inches or 42.0 × 59.4 cm for those of you on the metric system) full colour map of Charted Space

  • an A2 sized full coloured deck plan of a Free Trader

That’s all contained in the box and if you were to buy the box at your FLGS or from an online store, this is all you will get (there won’t be any individual perks or stretch goals).

What will it look like?

You can see a sample layout with some real text and real illustrations here.

English or German?

We will produce both, an English and a German version of Traveller Liftoff. English will be the default language. If you want a German language version, please let us know in your selected perk comment section.

Can I order additional material from the box?

You want additional Players' Handbooks or maps? No problem. Simply add 6 EUR for each single item you want to add and state in your perk comments, what you want. If you order more than 5 items, please consider adding 10 EUR shipping costs for every 5 articles beyond the first 5. You have to select the E3: Sergeant-perk or better to be eligible for ordering. If you choose O5: Colonel or above, you don't need to include additional shipping costs.

Can I order additional boxes?

Yes, you can but unfortunately the shipping costs don't scale that well. Actually, they scale bad. If you just want one additional box we recommend simply choosing the same perk again. However, if you want more then one additional box, please add 15 EUR shipping costs (yes, it scales that bad) and then 20 EUR per additional box you want to order. You have to select the O1: Lieutenant-perk or better to be eligible for ordering. However, if you truly want to order multiple boxes (for your children, grandchildren, a gift for young boys and girls) we recommend you choose O5: Colonel or above. Then you don't need to include additional shipping costs and can order as many boxes as you want for 20 EUR each.

What are our stretch goals?

The more people participate in this crowdfunding, the better for everyone. So tell your friends and your fellow gamers about it. Most stretch goals will feature an additional deck plan, like the one for the Free Trader until all ships featured in the box are covered. It will also include additional adventures. And we are particularly eager to see solo adventures come to life. Our stretch goals go in steps of 25,000 EUR.

  • 125,000 EUR: Deck plan: Fighter & Launch, Solo Adventure 1, Map of a Starport Class E
  • 150,000 EUR: Deck plan: Scout, Character Sheet Block, Map of a Starport Class D
  • 175,000 EUR: Deck plan: Pinnace, Additional Group Adventure 1, Map of a Starport Downport Class C
  • 200,000 EUR: Referee's Screen, Token Set, Map of a Starport Highport Class C
  • 225,000 EUR: Deck plan: Lab Ship, Solo Adventure 2, Map of a Starport Downport Class B
  • 250,000 EUR: Deck plan: Close Escort, Additional Group Adventure 2, Map of a Starport Highport Class B
  • 275,000 EUR: Deck plan: Subsidized Merchant, Additional Group Adventures 3 + 4

What’s the timeline?

This crowdfunding will end on October 1, 2014. If we reached our funding goal, the next steps will be the creation of additional artwork and translation of English texts to German (for our German supporters). This will take about a month.

Sometime in early November we will commence our Layout work and final editing. Printing should start in mid-December and (taking Christmas holidays into account) finish early February, at which point we will transport the boxes and additional materials to our distributor of choice (Mongoose) who will do the international shipping to you folks. Those in Germany, Austria and Switzerland will receive a parcel from 13Mann directly. Depending on where you are, and your local customs officers, and if everything goes according to plan, your parcel should arrive around the end of March, early April 2015.

What if you were to buy this later in a shop?

You may spot a LIFTOFF box in your FLGS or online shop of choice. The box will only feature the contents listed under “What will you be getting?”. None of the stretch goals will be included (which you may be able to purchase for some additional money however), and certainly none of the individual rewards. So yes, you do get the best value for money here.

What happens if LIFTOFF doesn’t get funded?

We do want to share our dream of introducing new and young players to Traveller, but at the same time we have to be realistic. So what happens, if we don’t reach our funding goal? Indiegogo will automatically return your investment. Of course it also means there won’t be a LIFTOFF box.

However, we will keep the Players’ Handbook and the Referee’s Handbook as plain text documents available for download at 13Mann’s website. No further changes will be made to the documents though and there won’t be any illustrations or deckplans available.

Shipping costs included

All individual reward levels that require us shipping boxes and other materials to you, already include shipping and packaging costs if you live within the EU or North America.

International delivery and customs duty

We will ship worldwide and all our individual reward levels contain shipping costs to the EU, Europe (outside EU), and North America. If you want your parcel shipped outside this area, we have to ask for an additional 15 EUR on your perk level.

As we will be shipping from inside the EU, your local customs may require you to pay additional customs duty. Each country has its own regulations and tariffs regarding customs duty, so it is impossible for us to include it in the perk levels.

What if I am a retailer/merchant?

If you have a gaming store or are a retailer and want to bulk order (20+ units), you can contact us at vertrieb@13mann.de for individual pricing plans.

13Mann will provide you with regular updates. Please join us in making this happen!

following:

     (about 60 pages) will all the rules required for easy play, including
     ready-to-play characters. You can download the text for the Players’
     Handbook here

a Referee’s Handbook
     containing all the important background, an introduction to referee’s job,
     a guide to the Traveller universe and some ready-to-play NPCs. You can
     download the text for the Referee’s Handbook here

an Adventure Handbook,
     containing 6 adventures which can be played as continuous session or as a
     string of simple 2h sessions, perfect for rainy afternoons, short
     introductions or convention play. It will see the characters develop their
     contacts while following a mission to uncover the truth about what
     happened to Outpost 14. You can download the text for the first adventure here (we don’t
     want to spoil everything)



a pack of six cheat sheets for
     players, so they (and probably the referee, too) have the most important
     rules at a glance
an A2 sized (16.5 × 23.4
     inches or 42.0 × 59.4 cm for those of you on the metric system) full colour
     map of Charted Space 

an A2 sized full coloured
     deck plan of a Free Trader

That’s all contained in the box and if you were to buy
the box at your FLGS or from an online store, this is all you will get (there
won’t be any individual perks or stretch goals).
What will it look like?
You can see
a sample layout with some real text and real illustrations here.
English or German?We will produce both, an English and a German version of Traveller Liftoff. English will be the default language. If you want a German language version, please let us know in your selected perk comment section.Can I order additional material from the box?You want additional Players' Handbooks or maps? No problem. Simply add 6 EUR for each single item you want to add and state in your perk comments, what you want. If you order more than 5 items, please consider adding 10 EUR shipping costs for every 5 articles beyond the first 5. You have to select the E3: Sergeant-perk or better to be eligible for ordering. If you choose O5: Colonel or above, you don't need to include additional shipping costs.Can I order additional boxes?Yes, you can but unfortunately the shipping costs don't scale that well. Actually, they scale bad. If you just want one additional box we recommend simply choosing the same perk again. However, if you want more then one additional box, please add 15 EUR shipping costs (yes, it scales that bad) and then 20 EUR per additional box you want to order. You have to select the O1: Lieutenant-perk or better to be eligible for ordering. However, if you truly want to order multiple boxes (for your children, grandchildren, a gift for young boys and girls) we recommend you choose O5: Colonel or above. Then you don't need to include additional shipping costs and can order as many boxes as you want for 20 EUR each.What are our stretch goals?
The more people participate in this crowdfunding, the
better for everyone. So tell your friends and your fellow gamers about it. Most
stretch goals will feature an additional deck plan, like the one for the Free
Trader until all ships featured in the box are covered. It will also include
additional adventures. And we are particularly eager to see solo adventures come
to life. Our stretch goals go in steps of 25,000 EUR. 


125,000 EUR: Deck plan: Fighter &
Launch, Solo Adventure 1, Map of a Starport Class E


150,000 EUR: Deck plan: Scout, Character
Sheet Block, Map of a Starport Class D


175,000 EUR: Deck plan: Pinnace,
Additional Group Adventure 1, Map of a Starport Downport Class C


200,000 EUR: Referee's Screen, Token Set, Map of a Starport Highport Class C


225,000 EUR: Deck plan: Lab Ship, Solo
Adventure 2, Map of a Starport Downport Class B


250,000 EUR: Deck plan: Close Escort,
Additional Group Adventure 2, Map of a Starport Highport Class B


275,000 EUR: Deck plan: Subsidized
Merchant, Additional Group Adventures 3 + 4
What’s the timeline?
This crowdfunding will end on October 1, 2014. If we reached our funding
goal, the next steps will be the creation of additional artwork and translation
of English texts to German (for our German supporters). This will take about a
month.
Sometime in early November we will commence our Layout work and final
editing. Printing should start in mid-December and (taking Christmas holidays
into account) finish early February, at which point we will transport the boxes
and additional materials to our distributor of choice (Mongoose) who will do
the international shipping to you folks. Those in Germany, Austria and
Switzerland will receive a parcel from 13Mann directly. Depending on where you
are, and your local customs officers, and if everything goes according to plan,
your parcel should arrive around the end of March, early April 2015.
What if you were to buy this later in a shop?
You may spot a
LIFTOFF box in your FLGS or online shop of choice. The box will only feature
the contents listed under “What will you be getting?”. None of the stretch
goals will be included (which you may
be able to purchase for some additional money however), and certainly none of
the individual rewards. So yes, you do get the best value for money here.
What happens if LIFTOFF doesn’t get funded?
We do want to share our dream of introducing new and
young players to Traveller, but at the same time we have to be realistic. So
what happens, if we don’t reach our funding goal? Indiegogo will automatically
return your investment. Of course it also means there won’t be a LIFTOFF box.
However, we will keep the Players’ Handbook and the
Referee’s Handbook as plain text documents available for download at 13Mann’s
website. No further changes will be made to the documents though and there
won’t be any illustrations or deckplans available.
Shipping costs included
All
individual reward levels that require us shipping boxes and other materials to
you, already include shipping and packaging costs if you live within the EU or
North America.
International delivery and customs duty
We will ship
worldwide and all our individual reward levels contain shipping costs to the EU, Europe (outside EU),
and North America. If you want your parcel shipped outside this area, we have
to ask for an additional 15 EUR on your perk level.
As we will
be shipping from inside the EU, your local customs may require you to pay additional
customs duty. Each country has its own regulations and tariffs regarding
customs duty, so it is impossible for us to include it in the perk levels.
What if I am a retailer/merchant?
If you have
a gaming store or are a retailer and want to bulk order (20+ units), you can
contact us at vertrieb@13mann.de for
individual pricing plans.
13Mann will provide you with regular updates. Please join us in making this
happen!

story:
This is a very ambitious project, but we wish that it will be finished this year.

We want to offer everyone the chance to play all the games on the market they wish for free, we are just students, but we are working pretty hard with other companies to offer the best service.

We understand that sometimes, downloading a game is a looooong waiting, so we'd like to offer, via our client, the chance to play ANY GAME, without the download, via our cloud server.

 

 

 

We need money to hire some employees, buy the servers, and close some contracts with some big companies.

For every donation higher 20$, you'll get a code to redeem 2 months of free playing, for 40$ you'll get 4 months, etc...

If you just donate 1$, don't worry!, every $ is great!

The Impact

We are working to become one of the greatest companies offering games all over the planet, and we'd like to grow, to give you the chance to save loads of money playing games!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, don't worry!

Just send this page to your friends and anyone!

 

Our website:

http://www.worldgamingconect.com/index.html

story:
World, Meet Joe. Joe, meet the world.

About Me:

You can find my profession profile here: www.linkedin.com/pub/benjamin-hayward/9a/2b2/20/

The Story:

It's all a misunderstanding.

Joe was asleep when the manly-est bomb was dropped as a means to end all war. Instead it turned all the cows into zombies. The bomb turned his burrito to gold, which the cows want.

Joe thinks the cows want to eat him. The cows want to ask Joe if they can have his Golden Burrito. "Excuse me sir, may we have your Golden Burrito?" The helicopter cannot rescue Joe because the cows are too close.

The Idea:

TMNT: Secret of the Ooze was released in 1991. In the beginning they are fighting in a toy store. Mike uses a yo yo to defeat some of the bad guys. (3:00 min mark)

www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVfgS_iexf0

Then came Equilibrium in 2002. It introduced us to the Gun Kata.

www.youtube.com/watch?v=A2KJHysK6k8

In 2003 Kill Bill Vol: 1 was released. There is a scene in this movie where Black Momba fights Go Go Yabari. Go Go used a ball and chain as a weapon.

www.youtube.com/watch?v=mfKTrx2X0-Y

In this game we will include all 3 of these examples as one game mechanic.

We are following the success examples of Angry Birds and Candy Crush, but adding our own twist to the finger swiping.

Oh, Joe has the cool factor for using a Yo Yo to defend himself.

Funding-

We are building something awesome, and we want you involved. We are currently bringing $11k of our own funds to this project. This is our commitment to you. This allows us to make the basic game. We need your assistance to make it awesome! Your funds will allow us to add more maps, zombie cow types, more upgrades, better graphics. 

We believe in this so much that we are also setting an all or nothing goal. We will have a basic product in 10 weeks that is playable. Like we said above, we are looking for assistance to make this AWESOME!

How will we spend your trust?

$10000- additional programmers and programming, adding greater maps, more zombies.

By raising $10000 past our goal we can add in the following languages:

  • Chinese
  • Japanese
  • Spanish
  • Afrikaans
  • Russian
  • Arabic
  • German
  • Hindi
By raising $20000 past our goal we can add in the following:
Additional music files for greater enjoyment, more in game features.

By raising $30000 past our goal we can add in the following:
upgraded graphics and animation, additional marketing.

Accountability-

If for some reason this project does not finish, each backer will get copies delivered electronically of all the work we have done. When this project is finished, backers will receive a copy of the software game delivered to their email address according to their contribution level.

One of our goals is to make Yo Yo Joe kid friendly for the age range 5+, and yet still fun and engaging for adults. To do this we are keeping animation violence limited, as we are still using a yo-yo to hit a cow. There is no blood, gore, or heads falling off. Like Joe, our cows are cute. But they are still hungry for Joe's burrito.

Success Likely, but not guarenteed


How do we intend to copy Angry Birds and Candy Crush success? Simple. It starts with the simple finger swiping to solve puzzles for a high score. Angry Birds destroys buildings with different types of birds. More damage = higher score. We destroy cow zombies using different types of yo-yo. More cows destroyed = higher score. Candy Crush lines up multiple candy colors to solve the puzzle. You have to decide the best way to attack the cow zombies to clear the map.

Using the yo yo will allow continuous attacks in different directions keeping players involved in the game. This game mechanic is our greatest sell point.

If you can't contribute funds for any reason, please assist by spreading the word about Yo Yo Joe. We will keep you updated as the building progresses, with artwork and screen shots.

Thank you for your time.

story:
~ Introduction ~

The Shogun's enemies have escaped! As a Ninja, you are tasked to capture them back. But beware! Your rival Ninjas are on the same task!

It's an all-out war to gain the Shogun's favor! Can you capture more enemies than your rivals?

Way of the Ninja: Capture the Shoguns Enemies!  is a card and dice game designed to be played by 1 up to 4 players of ages 12 years and above and can be played for a minimum of 30 minutes and onwards.

The game is designed like a basic Role Playing Game wherein a player goes from location to location, attempting to defeat all enemy bosses while maintaining a set life points, using coins, items, and captured small enemies along the way. The objective of the game is to acquire victory points by defeating as many enemies as you can and reach the end of the game by defeating all bosses hidden inside the enemies pile. At the end of the game, the player or team of players with the most number of victory points wins!


~Features ~

Easy to Setup and Track
---------------------------------------
Each type of cards has different art on their backs and the color of their backs and borders is based on their type so that they can easily be formed into a pile! A Player's life points and coins and even the equipped items durability can easily be tracked with the included tokens and markers, and each player uses their own color of dice!

Customizable Setup
---------------------------------
Having a hard time defeating all bosses and enemies? You can choose how many of which enemies to include in the enemy pile! Want to reduce the number of battle encounters? You can remove some of them from the location pile too! Want to have a lot of coins or life points to start the game with? As long as the quantity of the tokens is sufficient and equal for all players then why not! Customize your Setup to increase or decrease the difficulty and speed of your game play!

Expandable World
-------------------------------
The game is designed to be expandable with new locations to stop by, new enemies to defeat, new items to use and even new mechanics and rules to follow! Each expansion can be added or removed to the core set as desired to add more excitement, speed and difficulty to the game!

Supports Single, Multiple Cooperative and Multiple Competitive  and Team-Based Play
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The game is designed to be played like an adventure game where the player goes from one location to location in their quest to defeat all the hidden bosses in their areas. As such, this game can be played by a single player. The game can also be played cooperatively with 2 or more players.

The game can also become a fun and casual game by playing it competitively with 2 or more players in a free-for-all or team-based play.

Easy to Play but Challenging to Beat
------------------------------------------------------

The Game Play instructions at its core are very easy to follow, so it is very easy to play. But once you start playing, you'll find that deep inside the game, lays a very long and challenging process of beating it. The game does not simply let you defeat the bosses easily as minion enemies have abilities that will prevent you from getting to them when they are around and even punish you when you lose the battle. Pretty soon you'll be struggling to keep your Life Points intact while managing your resources as you pursue the ultimate goal of defeating them all.

Can you do it? Good Luck!


~ Basic Game Play Instructions ~

Each player starts out with a set of Life points and coins.

           

And the cards are grouped face down into a pile and placed into the center of table known as the Center Field.

For each of the player's turns, the player must reveal a Location Card from its pile. The revealed location card can either lead the player to a safe location where they can heal themselves and restock their weapons, or it could lead them to an enemy area where a battle awaits


To Win a battle, The player must beat the revealed enemy cards by getting an attack result equal to or higher than the enemy cards total life points

If the player wins the battle, then they get to keep (defeat) all the revealed enemy cards as their capture. However, If the player loses the battle then they still get to keep (defeat) certain enemies with total life points lower than their attack result by following the rules and their card abilities. The undefeated enemy cards returns to the bottom of the enemies pile after imposing any penalties they have on the player

Be careful! Losing a battle will reduce the player's Life Points by 1. Other card actions or effects may cause the players Life Points to reduce by 1 too.


After revealing a location and doing their required actions, the player will now have the opportunity to return (release) some of their captured Enemy Cards back to the bottom of the Enemies Pile to gain their value in coins or keep them until the end of the game to gain their value in Victory Points.

The player turn ends after the player returns the revealed cards in the center field back to the bottom of their respective piles.

The game continues until one of the following conditions has been met:
The players have managed to reveal and defeat all Boss Enemy Cards in the Enemies Pile

                      

                                                  OR
One of the players have their life points reduced to 0

                    


In a Single Player or  a  2 - 4 player Cooperative Game, defeating all the Boss Enemy Cards will count as an automatic win and losing all Life Points counts as a loss. But, in a 2 - 4 player Competitive Game, the player with the most number of Victory Points wins! To compute for the total number of Victory Points, The player must add the Victory Points from all of their defeated enemy cards then add it to the equivalent Victory Points of their remaining active Life Points at 5 Victory Points each. If a tie has occurred, then the number of coins the players have will determine the winner of the game.




~Try the Game now for Free!!! ~

Did the Introduction and game play piqued your interest? Do you want to try the game first for yourself and with your friends? No problem!  The Print-and-Play PDF file and the Manual for the core set is freely available to download in our website! Visit our website at http://www.wayoftheninja.url.ph

You can also play the game on your PC offline, by email or online with your friends by using our VASSAL Module, You can download the VASSAL module by going to the wiki page at http://www.vassalengine.org/wiki/Module:Way_of_the_Ninja:_Capture_the_Shoguns_Enemies!


~About the Campaign~

Everyone has a dream of creating something that they want to share to everybody. Some invented machines, for others a new way to do things! For me, I ever since my childhood days, I dreamed of making a game!

I started this project several months ago when I first found the drawings that I have commissioned from an artist a few years ago these drawings were a part of my plan to create a simple card game about Ninjas. From the way I said it, it's like I'm saying that I don't have artistic talents. Well, it's true because the fascination I have with games is not at  their artwork but at their rules and their game play.

Working on a super small budget my old and weak laptop on hand and the inspiration from my loving wife and baby boy, I decided to put my whole body forward to make it happen. I hope your financial support will push me even further to reaching my dream.


~Where the Project is Now~

The project is now at a point where the core game set and the first 2  (out of 6) expansions are complete. I am yet to do an introductory and instructional video before I could have the videos posted in the manufacturer's site.

But at that point I can only show you a playable Print-And-Play prototype in the videos and the action shots as the cost of producing a single final product, much more if it's shipped to my location country would break my budget.


~Who are working on this project~

My Current Team

Me and My Family - I am a systems developer by work and now a game designer by hobby. And this is my first but hopefully not my last project. And with me is my loving wife baby boy! They give me my inspiration whenever I'm down and the drive to push me towards the completion of this project.
Karla Ortega - My Illustrator! She currently helps me with the drawings while I work on the coloring. If there are any cards that need a drawing (especially the ones in the contributor tier) then she's the girl on the job.

And the people helping or who have helped me along the way

 Ryan Vincent - I started my project with the Ninja drawings that he originally drew for me years ago but I have lost contact with him since then... Wherever you are man, Thanks! ^_^

Kikz Millares - He drew the original 3 enemies when I was starting with my first ever prototype. Without his initial drawings, my ideas will not materialize at all. Thanks! ^_^

Ellina Suhandy - She improved the enemy drawings I had and made the game even more attractive to play with. Her work for me made me more confident in meeting and outsourcing more people with the art that I need to be done.  


The Game Crafter (TGC) is the world’s first web-to-print game publishing company and offers a print on demand game publishing service.The Game Crafter was founded by JT Smith, Tavis Parker, and Jamie Vrbsky. Honestly, without these guys, it would be near impossible for me to make and even produce my own game! I salute you! ^_^

 

                      And finally... you! Yes, YOU!!

                                                  

                             I need your help  ^_^


~Why Do I Need Help?~

I need your help by backing my campaign so that I could finish up all the expansions that I have lined up for the game (I lined up about 5 going to 6 with 2 expansions already completed)  For this, I need to commission more artworks and a better machine to do more work for this project.  As it is now, I'm doing this project faster whenever I have free time at the office using an i7 laptop.

Also, I need your help to make my game known to more people out there. I want my game to be played and shared with everybody. And so, if more people know more about my game and after creating all of my lined up expansions, I am planning to create a digital version of it so that I could spread it out to everybody in every possible format available.

With the possible total of 4000$ funding, the amount will be spread around like this:

7% - Service Fees from IndieGoGo and Paypal

64% - Perk Fulfillment (Includes Shipping)

22% - The procurement for a better machine for future developments

   7% - Commissioning for Artwork for the new Expansions,  Sending out my game     to review sites etc...

And If the funding exceeded the funding goal then the more budget will be added to the art commissioning, game reviews and promotion for the game


~Perks For your Support~

For your support, I have prepared a few perks in return:

  •  Your name will be included in the downloadable game manual and in the game's website as one of our supporters - This is available to all tiers
  • The Print-And-Play PDF copy of the expansion "The Fortune Teller"  - This Print-And-Play version is usually available after purchasing the actual expansion but for this campaign, I am giving it away for free and it is available to all tiers.
  • A PDF Copy of the games artwork in a form of a coloring book format - This is great for those who have kids with coloring materials. This is available to tiers $5 and up
  • A video shout out of thanks to your name. and this video will be inserted into the Introductory and Instructional Game play video of my game - This available to that very special person who would gladly select the Dearest Supporter tier.
  • A single physical copy of the core set of the game - For those who will avail the Supporter and Contributor tier. A single copy of the game contains the following components:

           

  • A minimum of 1 up to 90 additional cards custom made by you and others who availed the Contributor tier - Have a specific Location, Enemy, Item, Event, or Ally card in mind that would spice up the game? Then I am inviting you to become a game contributor! Avail this tier and send in your idea to us and we will convert your idea into a card. Your submission will then be grouped together with other 89 contributors' submission to form the additional cards that will be included with your availed core set. Aside from that, your name will be included in the downloadable game manual and in our website as one of our games contributor with your name also appearing at the bottom of the card that you have created. Have more than one submission? You can also submit them if you want, but priority will be given to the full 90 contributors first if the slots are all filled up.


~Stretch Goals~

My campaign also offers the following rewards upon reaching a certain amount:

             


Once the first stretch goal is reached, The original game box of size 6.75W x 9L x 1.25H inches and made of 270gsm clay coated card stock will be upgraded to a new game box of 8.5W x 5.25L x 1.5H inches made of chipboard covered with gloss paper. Though it may seem like the original was bigger due to its larger length, The upgraded box is actually larger due to the increase in height.

Once the second stretch goal is reached, the cards for the expansion "the Fortune Teller" will be added on top of the game box upgrade. "The Fortune Teller" Expansion introduces a new type of cards called Events, that when revealed by the player, could lead them either to a total advantage or disadvantage over the game. These cards are revealed whenever the player reveals a Fortune Teller Location. To remove the randomization of events they will reveal, they must reveal a Shrine Location and buy a Good Fortune Item that they can equip to cancel any Bad Fortune Event they reveal and activate the good ones instead. Feeling naughty? The Shrine can also send a Bad Fortune Item towards other players so that they will activate only Bad Fortune Event instead which can only be removed by revealing a Shrine Location themselves. Also, Beware! In this expansion, a new Boss Enemy has appeared and it has an effect of putting you through a Bad Fortune Event when left undefeated!

Once the third stretch goal is reached, the cards from the expansion "The Tavern" will be added on top of the game box upgrade and the already included "The Fortune Teller" Expansion. "The Tavern" expansion introduces a new type of cards called Allies! These cards provide a definite advantage in the game provided that you have some coins to spare to activate their effects. You can immediately hire them without paying or doing any action when you reveal a "The Tavern" Location Card. But choose wisely! They are limited in numbers and you can only have a set of 3 allies at any given time and finally most of them return to their pile immediately once their full effects have been activated.

And finally, once the final stretch goal is reached, that would mean I would have enough funds to commission more artwork especially for the digital game and possibly its other variants that I could develop. Once it is developed I will include every backers name in the games credit roll and I will make the core game freely available to all in all possible platforms.

~Other Things You can Do to Help~

If you want to do some other things to help with the campaign, then please start by spreading out the word to your family and friend and ask them to spread the word out as well until it reaches out to those who want to support us. As thanks, I will put your name up on our website as one of our Volunteer Campaigners.

Volunteer illustrators are welcome to help us on this campaign as well. As thanks, I will put your name up on our website as one of our Volunteer illustrators and also at the bottom of the card you helped drawn with.

And after getting your copies or playing with our Free Print-And-Play PDF Copies or VASSAL Modules, please do not forgot to give us a good word out so that others may know about it and wish to try the game as well.

And even after the campaign ends, everyone is welcome to become a contributor in our community site, to keep the game growing and more enjoyable.

~Challenges and Risks~

The core game, stretch goal expansions and other digital rewards are basically ready and available for production shipping but it may come to a delay if the manufacturer encounters trouble with component stocks which is highly unlikely!

Also, the supporters who will avail the Contributors tier might experience a short delay of reward delivery due to the custom cards that we will create for them, including the artwork, and coloring per card. But, if they have their line arts ready or even digitally drawn and colored for their custom cards then I believe this challenge can be overcome easily. I and my art illustrator are always standing by to do the job and deliver as fast as we can.

~Thank You for Browsing~

We hope that you like our project and eventually support our campaign by availing one of the tiers above.

If you wish to know more about the project, the tiers and the rewards please give us comment and we will do our best to answer your questions.

Please spread out this campaign for others to see by sharing this page in your social networks.

Happy Supporting!!
story_txt:
~ Introduction ~The
 Shogun's enemies have escaped! As a Ninja, you are tasked to capture 
them back. But beware! Your rival Ninjas are on the same task!
It's an all-out war to gain the Shogun's favor! Can you capture more enemies than your rivals?
Way
 of the Ninja: Capture the Shoguns Enemies!  is a card and
 dice game designed to be played by 1 up to 4 players of ages 12 years 
and above and can be played for a minimum of 30 minutes and onwards.
The game is designed like a basic Role Playing Game wherein a player 
goes from location to location, attempting to defeat all enemy bosses 
while maintaining a set life points, using coins, items, and captured 
small enemies along the way. The
 objective of the game is to acquire victory points by defeating as many
 enemies as you can and reach the end of the game by defeating all 
bosses hidden inside the enemies pile. At the end of the game, the 
player or team of players with the most number of victory points wins!
 
~Features ~Easy to Setup and Track---------------------------------------Each type of cards has different art on their backs and the color of their backs and borders is based on their type so that they can easily be formed into a pile! A Player's life points and coins and even the equipped items durability can easily be tracked with the included tokens and markers, and each player uses their own color of dice!Customizable Setup---------------------------------Having
 a hard time defeating all bosses and enemies? You can choose how many 
of which enemies to include in the enemy pile! Want to reduce the number
 of battle encounters? You can remove some of them from the location 
pile too! Want to have a lot of coins or life points to start the game 
with? As long as the quantity of the tokens is sufficient and equal for 
all players then why not! Customize your Setup to increase or decrease 
the difficulty and speed of your game play!Expandable World-------------------------------The
 game is designed to be expandable with new locations to stop by, new 
enemies to defeat, new items to use and even new mechanics and rules to 
follow! Each expansion can be added or removed to the core set as 
desired to add more excitement, speed and difficulty to the game!Supports Single, Multiple Cooperative and Multiple Competitive  and Team-Based Play------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------The game is designed to be played like an adventure game where the player goes from one location to location in their quest to defeat all the hidden bosses in their areas. As such, this game can be played by a single player. The game can also be played cooperatively with 2 or more players.The game can also become a fun and casual game by playing it competitively with 2 or more players in a free-for-all or team-based play.Easy to Play but Challenging to Beat------------------------------------------------------The Game Play instructions at its core are very easy to follow, so it is very easy to play. But once you start playing, you'll find that deep inside the game, lays a very long and challenging process of beating it. The game does not simply let you defeat the bosses easily as minion enemies have abilities that will prevent you from getting to them when they are around and even punish you when you lose the battle. Pretty soon you'll be struggling to keep your Life Points intact while managing your resources as you pursue the ultimate goal of defeating them all.Can you do it? Good Luck!



~ Basic Game Play Instructions ~Each player starts out with a set of Life points and coins.            And the cards are grouped face down into a pile and placed into the center of table known as the Center Field.For
 each of the player's turns, the player must reveal a Location Card from 
its pile. The revealed location card can either lead the player to a 
safe location where they can heal themselves and restock their weapons, 
or it could lead them to an enemy area where a battle awaits To
 Win a battle, The player must beat the revealed enemy cards by getting 
an attack result equal to or higher than the enemy cards total life 
pointsIf the player wins the battle, then they get to keep (defeat) all the revealed enemy cards as their capture. However, If the player loses the battle then they still get to keep (defeat) certain enemies with total life points lower than their attack result by following the rules and their card abilities. The undefeated enemy cards returns to the bottom of the enemies pile after imposing any penalties they have on the playerBe careful! Losing a battle will reduce the player's Life Points by 1. Other card actions or effects may cause the players Life Points to reduce by 1 too.After revealing a location and doing their required actions, the player will now have the opportunity to return (release) some of their captured Enemy Cards back to the bottom of the Enemies Pile to gain their value in coins or keep them until the end of the game to gain their value in Victory Points.The player turn ends after the player returns the revealed cards in the center field back to the bottom of their respective piles.The game continues until one of the following conditions has been met:The players have managed to reveal and defeat all Boss Enemy Cards in the Enemies Pile                                                                         OROne of the players have their life points reduced to 0                     In a Single Player or  a  2 - 4 player Cooperative Game, defeating all the Boss Enemy Cards will count as an automatic win and losing all Life Points counts as a loss. But, in a 2 - 4 player Competitive Game, the player with the most number of Victory Points wins! To compute for the total number of Victory Points, The player must add the Victory Points from all of their defeated enemy cards then add it to the equivalent Victory Points of their remaining active Life Points at 5 Victory Points each. If a tie has occurred, then the number of coins the players have will determine the winner of the game. 
~Try the Game now for Free!!! ~
Did the Introduction and game play piqued your interest? Do you want 
to try the game first for yourself and with your friends? No problem!  
The Print-and-Play PDF file and the Manual for the core set is freely 
available to download in our website! Visit our website at http://www.wayoftheninja.url.ph
You can also play the game on your PC offline, by email or online 
with your friends by using our VASSAL Module, You can download the VASSAL module by going to the wiki page at http://www.vassalengine.org/wiki/Module:Way_of_the_Ninja:_Capture_the_Shoguns_Enemies!
~About the Campaign~Everyone has a dream of creating something that they want to share to everybody. Some invented machines, for others a new way to do things! For me, I ever since my childhood days, I dreamed of making a game!
I started this project several months ago when I first found the drawings that I have commissioned from an artist a few years ago these drawings were a part of my plan to create a simple card game about Ninjas. From the way I said it, it's like I'm saying that I don't have artistic talents. Well, it's true because the fascination I have with games is not at  their artwork but at their rules and their game play. Working on a super small budget my old and weak laptop on hand and the inspiration from my loving wife and baby boy, I decided to put my whole body forward to make it happen. I hope your financial support will push me even further to reaching my dream.
~Where the Project is Now~The project is now at a point where the core game set and the first 2  (out of 6) expansions are complete. I am yet to do an introductory and instructional video before I could have the videos posted in the manufacturer's site. But at that point I can only show you a playable Print-And-Play prototype in the videos and the action shots as the cost of producing a single final product, much more if it's shipped to my location country would break my budget.
~Who are working on this project~My Current Team



Me and My Family - I am a systems developer by work and now a game designer by hobby. And this is my first but hopefully not my last project. And with me is my loving wife baby boy! They give me my inspiration whenever I'm down and the drive to push me towards the completion of this project.



Karla Ortega - My Illustrator! She currently helps me with the drawings while I work on the coloring. If there are any cards that need a drawing (especially the ones in the contributor tier) then she's the girl on the job.


And the people helping or who have helped me along the way



Ryan Vincent - I started my project with the Ninja drawings that he originally drew for me years ago but I have lost contact with him since then... Wherever you are man, Thanks! ^_^




Kikz Millares - He drew the original 3 enemies when I was starting with my first ever prototype. Without his initial drawings, my ideas will not materialize at all. Thanks! ^_^




Ellina Suhandy - She improved the enemy drawings I had and made the game even more attractive to play with. Her work for me made me more confident in meeting and outsourcing more people with the art that I need to be done.   





The Game Crafter (TGC) is the world’s first web-to-print game publishing company and offers a print on demand game publishing service.The Game Crafter was founded by JT Smith, Tavis Parker, and Jamie Vrbsky. Honestly, without these guys, it would be near impossible for me to make and even produce my own game! I salute you! ^_^ 


                       And finally... you! Yes, YOU!!                                                                                I need your help  ^_^

~Why Do I Need Help?~I need your help by backing my campaign so that I could finish up all the expansions that I have lined up for the game (I lined up about 5 going to 6 with 2 expansions already completed)  For this, I need to commission more artworks and a better machine to do more work for this project.  As it is now, I'm doing this project faster whenever I have free time at the office using an i7 laptop.Also, I need your help to make my game known to more people out there. I want my game to be played and shared with everybody. And so, if more people know more about my game and after creating all of my lined up expansions, I am planning to create a digital version of it so that I could spread it out to everybody in every possible format available.With the possible total of 4000$ funding, the amount will be spread around like this:7% - Service Fees from IndieGoGo and Paypal64% - Perk Fulfillment (Includes Shipping)22% - The procurement for a better machine for future developments    7% - Commissioning for Artwork for the new Expansions,  Sending out my game     to review sites etc...And If the funding exceeded the funding goal then the more budget will be added to the art commissioning, game reviews and promotion for the game



~Perks For your Support~For your support, I have prepared a few perks in return: Your name will be included in the downloadable game manual and in the game's website as one of our supporters - This is available to all tiers
The Print-And-Play PDF copy of the expansion "The Fortune Teller"  - This Print-And-Play version is usually available after purchasing the actual expansion but for this campaign, I am giving it away for free and it is available to all tiers.
A PDF Copy of the games artwork in a form of a coloring book format - This is great for those who have kids with coloring materials. This is available to tiers $5 and up

A video shout out of thanks to your name. and this video will be inserted into the Introductory and Instructional Game play video of my game - This available to that very special person who would gladly select the Dearest Supporter tier.
A single physical copy of the core set of the game - For those who will avail the Supporter and Contributor tier. A single copy of the game contains the following components:            
A minimum of 1 up to 90 additional cards custom made by you and others who availed the Contributor tier - Have a specific Location, Enemy, Item, Event, or Ally card in mind that would spice up the game? Then I am inviting you to become a game contributor! Avail this tier and send in your idea to us and we will convert your idea into a card. Your submission will then be grouped together with other 89 contributors' submission to form the additional cards that will be included with your availed core set. Aside from that, your name will be included in the downloadable game manual and in our website as one of our games contributor with your name also appearing at the bottom of the card that you have created. Have more than one submission? You can also submit them if you want, but priority will be given to the full 90 contributors first if the slots are all filled up.



~Stretch Goals~My campaign also offers the following rewards upon reaching a certain amount:              Once the first stretch goal is reached, The original game box of size 6.75W x 9L x 1.25H inches and made of 270gsm clay coated card stock will be upgraded to a new game box of 8.5W x 5.25L x 1.5H inches made of chipboard covered with gloss paper. Though it may seem like the original was bigger due to its larger length, The upgraded box is actually larger due to the increase in height.Once the second stretch goal is reached, the cards for the expansion "the Fortune Teller" will be added on top of the game box upgrade. "The Fortune Teller" Expansion introduces a new type of cards called Events, that when revealed by the player, could lead them either to a total advantage or disadvantage over the game. These cards are revealed whenever the player reveals a Fortune Teller Location. To remove the randomization of events they will reveal, they must reveal a Shrine Location and buy a Good Fortune Item that they can equip to cancel any Bad Fortune Event they reveal and activate the good ones instead. Feeling naughty? The Shrine can also send a Bad Fortune Item towards other players so that they will activate only Bad Fortune Event instead which can only be removed by revealing a Shrine Location themselves. Also, Beware! In this expansion, a new Boss Enemy has appeared and it has an effect of putting you through a Bad Fortune Event when left undefeated!Once the third stretch goal is reached, the cards from the expansion "The Tavern" will be added on top of the game box upgrade and the already included "The Fortune Teller" Expansion. "The Tavern" expansion introduces a new type of cards called Allies! These cards provide a definite advantage in the game provided that you have some coins to spare to activate their effects. You can immediately hire them without paying or doing any action when you reveal a "The Tavern" Location Card. But choose wisely! They are limited in numbers and you can only have a set of 3 allies at any given time and finally most of them return to their pile immediately once their full effects have been activated.And finally, once the final stretch goal is reached, that would mean I would have enough funds to commission more artwork especially for the digital game and possibly its other variants that I could develop. Once it is developed I will include every backers name in the games credit roll and I will make the core game freely available to all in all possible platforms.
~Other Things You can Do to Help~
If you want to do some other things to help with the campaign, then please start by spreading out the word to your family and friend and ask them to spread the word out as well until it reaches out to those who want to support us. As thanks, I will put your name up on our website as one of our Volunteer Campaigners.Volunteer illustrators are welcome to help us on this campaign as well. As thanks, I will put your name up on our website as one of our Volunteer illustrators and also at the bottom of the card you helped drawn with.And after getting your copies or playing with our Free Print-And-Play PDF Copies or VASSAL Modules, please do not forgot to give us a good word out so that others may know about it and wish to try the game as well.And even after the campaign ends, everyone is welcome to become a contributor in our community site, to keep the game growing and more enjoyable. 
~Challenges and Risks~The core game, stretch goal expansions and other digital rewards are basically ready and available for production shipping but it may come to a delay if the manufacturer encounters trouble with component stocks which is highly unlikely!Also, the supporters who will avail the Contributors tier might experience a short delay of reward delivery due to the custom cards that we will create for them, including the artwork, and coloring per card. But, if they have their line arts ready or even digitally drawn and colored for their custom cards then I believe this challenge can be overcome easily. I and my art illustrator are always standing by to do the job and deliver as fast as we can. 
~Thank You for Browsing~We hope that you like our project and eventually support our campaign by availing one of the tiers above. If you wish to know more about the project, the tiers and the rewards please give us comment and we will do our best to answer your questions.Please spread out this campaign for others to see by sharing this page in your social networks.Happy Supporting!!

story:
The ETIKONS

Desmond "Etika" Amofah tragically took his own life on June 19th, 2019. The Etikons are a way to honor his legacy while putting a lasting product into the hands of his fans, and raising a ton of money for mental health and suicide prevention awareness.  

 

The Design

The design shown is what we expect the joy-con shells to look like when complete. Please keep in mind these designs are not final and subject to change. This is a hand made mock-up, not factory made, and will likely have variations from a factory produced version. We expect that the factory produced version will not have the black and white lines wrap around the sides, and instead only have them on the front, in a similar fashion to the Smash Bros joy-cons. Once we get factory samples, we will include those photos. 

 

We can all have an impact

While i've been making custom controllers and joy-cons for many years now, it's simply not feasible for me to take on such a large scale project on my own while donating the proceeds to charity. In order for this project to be a success, it needs to be outsourced to drastically reduce the cost (and my personal workload). 

  • - The joy-con shells will be manufactured in China - unless we can't find a suitable manufacturer. At this time we are still searching for the best manufacturer for the job. In the event that we are unable to find a reliable manufacturer overseas, we can complete the job right here in the USA, but this will incur additional costs and require additional time.  

 

  • - Options for pre-assembled joy-cons will be offered post campaign. Campaign backers will only receive joy-con shells to install on their own joy-cons with the campaign, unless they upgrade afterwards.

 

For Charity

By reaching our initial goal of $65,000, a MINIMUM of $40,000 will be donated to charity. 

We've chosen the JED Foundation as our charity of choice for the following reasons:

  • -Focus on teens and young adults

 

  • -Focuses on BOTH suicide prevention awareness and mental health

 

  • -Located in NY, where Etika was from

 

  • -Rated 4 stars on Charity Navigator with a 100% accountability & transparency rating 

 

Pledge Options

Joy-Con Shells: 

Every pledge in this campaign is for a single set of joy-con shells. These shells must be self installed on a pair of joy-cons that you already own. Want more than one set of shells? No problem! Once you select your pledge, you'll be able to select additional shell sets as an add-on option at checkout! Each shell set comes with a left and right joy-con shell (one black and one white) 

Full Joy-cons: 

While full joy-cons are not an option during the campaign, you will be able to upgrade your shells in the post campaign to full joy-cons. What does this mean? If you back the campaign you are "purchasing" a set of joy-con shells, along with your donation to JED Foundation. If you cannot install the shells your self, or would just like a new set of fully assembled Etika joy-cons, you will be able to UPGRADE your pledge to Full Joy-cons. This can ONLY be done in the post campaign - NOT during the standard campaign. You MUST PLEDGE FOR A SET OF SHELLS TO BE ELIGIBLE. If you do not pledge towards the campaign, you will not be able to upgrade to a full set of joy-cons, and a full set of Etika joy-cons will not be available at any other time, outside of this campaign. The price to upgrade will be $85 - the price of joy-cons plus tax - and none of the upgrade funds will be eligible for donation (it's being spent on the purchase of the joy-cons at retail price). 

If you still have questions please contact before backing the campaign. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk involved in this campaign is the manufacturing process. While we are still searching for a manufacturer overseas, we are confident we will be able to find a suitable company. In the event that we are unable to find a suitable representative overseas, we already have motions in place to complete the project right here in the USA. While this would cause a significant increase in the amount of time the project takes to complete, the project WILL be complete.

In the event that for some reason the project cannot be completed, each and every backer will have the option for a full refund or to have their pledge donated to JED Foundation without a reward. 

 

Pricing and Cost Breakdown

The price of each pledge is $65. This is for one set of joy-con shells, left and right. 

Breakdown per item: 

10% (Approximately $6.50) - Indiegogo and Backerkit Fees

25% (Approximately $16.25) - Production Fees

65% (Approximately $42.25) - Charitable Donation to the JED Foundation

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Let everyone you know, know about the campaign! Every voice matters!

 

  • You can donate directly to the JED Foundation in Etikas name if you're unable to pledge for a reward!

 

*** NOTE: THIS FUNDRAISING CAMPAIGN IS IN NO WAY AFFILIATED OR ASSOCIATED WITH NINTENDO OF AMERICA OR ANY OF ITS PARTIES, THIS CAMPAIGN DOES NOT SEEK TO INFRINGE ON ANY COPYRIGHTS OR TRADEMARKS HELD BY NINTENDO. NINTENDO CONTINUES TO RESERVE ALL RIGHTS TO ITS PROPERTIES. THE CAMPAIGN REWARDS ARE NOT INFRINGING ON NINTENDO IP AND ONLY SEEK TO RAISE MONEY FOR CHARITY WHILE OFFERING A PRODUCT COMPATIBLE WITH THE NINTENDO SWITCH

story:
BURNING CRUSADE CLASSIC FEATURES

As with any expansion, Burning Crusade Classic brings with it a variety of content for players to explore. Through the launch and over the course of content updates to follow, players will discover:

New Lands to Explore: Step through the Dark Portal and into Outland.

Two New Playable Races: Fight for the Horde as the blood elves, seeking a new source of arcane power or join the Alliance as the draenei, exiles from Outland in search of a new home.

Arenas: Assemble allies and prove your PvP prowess in 2v2, 3v3, or 5v5 combat in Arenas such as the Ring of Trials and the Circle of Blood.

Flying Mounts: Take flight in the chaotic skies of Netherstorm and soar over fel-touched Shadowmoon Valley with the introduction of flying mounts in Outland.

Master Challenging Raids and Dungeons: Conquer 5-player dungeons and Heroic dungeons set in the crystalline fortress of Tempest Keep, or raid the haunted halls of 10-player Karazhan as you gear up over time for a climactic confrontation against Kil’jaeden in 25-player Sunwell Plateau.

Jewelcrafting: Carve gems of power to socket into players’ gear with the Jewelcrafting profession.

Aldor and Scryer Factions: Choose between the Aldor or Scryer factions in Shattrath and earn their unique rewards

 Create a paladin on the Horde or a shaman on the Alliance.

Level to 70 and gain new class abilities and more.

Master Challenging Raids and Dungeons: Conquer 5-player dungeons and Heroic dungeons set in the crystalline fortress of Tempest Keep, or raid the haunted halls of 10-player Karazhan as you gear up over time for a climactic confrontation against Kil’jaeden in 25-player Sunwell Plateau.
Jewelcrafting: Carve gems of power to socket into players’ gear with the Jewelcrafting profession.

story:
(Edit note: since the campaign did not do so well to start, I will be moving this over to Patreon to do smaller bit size amounts for more users. Thanks again.  http://www.patreon.com/MichaelSpaceJam)

The site itself is already build really, which is the easy part, the hard part is actually spending the hours/day/weeks to do all the data entry for every game that needs to be listed. As you might imagine, this is a huge task that needs to be strictly controlled so that fair and accurate information is posted.

But to do this in the timely manner that is relevant to gamers, I will need to step down from other site projects and devote a majority of time to this. $5000 would basically allow me to go full force for the next 3 months, entering the data needed for gamers to get the information they deserve about the products they care about. Up and running for the start of the new year. Site demo can be found at Mukyou.com
story_txt: (Edit note: since the campaign did not do so well to start, I will be moving this over to Patreon to do smaller bit size amounts for more users. Thanks again.  http://www.patreon.com/MichaelSpaceJam)The site itself is already build really, which is the easy part, the hard part is actually spending the hours/day/weeks to do all the data entry for every game that needs to be listed. As you might imagine, this is a huge task that needs to be strictly controlled so that fair and accurate information is posted. But to do this in the timely manner that is relevant to gamers, I will need to step down from other site projects and devote a majority of time to this. $5000 would basically allow me to go full force for the next 3 months, entering the data needed for gamers to get the information they deserve about the products they care about. Up and running for the start of the new year. Site demo can be found at Mukyou.com

story:
Pyxa is an Arduino-compatible DIY game console.

Pyxa comes as an all-inclusive do-it-yourself kit allowing users to build their game console and create their own video games whilst learning about coding.

 

 

During the assembly, users will get familiar with each component of a game console and explore their functions. Assembly is fairly simple and does not require any tools or special skills. No soldering is required.

 

 

Resolution of Pyxa is 128 x 160 pixels and it is capable of displaying full 18-bit colour. Pyxa is based on ATmega328P processor, and it accommodates a micro SD card socket for displaying bitmap images and a buzzer to add sound to your video games. 

Rechargeable battery has 600 mAh storage, which will provide at least 4 hours of non-stop gaming.

 

 

Once done with the assembly, users can start coding with Arduino Software (IDE). Our educational guide is aimed at new beginners and will take you through every step of creating a video game. Alternatively, you can simply download the video games we have already created, upload them to your Pyxa and start playing!

 

 

Pyxa is a great way for everyone to learn about programming algorithms and game development. With Pyxa, you can create your own video games from scratch, replicate any retro video games you like or make storytelling games by using actual images.

 

 

Explore how a game console works, create your own video games, and share them with your friends.

Pyxa, by Creoqode.

 

 

Below is the unedited video of Pyxa that is ready to go into production.

 

 

 
RISKS & CHALLENGES

 

As Creoqode, we are in the market for more than two years now and gained a valuable experience about manufacturing, packing, customer service and international shipping. We are already in touch with manufacturers for Pyxa and arranged the production. Pyxa can get into production straight after the funds are received. As the founder of Creoqode, I strongly believe that risks involved for on time delivery of Pyxa will be extremely unlikely.

However, it would be fair to note that we will be shipping the product globally, and the taxation, customs duties and other regulations might be different across some countries which might cause some minor delays. However, Creoqode team has extensively researched global delivery of Pyxa and partnered up with DHL in order to preempt any challenges we may face. Additionally, we have set the delivery date as June 2019 leaving us plenty of time to ensure on-time delivery.

Additionally, we will be putting all our effort to prepare detailed and easy to follow tutorials for hardware, assembly and coding. However, after the delivery of Pyxa, some users might still have questions regarding technical aspects of the product or might require assistance, which Creoqode help desk formed of 3 programmers and 2 electrical engineers will be able to answer immediately. We are all prepared for you to have an exciting and smooth experience with Pyxa.

For any enquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@creoqode.com

story:
Campaign is now closed! 

- Thanks to all the ones who helped us get so far you are all golden!  


Hi, thanks for your support to our Radiance :: Lux Prima campaign.  Due to an unexpected situation we've been forced to end our crowd-sourcing campaign. 

We've initiated the refund process.  Thank you very much and we hope to count with your support in the future.  

Sincerely, 

- First Light Studios








Thanks a lot for taking your time to check out our project! We hope that you may find our game offering interesting enough as to grant us your support! Without further ado, here is our latest venture! 



Radiance :: Lux Prima -   - is our vision of a classic "Beat em up" game brought to our newest generation. Here at First Light Studios we strongly believe that this is a genre still worth exploring. Not bound by technological difficulties from the past generations that gave birth to the genre we consider there are a few interesting elements to be revisited while staying true to the classic idea and concept behind Beat em up games; That said, we also feel confident that we can bring the genre up to the latest generation's graphics, animations, special effects and overall quality that has become paramount to the enhancement of the player's experience. As gamers turned into developers ourselves, nothing is more important to us than to honor the soul of the game in the process.

When we set out on our development journey we took inspiration from the classics such as Golden Axe and Streets of Rage, TMNT:Turtles in time to name a few and also from modern ones like Phantom Breaker.  Our main objective is to refresh classic gameplay in an up to date fashion and to deliver experiences you can enjoy with your friends and/or family.



Its been awhile since we started establishing and blocking out some of the core game elements. The result so far is a concept prototype we have built for you to download and try. We opted to give you access to this early content so that you may better understand our vision and also so that you can give us your valuable feedback. During our campaign the demo will receive regular updates as we further evolve the experience. So please don't hesitate to give us your thoughts and wants for we are certain that together Radiance will become an incredible journey.  

You can get our early concept prototype at Game Jolt Now! 
(Click to Download Windows version - gamejolt.com)


First Light Studios is located on the beautiful island of Puerto Rico : 

Our group is composed of passionate gamers such as yourself that long for a more classic and challenging experience. We have fought hard to achieve our dream of creating a company dedicated to the soul of a game. Unfortunately there's a limit to what we can do without support and so here we are, asking for your help to allow us to make that goal a reality, to help us create games born out of passion. 
To help share our vision we invite you to try our early concept prototype in hopes that you may want to play Radiance :: Lux Prima as much as we do and in the process share new memories and feelings that will stay with us for years to come.




The reason we opted a Flexible Founding campaign is fairly simple, that's because we are already committed to finish Radiance as one of our Studio's primarily goals. The game will be released as an 'episodic' game saga, thus our main focus is delivering the First Chapter.  With that being said, the better the results of the campaign, the more you'll empower us to make a better game.    

We just want to make it as awesome as we possibly can, but we acknowledge there's only so much we can do without your help!  



Our Heroes 
Early Concept Outline (quick-ink) :  Aegis the Warrior

Rough 3D Blockout - Blender : 

Final Texturing / Refining Work - Substance Painter :

 Final In-Game Quality - Unity Game Engine :

If you do have PC (Windows only for now) and want to take a look in real time we do have a Unity PC Build for you to download and see how do you like it in real-time.  The music you can hear on it is original sound music for Radiance :: Lux Prima
(Click to Download - Aegis Turn Table - Unity PC Viewer)

The making of the most recent game assets, we are utilizing the latest in texturing software - like Allegorithmic Substance Painter in order to provide top quality visual content. 


 Early Concept Outline :  Altemisa the Ranger


Early Concept Outline :  Hayter the Mage


Our Heroes' Pets
Early Concept Outline :  Pets



The Enemies
The Assassin Goblin  : 

Weapon of choice is the Dagger :


The Bomber Goblin :

Weapon of choice are the Pumpkinades' : 


The Golem (A slow but lethal heavy weight weapon on his own) : 



Concept Beauty Illustrations by Artist Jose Vega
The Light Tree - Jubar :


The Radiance (Burning) Village : 


The Portal : 


The Gate :


Gameplay Screen Shots



 

 

75,000 - "Because You Deserve It" - Chapter One is free for everyone who contributed  on the funding of this campaign. 

85,000 - "We Love to Evolve and Improve" - Leveling Up and Inventory Systems 

100,000 - "How Did it Happen" - Single Player Campaign and Individual Character Stories. 

120,000 - "We Could Use an Extra Hand" - Additional Playable Character. 

200,000 - "We Love Our Pets!" - Robust Pet System with its own Ai, Inventory, Leveling Up and Care Systems.

300,000 - "We Know no Bounds" - Online Multiplayer 

400,000 - "You Own This" - Free Full Game - ALL Chapters Included + 3 Extra Copies so you can Share with your Friends + Free DLC to all campaign funding contributors.


Funds raised during this campaign will be strictly distributed on game development, soundtrack and development team's salaries in order to sustain full time work. 


Risks & Challenges


There is little to no risks of not finishing our game, that's because we've already committed to finishing this game no matter what.  However, should the campaign not be successful it would take much longer for us to achieve our goals and we would be forced to release our game with fewer features than what we originally envisioned.
