story:
UPDATE

First live stream:


Campaign is closed

It is obvious, that we will not be able to meet our goal. There are numerous reasons for that and some of them is our fault too, but we could not change it much, since the campaign had started. 

Still we are going to survive according our Plan "B" ;) Please, register on our site: lifeisfeudal.com and wait for additional news. Second stream containing some combat moments of our Sandbox MMORPG is going to be soon. Stay tuned!



old campaign text:

We are thrilled that you have decided to check out our game project LIFE IS FEUDAL, and we are excited to have the opportunity to explain to you what we are trying to achieve! Everyone on our team are highly experienced gamers, and we just can’t get enough of hardcore MMORPG games! 

Almost 3 years ago we decided to build our own online world, in which players could immersive themselves in a highly realistic medieval environment, and so LIFE IS FEUDAL was born. Being huge MMORPG fans, and being fans of medieval-themed titles, a realistic medieval scenario was an easy choice for us as a setting.

Although our team doesn’t have a large rolodex of past titles, LIFE IS FEUDAL comes from the heart. The quality of our current game is a testament to our commitment and love for what we do, and if anyone doubts that a start-up team can accomplish the impossible and build a large and vast MMORPG, check out LIFE IS FEUDAL! For the past 3 years we have worked very hard and diligently on putting together the most impressive PC Sandbox MMORPG. 

We have come incredibly far, but need your support! We have reached a point where additional external funding is required for us to complete the development and release our game, and we spent many nights and days weighing our options. Ultimately, because LIFE IS FEUDAL is for gamers built by gamers, the decision to get the gaming community (You!) involved in the continued development of our project was an easy one to make.


Set in a highly realistic environment, LIFE IS FEUDAL challenges you to go back in time and discover living medieval life. Your objective is not only to survive, but to find a way to prosper, build, or join an existing community. How would you fend for yourself? Where would you live? 

How would you defend against and fight off other players and predators from the wild? Will you establish, or will you join a peaceful community, and would you even if you could? 

Perhaps you are the Mercenary type looking for solitude and isolated living. Become a conqueror. Or a wanderer. The choice is ultimately yours, and LIFE IS FEUDAL offers you the freedom to create your own destiny and challenges you to thrive and survive.


LIFE IS FEUDAL can be summarized as a massive Sandbox PC MMORPG with advanced features catering to gamers looking for the ultimate online gaming experience! Set in a vast and realistic medieval environment, the game offers a large persistent seamless world, in which its players can freely roam and participate.

While LIFE IS FEUDAL is free-to-play, its full potential can only be experienced by acquiring a license (buy-to-play). Players are allowed to explore and roam a free continent almost without restrictions, giving a sense of the games full scope, complexity, and gameplay.


LIFE IS FEUDAL offer a host of incredible features making our game truly unique! It offer something for everyone, and the diverse and varied gameplay is enhanced by our continued commitment to adding new and cool stuff over time! Backers of this campaign will enjoy unlimited hours of adventuring, and very few players will ever be good enough, or skilled enough, to explore the rich and massive environment! Here is a quick breakdown of our games main features:

  • Massive Seamless Open-Ended World. LIFE IS FEUDAL features a massive 441 square kilometer open seamless world! Our game has island-like continent with different biomes such as plain, dense forest, steppe, desert, tundra and marsh, for example. All of the terrain is untouched nature inviting players to settle or invade! The continent is scattered with rivers, lakes and bays, and even has a roaring volcano!
  • Free Terraforming & Tunnel Building. LIFE IS FEUDAL features 100% free terraforming and tunnel building! Dig tunnels, mines and moats, and expand them in all dimensions almost without limitations! You can raise and lower ground levels with a land-fall effect. Substances include soil, rock, granite, ore veins, clay, sand, and many more!
  • Free Modular & Predefined Construction of Buildings & Objects. LIFE IS FEUDAL features more than 100 buildings and objects! Most buildings can be placed anywhere with free rotation and are predefined. Fortifications are modular allowing you to design and build your own unique castles with pattern, towers, gates etc. You can even place palisade walls and fences.
  • Rich Crafting System. LIFE IS FEUDAL features a crafting system with more than 500 recipes, including but not limited to mining, smelting, forging, logging, carpentry, construction, masonry, architecture, farming, taming, procuration, cooking, tailoring, fishing and hunting! Crafting is enriched through clever use of mini-games.
  • Almost Unlimited Number of Unique Alchemy Combinations. LIFE IS FEUDAL features over 40 billion alchemy combinations unique to each player! And unlike other online games you need to learn, experiment and create your very own unique combinations. Alchemy is not just a matter of character skill, as it has strong emphasis on players spending time and resources on creating good recipes and combinations.
  • Innovative Mini-Games Concept. LIFE IS FEUDAL features a plethora of mini-games that adds immersion and fun to the medieval crafting process, and allows gamers to play isolated parts of the game directly from a browser! Mini-Games offer an opportunity to improve on a given craft, and rewards players with bonuses.
  • A No-target Combat System. LIFE IS FEUDAL features an advanced no target combat system, where combat can be experienced in either 1st or 3rd person view. There is no lock-on, and players must carry out individual actions such as swing, stab and block, for example. 
  • Physics-Based Melee & Ranged Combat. Physics come into play as well, as does the quickness of the attacker and defender. A swift use of a sword at a high velocity causes extensive damage.
  • Realistic Player Damage System. With fractures and bleeding wounds you can create different unique combat tactics.
  • Full Loot. Added thrill and excitement of your adventures! Also when players die, loss of skill occurs by an alignment factor at random.
  • Skillcap & Statcap Systems. These will allow you to make almost any combination of skills that you think you need to have. You can design your own unique class and be like no one else in our world. That is the spirit of a true Sandbox!
  • Private Property & Land Claims. Grab some land for yourself or for your guild too. Divine law will protect your property standing on the claim from aggressors.
  • Complex Food & Cooking System. Cooking is no longer a secondary or non-existent skill. Being a good cook, who knows a lot of complex and tasty recipes, means that you and your friends or clients will be better fed and will have a skill raise bonuses!
  • Great selection of Medieval Weapons with Unique Combos & Effects. Up to 55 different medieval tools of killing and hurting. With their own combinations of directional attacks that will cause some harmful effects on your opponent, like knockdown, fracture, bleeding wound, crippled movement and many others!
  • Great selection of Tools that can be used as Militia Weapons! If you got jumped by some ragged bandit in the middle of your crops field, smash his face with a shovel! That will teach him a lesson.
  • Double Health & Stamina Bars. Double health and stamina bars represents your body status better. Players can be knocked out or dead, can be temporary out of breath or totally exhausted.
  • Original Battle Formation System. In massive battles, react accordingly to the combat situation and provide your Unit with a certain bonuses. But to receive these bonuses Unit members must be well organized and always keep formation.
  • Innovative Battle System. Battles will happen on an instanced server, without interference of 3rd parties, without senseless obstacles and with full statistic records. That is how history of feudal wars will be tracked!
  • Classic Siege System. As you have seen it in many other online games. Massive clash of players for a one certain castle.
  • Wild Animals Tracking & Hunting. You can find different tracks of different animals and follow them.

Our feature list is one of the most impressive and extensive for any MMORPG ever to be developed, and includes the very best from existing online games as well as some new, innovative, and groundbreaking additions never before seen! What follows is a brief description of the main features, and throughout the campaign we will provide updates with in-depth information and extensive details giving our backers full insight and clarity of our plans for LIFE IS FEUDAL.


LIFE IS FEUDAL has a tentative official release date of 2015, but this is subject to change and does not mean the game will not be available to download and play online a long time before that! The truth is, we plan to have an early ALPHA available right after successful finish of this campaign, and next year in 2014, there will be additional content and features added to the game, taking it to the BETA level. 

Supporters of LIFE IS FEUDAL can gain early exclusive access to playable code by pledging to some of our perk options outlined on the right side of this page. Developing a MMORPG is an everlasting process and never truly ends. But we strive to make as much content and as many features available as quickly as possible, especially because feedback and support is important.

Payment model is planned to be a B2P. Players will be able to download and enter game for free and will appear on a newbie island. While suffering different limitations, they will be able to test all of game mechanics and most of it features. And if they feel confident enough to leave safe newbie island and dive into the real medieval life on the main Continent, they will have to pay only once.


So what do you get for helping us? First of all, a heartwarming feeling that you have helped in creating a new, unique sandbox MMORPG to life! That feeling will be extended into game, giving you a slight sense of nobility.

Please, consider inspecting our rewards:


Credits

We will place you name and/or nickname in the Hall of Fame of our game on the website and the in-game credits page. Many years from now you will be able to tell your children that you helped trigger a new era of sandbox games. :)

Titles

Game Supporter, Proud Game Supporter, “Untouchable Game Supporter”. These titles will be available to all of your characters, so other players can observe them and feel how pathetic they are :). Also, if you choose the “Untouchable Game Supporter” Title to be visible and you are murdered by some PvP hungry outlaw, that outlaw will suffer a slightly higher alignment hit. That will teach him to avoid killing great supporters like you! ;)

Game purchase

Starting from a “well” reward tier you will be considered as a buyer of our game. That will give your characters a free ticket on a ship to the Main continent from the Newbie Island. Other players will have to spend real currency to buy these tickets.

Access to closed forum section

Way to effect on our Lore by taking active part in debates on the main continent and starting city names. Also, you will have access to alpha/beta tester forums and read their reviews, in case you were not lucky enough to get into earlier tests.

Increased “Authority” skill

This skill allow you to claim land for your personal control to build your own cozy farm, garden or bandit camp. Skill progression will be based on the amount of time you successfully maintain that claim. Players with this reward will have an increased base amount of the skill. This will allow them to claim significantly more land at the start of open Beta tests and at release!

Early access to the closed Alpha/Beta Tests

For all of you who cannot wait and want to dive into our medieval massive sandbox world, that is the right rewards for you.

Instant Closed Alpha Access - as soon as our campaign will be successfully finished, you will be able to download our client and join the alpha testing

Closed Alpha II Phase Access - aprox. in 2 month after the start of Closed Alpha tests

Closed Alpha III Phase Access - aprox. in 2 month after the start of Closed Alpha II tests

Closed Beta I Phase Access - date strongly depends on success of our campaign, extra funds we might get and overall amount of problems that needs to be solved during Alpha tests. As a rough estimate, that should be a Summer/Fall of 2014

Closed Beta II Phase Access - aprox. in 2 month after the start of Closed Beta tests

Keep in mind that early access will be provided to the Alpha/Beta testing phases, so please, be prepared to some glitches and bugs and report them on the way. The more reports you will do - the faster we will fix them.

Real Estate Rental

Starting City will be an only safe place in an endless storm of feudal life happening around it. Our backers will be able to claim land in city protected radius, which will guarantee protection of their assets in any circumstances! Aside from that, certain backers will have an estate property behind city walls that will be free of rent for first 6 month of Open Beta and Release. That property can be used freely, as for aesthetic purposes, as your bind point or simply to stash your belongings.

Keep in mind that we will let you choose any house out of the same types, but those who had backed first will be picking those houses first. So be fast with that, or you might end up with only some variants in slum district of Starting City ;)

Starting City view:


Houses types:

Tiny Shack

   

Tiny Shack. 1 bind point. A modest peasant shack. Has no door. Good enough to be a part of the city residents and to cover you from rain, but nothing else.


Small Wooden House ...

   


and Small Plaster House

   

3 bind points. A good 1 story high house for a tight family.


Medium sized Plaster House

   

5 bind point inside 2 story medieval city house. A nice looking medieval residence for a small group of well known citizens.


Big Wooden House ...

   

and Big Stone House

    

10 bind points. A massive house that can fit a whole small guild in, with firepit in the center and a balcony.


City Keep

    

A dominant of the outer city walls. A place fitting a governor of the Starter City. Multistory building with a good view on all 4 sides of the city.

Be a King of our World!

We will take your name or nickname as a base of the name of our Lore king! Your name will be mentioned as a historical figure that had personally led a successful expedition towards new lands. Also, you will have an exclusive rental rights on the Starter City Castle for first 6 month of Open Beta and Release. That Castle keep and its inner ward will be available to you, so you can build additional structures or raze those you don’t like! And that in the heart of the protected city. All hail the king!

Castle

    

    


Our campaign has a target goal of 200,000.00 Euros, as this amount of funding allows us to complete the development of LIFE IS FEUDAL, and develop all of the features described above. But that is only the beginning! Should we accomplish additional funding we have defined a number of stretch-goals enabling us to expand our MMORPG even further! LIFE IS FEUDAL is an ever expanding universe, and in an effort to constantly and continuously offer our players the ultimate gaming experience, the game must be allowed to expand, evolve, and grow over time. We have defined a number of key-features and estimated their costs as stretch-goals, and we are confident these additions will add new dimensions to our MMORPG.

Our first stretch-goal of 275,000.00 Euros adds a complex ecosystem to the game. The objective is to expand on the games realism where latitude affects weather patterns, and where rain will affect farming culture growth rates and harvest amount. The amount and toughness of wild animals is directly related to the number of players and buildings in certain areas. The stretch-goal also adds complex animal taming and breeding.

Our second stretch-goal of 330,000.00 Euros offers players the feature to freely place furniture and decorative items inside of caves, houses, and buildings with great precision!

Our third stretch-goal of 440,000.00 Euros offers players the ability to place certain type of walls, windows, doors, stairs and other housing modules on the game grid, resulting in your own unique house plan that you can complete and decorate.

Our next stretch-goal of 570,000.00 Euros is a major enhancement to the game and includes a full-scale naval transportation and combat system! By reaching this goal LIFE IS FEUDAL will include Cogs and Hulks (with possible in-game invention of Caravel and Carrack ship types) roaming around rivers, lakes, and seas for movement of trade goods, troops, piracy or simply for leisure exploration.

Our final stretch-goal of 700,000.00 Euros offers players everything they will ever need to turn their depleted mine tunnels into a full-scale dungeons maze with doors, traps, and monster spawns, and treasure spots.



That is all our team. No more, no less and we are bad-ass :)


Name: Vladimir aka "Bobik"

Project leader, Software Architect, Lead Game Designer

A hardcore player both with cybersport background (Counterstrike 1.6) and with a large MMORPGs background, starting from old school UO. If you don’t like some of our game mechanics or concepts - blame Bobik! Acquired a PhD degree in economics.

Gaming experience/preference: MMORPGs: UO, AO, Shadowbane, LA2 beta, Planetside I/II, WW2OL, GW, WoW, ATitD, EVE, Dreamlords Beta, Project Entropia, FoM, Wurm, Sphere, Starport:GE, TCoS, Haven&Hearth, Darkfall

Single player (prefered): The Horde (DOS), Starcraft, HOMM3, Dungeon Keeper 2


Name: Boris aka "Bear"

Junior AI Developer

We all love Boris. Boris is good. And he is always right!

Gaming experience/preference: Tag ;)


Name: Michael aka "Mihey"

Lead C++ developer

Father of our terraforming and free building systems. Master of elements!

Gaming experience/preference: Quake 3, Richard Burns Rally


Name: Alexander aka "OnWheel"

Interface and DB C++ Developer

If you will find an inventory dupe bug - you can thank him for that :)

Gaming experience/preference: Civilization 3, 4, 5; DragonAge 1, 2; Fallout 2, 3; The Witcher series; Company of Heroes.


Name: Stepan aka "Link"

Art Director

That strong feeling of despair you might feel while living in our world is his part of job.

Gaming experience/preference: Gothic 1-2, The Elder Scrolls: Morrowind, Disciples 1-2, Warcraft 3, Mount&Blade Warband, Warhammer: Mark of Chaos, The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim


Name: Dmitriy aka "GothicDM"

3D Artist

Architect of our houses and buildings. And a lot of other stuff too...

Gaming experience/preference:  Gothic 2, The Elder Scrolls: Morrowind, Rainbow Six, Battelfield series


Name: Artem aka "Artem"

Lead AI and Game Mechanics C++ Developer

You have just killed a deer that was stuck between 3 trees? Do not forget to make a sacrifice in the name of Artem.

Gaming experience/preference:  C&C series


Name: Ilya aka "Furok"

3D Artist

All those scratches and dirty spots on your newly crafted armor is thanks to his ultimate 3D artist and texturing skills!

Gaming experience/preference: Titan Quest, Evil Islands, Carmageddon 2, Total Anigilation: Kingdoms, Disciples, Disciples 2, HoMM3, Homeworld, Dlade of Darkness, Warcraft 3, Gothic, Dungeon Keeper 2, Mount&Blade Warband, Path of Exile, Skyrim


Name: Vadim aka "wad"

Game Mechanics C++ Developer

Logging, Carpentry, Smelting, Construction, Alchemy, Cooking and many other useful skills brought with his caring hands into our medieval world.

Gaming experience/preference: UO, DAoC, EQ, WoW, WAR, APB, BnS, Darkfall, LotRO, PW, RF, Wurm, H&H


Name: Charlie aka "Falke88"

Community manager

Real life job:  Paratrooper soldier. Part time job: our community manager. Take care Charlie, it is still unknown which job is more dangerous ;)

Gaming experience/preference: Gothic 1-2, Fallout 3, Wurm Online


Name: Fyodor aka "bank"

Internal Systems C++ Developer

Huge fanboy of a Torque 3D engine we are using. But hey, we are using it well enough with Bank in our team!

Gaming experience/preference: Descent, Unreal and GTA series; AfterWorld; Carmageddon; Project Entropia / Entropia Universe; Active Worlds; F1; Transport Tycoon; Half-Life; Syndicate


Name: Sergey aka "Aneroun"

Render C++ Developer

Doing real magic with the engine rendering part, in our realistic medieval setting. But that is ok. Yes, he have a long list of games he had played :)

Gaming experience/preference: TES (3-4), Diablo(1-2), SW KotOR(1), Fallout(1-3), Arcanum, Soulbringer, Titan Quest, Zanzarah, Allods(1-3), Gothic(1), Pirates of the Caribbean, Myth, StarCraft, AoE(1-2), Settlers(2), Civilization, Colonization, Alpha Centauri, Caesar 3, Pharaon, HoMM(2-3), RedAllert, Transport Tycoon, Rise of nation, Total Annihilation, SimCity, Homeworld,  Quake(1-3), HL(1-2), Unreal, SiN, CS, SW Jedi Knights, Rune, MechWarrior, Crysis, Rage, Stalker, Syndicate Wars, Syndicate, GTA(1-3), Carmageddon, NFS(2-N), Worms Armageddon
story_txt:
UPDATE
First live stream:

Campaign is closed
It is obvious, that we will not be able to meet our goal. There are numerous reasons for that and some of them is our fault too, but we could not change it much, since the campaign had started. 
Still we are going to survive according our Plan "B" ;) Please, register on our site: lifeisfeudal.com and wait for additional news. Second stream containing some combat moments of our Sandbox MMORPG is going to be soon. Stay tuned!

Here is a quick breakdown of our games main features:


Massive Seamless Open-Ended World. LIFE IS FEUDAL features a massive 441 square kilometer open seamless world! Our game has island-like continent with different biomes such as plain, dense forest, steppe, desert, tundra and marsh, for example. All of the terrain is untouched nature inviting players to settle or invade! The continent is scattered with rivers, lakes and bays, and even has a roaring volcano!

Free Terraforming & Tunnel Building. LIFE IS FEUDAL features 100% free terraforming and tunnel building! Dig tunnels, mines and moats, and expand them in all dimensions almost without limitations! You can raise and lower ground levels with a land-fall effect. Substances include soil, rock, granite, ore veins, clay, sand, and many more!


Free Modular & Predefined Construction of Buildings & Objects. LIFE IS FEUDAL features more than 100 buildings and objects! Most buildings can be placed anywhere with free rotation and are predefined. Fortifications are modular allowing you to design and build your own unique castles with pattern, towers, gates etc. You can even place palisade walls and fences.


Rich Crafting System. LIFE IS FEUDAL features a crafting system with more than 500 recipes, including but not limited to mining, smelting, forging, logging, carpentry, construction, masonry, architecture, farming, taming, procuration, cooking, tailoring, fishing and hunting! Crafting is enriched through clever use of mini-games.


Almost Unlimited Number of Unique Alchemy Combinations. LIFE IS FEUDAL features over 40 billion alchemy combinations unique to each player! And unlike other online games you need to learn, experiment and create your very own unique combinations. Alchemy is not just a matter of character skill, as it has strong emphasis on players spending time and resources on creating good recipes and combinations.


Innovative Mini-Games Concept. LIFE IS FEUDAL features a plethora of mini-games that adds immersion and fun to the medieval crafting process, and allows gamers to play isolated parts of the game directly from a browser! Mini-Games offer an opportunity to improve on a given craft, and rewards players with bonuses.

A No-target Combat System. LIFE IS FEUDAL features an advanced no target combat system, where combat can be experienced in either 1st or 3rd person view. There is no lock-on, and players must carry out individual actions such as swing, stab and block, for example. 

Physics-Based Melee & Ranged Combat. Physics come into play as well, as does the quickness of the attacker and defender. A swift use of a sword at a high velocity causes extensive damage.


Realistic Player Damage System. With fractures and bleeding wounds you can create different unique combat tactics.


Full Loot. Added thrill and excitement of your adventures! Also when players die, loss of skill occurs by an alignment factor at random.


Skillcap & Statcap Systems. These will allow you to make almost any combination of skills that you think you need to have. You can design your own unique class and be like no one else in our world. That is the spirit of a true Sandbox!


Private Property & Land Claims. Grab some land for yourself or for your guild too. Divine law will protect your property standing on the claim from aggressors.


Complex Food & Cooking System. Cooking is no longer a secondary or non-existent skill. Being a good cook, who knows a lot of complex and tasty recipes, means that you and your friends or clients will be better fed and will have a skill raise bonuses!


Great selection of Medieval Weapons with Unique Combos & Effects. Up to 55 different medieval tools of killing and hurting. With their own combinations of directional attacks that will cause some harmful effects on your opponent, like knockdown, fracture, bleeding wound, crippled movement and many others!


Great selection of Tools that can be used as Militia Weapons! If you got jumped by some ragged bandit in the middle of your crops field, smash his face with a shovel! That will teach him a lesson.


Double Health & Stamina Bars. Double health and stamina bars represents your body status better. Players can be knocked out or dead, can be temporary out of breath or totally exhausted.


Original Battle Formation System. In massive battles, react accordingly to the combat situation and provide your Unit with a certain bonuses. But to receive these bonuses Unit members must be well organized and always keep formation.


Innovative Battle System. Battles will happen on an instanced server, without interference of 3rd parties, without senseless obstacles and with full statistic records. That is how history of feudal wars will be tracked!

Classic Siege System. As you have seen it in many other online games. Massive clash of players for a one certain castle.

Wild Animals Tracking & Hunting. You can find different tracks of different animals and follow them.



Our feature list is one of the most impressive and extensive for any MMORPG ever to be developed, and includes the very best from existing online games as well as some new, innovative, and groundbreaking additions never before seen! What follows is a brief description of the main features, and throughout the campaign we will provide updates with in-depth information and extensive details giving our backers full insight and clarity of our plans for LIFE IS FEUDAL.




LIFE IS FEUDAL has a tentative official release date of 2015, but this is subject to change and does not mean the game will not be available to download and play online a long time before that! The truth is, we plan to have an early ALPHA available right after successful finish of this campaign, and next year in 2014, there will be additional content and features added to the game, taking it to the BETA level. 
Supporters of LIFE IS FEUDAL can gain early exclusive access to playable code by pledging to some of our perk options outlined on the right side of this page. Developing a MMORPG is an everlasting process and never truly ends. But we strive to make as much content and as many features available as quickly as possible, especially because feedback and support is important.
Payment model is planned to be a B2P. Players will be able to download and enter game for free and will appear on a newbie island. While suffering different limitations, they will be able to test all of game mechanics and most of it features. And if they feel confident enough to leave safe newbie island and dive into the real medieval life on the main Continent, they will have to pay only once.




So what do you get for helping us? First of all, a heartwarming feeling that you have helped in creating a new, unique sandbox MMORPG to life! That feeling will be extended into game, giving you a slight sense of nobility.
Please, consider inspecting our rewards:









Credits



We will place you name and/or nickname in the Hall of Fame of our game on the website and the in-game credits page. Many years from now you will be able to tell your children that you helped trigger a new era of sandbox games. :)
Titles
Game Supporter, Proud Game Supporter, “Untouchable Game Supporter”. These titles will be available to all of your characters, so other players can observe them and feel how pathetic they are :). Also, if you choose the “Untouchable Game Supporter” Title to be visible and you are murdered by some PvP hungry outlaw, that outlaw will suffer a slightly higher alignment hit. That will teach him to avoid killing great supporters like you! ;)
Game purchase
Starting from a “well” reward tier you will be considered as a buyer of our game. That will give your characters a free ticket on a ship to the Main continent from the Newbie Island. Other players will have to spend real currency to buy these tickets.
Access to closed forum section
Way to effect on our Lore by taking active part in debates on the main continent and starting city names. Also, you will have access to alpha/beta tester forums and read their reviews, in case you were not lucky enough to get into earlier tests.
Increased “Authority” skill
This skill allow you to claim land for your personal control to build your own cozy farm, garden or bandit camp. Skill progression will be based on the amount of time you successfully maintain that claim. Players with this reward will have an increased base amount of the skill. This will allow them to claim significantly more land at the start of open Beta tests and at release!
Early access to the closed Alpha/Beta Tests
For all of you who cannot wait and want to dive into our medieval massive sandbox world, that is the right rewards for you.
Instant Closed Alpha Access - as soon as our campaign will be successfully finished, you will be able to download our client and join the alpha testing
Closed Alpha II Phase Access - aprox. in 2 month after the start of Closed Alpha tests
Closed Alpha III Phase Access - aprox. in 2 month after the start of Closed Alpha II tests
Closed Beta I Phase Access - date strongly depends on success of our campaign, extra funds we might get and overall amount of problems that needs to be solved during Alpha tests. As a rough estimate, that should be a Summer/Fall of 2014
Closed Beta II Phase Access - aprox. in 2 month after the start of Closed Beta tests
Keep in mind that early access will be provided to the Alpha/Beta testing phases, so please, be prepared to some glitches and bugs and report them on the way. The more reports you will do - the faster we will fix them.
Real Estate Rental
Starting City will be an only safe place in an endless storm of feudal life happening around it. Our backers will be able to claim land in city protected radius, which will guarantee protection of their assets in any circumstances! Aside from that, certain backers will have an estate property behind city walls that will be free of rent for first 6 month of Open Beta and Release. That property can be used freely, as for aesthetic purposes, as your bind point or simply to stash your belongings.
Keep in mind that we will let you choose any house out of the same types, but those who had backed first will be picking those houses first. So be fast with that, or you might end up with only some variants in slum district of Starting City ;)
Starting City view:



Houses types:
Tiny Shack



 

 


Tiny Shack. 1 bind point. A modest peasant shack. Has no door. Good enough to be a part of the city residents and to cover you from rain, but nothing else.

Small Wooden House ...







 

 




and Small Plaster House








 

 



3 bind points. A good 1 story high house for a tight family.

Medium sized Plaster House








 

 




5 bind point inside 2 story medieval city house. A nice looking medieval residence for a small group of well known citizens.

Big Wooden House ...







 

 


and Big Stone House





  

 



10 bind points. A massive house that can fit a whole small guild in, with firepit in the center and a balcony.

City Keep





  

 



A dominant of the outer city walls. A place fitting a governor of the Starter City. Multistory building with a good view on all 4 sides of the city.
Be a King of our World!
We will take your name or nickname as a base of the name of our Lore king! Your name will be mentioned as a historical figure that had personally led a successful expedition towards new lands. Also, you will have an exclusive rental rights on the Starter City Castle for first 6 month of Open Beta and Release. That Castle keep and its inner ward will be available to you, so you can build additional structures or raze those you don’t like! And that in the heart of the protected city. All hail the king!
Castle





  

 


  

 







Our campaign has a target goal of 200,000.00 Euros, as this amount of funding allows us to complete the development of LIFE IS FEUDAL, and develop all of the features described above. But that is only the beginning! Should we accomplish additional funding we have defined a number of stretch-goals enabling us to expand our MMORPG even further! LIFE IS FEUDAL is an ever expanding universe, and in an effort to constantly and continuously offer our players the ultimate gaming experience, the game must be allowed to expand, evolve, and grow over time. We have defined a number of key-features and estimated their costs as stretch-goals, and we are confident these additions will add new dimensions to our MMORPG.
Our first stretch-goal of 275,000.00 Euros adds a complex ecosystem to the game. The objective is to expand on the games realism where latitude affects weather patterns, and where rain will affect farming culture growth rates and harvest amount. The amount and toughness of wild animals is directly related to the number of players and buildings in certain areas. The stretch-goal also adds complex animal taming and breeding.
Our second stretch-goal of 330,000.00 Euros offers players the feature to freely place furniture and decorative items inside of caves, houses, and buildings with great precision!
Our third stretch-goal of 440,000.00 Euros offers players the ability to place certain type of walls, windows, doors, stairs and other housing modules on the game grid, resulting in your own unique house plan that you can complete and decorate.
Our next stretch-goal of 570,000.00 Euros is a major enhancement to the game and includes a full-scale naval transportation and combat system! By reaching this goal LIFE IS FEUDAL will include Cogs and Hulks (with possible in-game invention of Caravel and Carrack ship types) roaming around rivers, lakes, and seas for movement of trade goods, troops, piracy or simply for leisure exploration.
Our final stretch-goal of 700,000.00 Euros offers players everything they will ever need to turn their depleted mine tunnels into a full-scale dungeons maze with doors, traps, and monster spawns, and treasure spots.




That is all our team. No more, no less and we are bad-ass :)

story:
Hi, my name is Eric, and I’m proud to present Water Polo Revolution, the video game that water polo fans have always been waiting for!

Being able to connect my career as a game developer with my passion for water polo has been a privilege. I’ve been developing this game for the past two years, with a great response and support from the water polo community, which is how I know I’m on the right path.

The game is a realistic simulation of water polo. You’ll be able to perform all the most important actions a water polo player can perform in real life, like different types of passes, shots, movement, and strategies. I’m working hard to make the gameplay really feel and behave like the live sport.

 

Key Features

  • Perform all kinds of shots (skip shot, lob shot, backhand shot, sweep shot, wet shot, hesie shot)
  • Perform all kinds of passes (dry pass, wet pass, lead pass)
  • Protect the ball and turn the opponents
  • Build defense and attack strategies for your team
  • Call plays during the match to confuse your opponent
  • Create and customize your characters

 

 

Game modes

Exhibition Match

A single match between any 2 teams of your choice. Supports single player mode (you against the computer) and local multiplayer mode (you against another person using the same machine).

Tournament Mode 

You’ll be able to play existing tournaments (like a world cup), or create your own. You can choose which teams will participate, and which format will be used (knockout, groups, or a mixture of both).

Ultimate Challenge

In this single player mode, you’ll choose (or create) a team to play against increasingly difficult opponents, each one of them with a unique playstyle that will demand different strategies from you. Will you be able to beat the final boss?

You can only progress to the next opponent after defeating the previous one. The fewer matches you need to defeat them, the greater your final score. A scoreboard will keep track of the best players in this game mode, and allow you to compare your performance with your friends’ performances.

 

 

Platforms

The game will be available via Steam, to be played on PC and Mac.

Console versions are not in my plans, at least for now, due to the high investment in time and money.

You’ll be able to play the game using a keyboard and a mouse, or any controller.

 

My Mission

These are the main objectives I’m trying to achieve, in order to generate a positive impact with the game, not only on an individual level, but also on a community level:

  • Simulate the true feeling of playing water polo. Something that can make us feel represented
  • Provide a fun way to learn the rules and the tactics of the sport
  • Create interest for water polo in people who aren't familiar with the sport yet

 

 

Why am I running this campaign?

I’ve been working alone on this game since the beginning. Taking that into consideration, I think I’m doing a pretty good job. However, the project is huge and demands knowledge over a variety of fields of expertise. Generally, games like this are created by bigger teams. It’s not a job for one person.

So, this crowdfunding campaign will allow me to finally build a team to work alongside me, being able to deliver the game faster and with better quality. The money will also be used to hire complementary services, and for necessary acquisitions like software licenses, 3D models, sounds, and images.

Without the money, I won’t be able to keep developing the game.

 

The Team

I’m still looking for the right team members. However, during the next few days, I’ll probably be announcing new members, so stay tuned. These are the roles I’m looking for:

Eric Flório (me) - Game Designer

I’ll work primarily as the game designer (the person who plans the mechanics, balances the game, and makes sure it feels good to play). I’ll also take care of project management, marketing, community management, and business related matters.

  • Amateur water polo player
  • Degree in Graphic Design
  • Post graduate certificate in Game Development
  • Game designer in PSG Football Freestyle (Best Game Big Brands - Big Festival 2018)
  • Game designer in Muiraquitã (Best Serious Game - SBGames 2018)

Ramon Ferreira - Programmer

His interest in game development started in his childhood, when he used to play with RPG Maker. Later, in 2014, he began to learn Unity, and since then has been working in various projects, from advergames to entertainment games.

His top searches on google are about Artificial Intelligence, Zelda, and Unity performance optimization. He is always ready to spend some time talking about the video game industry, game development, etc.

He is also working on the game Skydome, as a performance developer.

 

3D Artist

Creates 3D models, textures, rigs, and takes care of everything related to the graphic quality of the 3D spaces in the game.

 

UX/UI designer

Responsible for creating the visual identity of the game, especially menus and HUD. Also makes sure the game is easy to navigate and to understand.

 

Sound designer

Creates and integrates sound effects into the game, contributing to make it feel more immersive and responsive.

 

Where the money goes

This is a breakdown of the main costs of the project.

I’m not including the costs of my own work (game design, project management, etc) in this crowdfunding campaign, because I can make a profit later, by selling the game. This allows me to set the funding goal as low as possible, to maximize our chances of reaching it.

 

Current State

At this moment, the game allows you to move the characters, pass the ball, shoot towards the goal, and switch between players. However, you can’t play a proper match yet, mostly because the artificial intelligence of the characters is not fully realized. On top of that, there are still a lot of other things to do in order to finish the game. Here are some of those things, in no particular order:

  • Improve graphic quality
  • Improve and add new player animations
  • Create user interfaces (screens, menus, HUD…)
  • Implement all remaining in-game mechanics, like the different types of shots and passes
  • Refine camera movement and implement playback
  • Create tutorials (it will consist of drills you can use to learn and improve your skills)
  • Finish the development of the artificial intelligence of the players, coaches and referees
  • Add sound effects and soundtrack to the game
  • Implement all game modes

 

Roadmap

 

Rewards

 

Copy of the Game - $30

You will receive a virtual copy of the game, delivered as a Steam Key, once the game is launched. You’ll also get your name in the credits of the game.

 

Early Access - $45

You'll play the game before everyone else, as soon as we enter the beta test phase, and will be able to actively contribute to the improvement of the game. You’ll also get your name in the credits of the game.

 

Custom Message - $75

You’ll write a message that will be shown during matches, with your name on it, as if you were a fan watching a game and tweeting about it. On top of that, you’ll also get your name in the credits, a copy of the game once it launches, and early access to the game.

Here are some topics and ideas you could use in your message:

  • Showing support for some national team (Go Brazil!)
  • Opinion about some national team in particular (This is the chance for Brazil to win a medal for the first time / Japan is the team I enjoy watching the most. Love their aggressive defense)
  • Opinion involving more than one national team (Serbia is overrated, this time they don’t stand a chance against Italy)
  • General opinion/experience about water polo (The only thing better than watching a good water polo game, is playing it yourself)
  • Personal message to other people, as long as it’s related to water polo (Greetings to my great friend John Smith, the best center I’ve ever played with / Greetings from Brazil. The water polo community may not be huge here, but we truly love the sport)

 

It’s not allowed to:

  • Use the names of real professional water polo players, clubs, or brands
  • Inappropriate language
  • Things not related to water polo or out of context

 

If your tweet doesn’t fit the criteria, I’ll reach you to request a new version.

If you have any questions about it, send me a message ;)

 

YOU in a Backers' Team - $145

You’ll be a character in the game, featured in every copy shipped, as part of a team composed only by backers. This perk is for men and women.

I’ll provide a tool (similar to the game’s customization screen) for you to create the appearance of the character, insert a name, and configure the attributes (you’ll have a certain number of points to distribute between the attributes).

Later, we can choose a cool name for this backers' team (Angry Narwhals, The Martians, Squid Squad… just some brainstorming hahaha)

You’ll also get your name in the credits, a copy of the game once it launches, and early access to the game.

IMPORTANT: this reward will only be available during this crowdfunding campaign.

 

YOU in a National Team - $185

You’ll be a character in the game, featured in every copy shipped, as a player of a national team. The first people to choose their national teams will be those who pledged first (max of 4 people per national team, in a total of 22 men's national teams plus 22 women's national teams).

After claiming this perk, send an email to ericsflorio@gmail.com with your preferred choice. These are the national teams that will be available in the game (I may add more later, depending on the demand):

  • Argentina --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Australia --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Brazil --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Canada --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Croatia --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • France --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Georgia --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Germany --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Greece --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Hungary --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Italy --> Men 3/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Japan --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Kazakhstan --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Montenegro --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Netherlands --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Romania --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Russia --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Serbia --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Spain --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • Swiss --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
  • United States --> Men 4/4 - Women 1/4 claimed
  • Uruguay --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

 

I’ll provide a tool (similar to the game’s customization screen) for you to create the appearance of the character, insert a name, and configure the attributes (you’ll have a certain number of points to distribute between the attributes).

You’ll also get your name in the credits, a copy of the game once it launches, and early access to the game.

IMPORTANT: this reward will only be available during this crowdfunding campaign.

 

Your own team in the game - $1,885

You’ll create an entire team to be shipped in every copy of the game. You'll be able to customize each player (max 13 players), as well as the name and the logo of the team.

I’ll only accept real teams/clubs (if you have the rights over it) or completely fictional teams. You cannot use the name or the logo of the team to promote a brand. Still, If you’d like to promote your brand inside the game, send me a message so we can discuss a personalized solution.

I’ll keep the rights to alter or remove any element that shows someone else's trademark, inappropriate language, or any other element that could harm the game, the players, or other legal entity.

I’ll provide a tool (similar to the game’s customization screen) for you to create the characters, choose the name of the team and a logo to represent it.

 

Risks and challenges

This is the first water polo video game with this scale and complexity to ever be developed, so this is not a trivial task. Every mechanic will have to be built practically from scratch, since there are no other similar games to get inspiration from.

However, I have good reasons to believe in a positive outcome:

  • Since I play water polo myself, I know the particularities of the sport well
  • For the things I don’t know, I have access to people with great experience in water polo who have been really helpful with this project
  • I’ll be involving the community in the development process, starting with testing the game since the early stages, to ensure people are really enjoying it. Your feedback will be crucial to make the game better
  • I put aside secondary features to be able to focus on the main gameplay, to make sure it’s fun and it behaves like real water polo. Gameplay is king
  • Although it would be easier to develop this game based on previously released water polo video games (if they existed), it’s still possible to use video games about other sports as reference

 

Other ways you can help

The success of this campaign greatly depends on how many people we can reach. This is why it’s so important that you tell your friends about it. Sharing this campaign on your favorite social media will be a huge help. Let’s make this game get to everyone in the water polo community!

You can use the share buttons located on the top of this page, or you can just share this link:
https://www.indiegogo.com/at/water-polo-revolution

You can also follow the project on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter. This way you’ll be always up on the progress of the project.

 

@wp_revolution

@waterpolorevolution

@wp_rev

I’m working hard to make the gameplay really feel and behave like the live sport. Key Features
Perform all kinds of shots (skip shot, lob shot, backhand shot, sweep shot, wet shot, hesie shot)
Perform all kinds of passes (dry pass, wet pass, lead pass)
Protect the ball and turn the opponents
Build defense and attack strategies for your team
Call plays during the match to confuse your opponent
Create and customize your characters
  Game modesExhibition MatchA single match between any 2 teams of your choice. Supports single player mode (you against the computer) and local multiplayer mode (you against another person using the same machine).Tournament Mode You’ll be able to play existing tournaments (like a world cup), or create your own. You can choose which teams will participate, and which format will be used (knockout, groups, or a mixture of both).Ultimate ChallengeIn this single player mode, you’ll choose (or create) a team to play against increasingly difficult opponents, each one of them with a unique playstyle that will demand different strategies from you. Will you be able to beat the final boss?You can only progress to the next opponent after defeating the previous one. The fewer matches you need to defeat them, the greater your final score. A scoreboard will keep track of the best players in this game mode, and allow you to compare your performance with your friends’ performances.  PlatformsThe game will be available via Steam, to be played on PC and Mac.Console versions are not in my plans, at least for now, due to the high investment in time and money.You’ll be able to play the game using a keyboard and a mouse, or any controller. My MissionThese are the main objectives I’m trying to achieve, in order to generate a positive impact with the game, not only on an individual level, but also on a community level:
Simulate the true feeling of playing water polo. Something that can make us feel represented
Provide a fun way to learn the rules and the tactics of the sport
Create interest for water polo in people who aren't familiar with the sport yet
  Why am I running this campaign?I’ve been working alone on this game since the beginning. Taking that into consideration, I think I’m doing a pretty good job. However, the project is huge and demands knowledge over a variety of fields of expertise. Generally, games like this are created by bigger teams. It’s not a job for one person.So, this crowdfunding campaign will allow me to finally build a team to work alongside me, being able to deliver the game faster and with better quality. The money will also be used to hire complementary services, and for necessary acquisitions like software licenses, 3D models, sounds, and images.Without the money, I won’t be able to keep developing the game. The TeamI’m still looking for the right team members. However, during the next few days, I’ll probably be announcing new members, so stay tuned. These are the roles I’m looking for:


Eric Flório (me) - Game Designer
I’ll work primarily as the game designer (the person who plans the mechanics, balances the game, and makes sure it feels good to play). I’ll also take care of project management, marketing, community management, and business related matters.

Amateur water polo player
Degree in Graphic Design
Post graduate certificate in Game Development
Game designer in PSG Football Freestyle (Best Game Big Brands - Big Festival 2018)
Game designer in Muiraquitã (Best Serious Game - SBGames 2018)





Ramon Ferreira - Programmer
His interest in game development started in his childhood, when he used to play with RPG Maker. Later, in 2014, he began to learn Unity, and since then has been working in various projects, from advergames to entertainment games.
His top searches on google are about Artificial Intelligence, Zelda, and Unity performance optimization. He is always ready to spend some time talking about the video game industry, game development, etc.
He is also working on the game Skydome, as a performance developer.

 


3D Artist
Creates 3D models, textures, rigs, and takes care of everything related to the graphic quality of the 3D spaces in the game.

 


UX/UI designer
Responsible for creating the visual identity of the game, especially menus and HUD. Also makes sure the game is easy to navigate and to understand.

 


Sound designer
Creates and integrates sound effects into the game, contributing to make it feel more immersive and responsive.

 Where the money goesThis is a breakdown of the main costs of the project.I’m not including the costs of my own work (game design, project management, etc) in this crowdfunding campaign, because I can make a profit later, by selling the game. This allows me to set the funding goal as low as possible, to maximize our chances of reaching it. Current StateAt this moment, the game allows you to move the characters, pass the ball, shoot towards the goal, and switch between players. However, you can’t play a proper match yet, mostly because the artificial intelligence of the characters is not fully realized. On top of that, there are still a lot of other things to do in order to finish the game. Here are some of those things, in no particular order:
Improve graphic quality
Improve and add new player animations
Create user interfaces (screens, menus, HUD…)
Implement all remaining in-game mechanics, like the different types of shots and passes
Refine camera movement and implement playback
Create tutorials (it will consist of drills you can use to learn and improve your skills)
Finish the development of the artificial intelligence of the players, coaches and referees
Add sound effects and soundtrack to the game
Implement all game modes
 Roadmap Rewards Copy of the Game - $30You will receive a virtual copy of the game, delivered as a Steam Key, once the game is launched. You’ll also get your name in the credits of the game. Early Access - $45You'll play the game before everyone else, as soon as we enter the beta test phase, and will be able to actively contribute to the improvement of the game. You’ll also get your name in the credits of the game. Custom Message - $75You’ll write a message that will be shown during matches, with your name on it, as if you were a fan watching a game and tweeting about it. On top of that, you’ll also get your name in the credits, a copy of the game once it launches, and early access to the game.Here are some topics and ideas you could use in your message:
Showing support for some national team (Go Brazil!)
Opinion about some national team in particular (This is the chance for Brazil to win a medal for the first time / Japan is the team I enjoy watching the most. Love their aggressive defense)
Opinion involving more than one national team (Serbia is overrated, this time they don’t stand a chance against Italy)
General opinion/experience about water polo (The only thing better than watching a good water polo game, is playing it yourself)
Personal message to other people, as long as it’s related to water polo (Greetings to my great friend John Smith, the best center I’ve ever played with / Greetings from Brazil. The water polo community may not be huge here, but we truly love the sport)
 It’s not allowed to:
Use the names of real professional water polo players, clubs, or brands
Inappropriate language
Things not related to water polo or out of context
 If your tweet doesn’t fit the criteria, I’ll reach you to request a new version.If you have any questions about it, send me a message ;) YOU in a Backers' Team - $145You’ll be a character in the game, featured in every copy shipped, as part of a team composed only by backers. This perk is for men and women.I’ll provide a tool (similar to the game’s customization screen) for you to create the appearance of the character, insert a name, and configure the attributes (you’ll have a certain number of points to distribute between the attributes).Later, we can choose a cool name for this backers' team (Angry Narwhals, The Martians, Squid Squad… just some brainstorming hahaha)You’ll also get your name in the credits, a copy of the game once it launches, and early access to the game.IMPORTANT: this reward will only be available during this crowdfunding campaign. YOU in a National Team - $185You’ll be a character in the game, featured in every copy shipped, as a player of a national team. The first people to choose their national teams will be those who pledged first (max of 4 people per national team, in a total of 22 men's national teams plus 22 women's national teams).After claiming this perk, send an email to ericsflorio@gmail.com with your preferred choice. These are the national teams that will be available in the game (I may add more later, depending on the demand):

Argentina --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Australia --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Brazil --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Canada --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Croatia --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

France --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Georgia --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Germany --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Greece --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Hungary --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Italy --> Men 3/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Japan --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Kazakhstan --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Montenegro --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Netherlands --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Romania --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Russia --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Serbia --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Spain --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

Swiss --> Men 1/4 - Women 0/4 claimed

United States --> Men 4/4 - Women 1/4 claimed

Uruguay --> Men 0/4 - Women 0/4 claimed
 I’ll provide a tool (similar to the game’s customization screen) for you to create the appearance of the character, insert a name, and configure the attributes (you’ll have a certain number of points to distribute between the attributes).You’ll also get your name in the credits, a copy of the game once it launches, and early access to the game.IMPORTANT: this reward will only be available during this crowdfunding campaign. Your own team in the game - $1,885You’ll create an entire team to be shipped in every copy of the game. You'll be able to customize each player (max 13 players), as well as the name and the logo of the team.I’ll only accept real teams/clubs (if you have the rights over it) or completely fictional teams. You cannot use the name or the logo of the team to promote a brand. Still, If you’d like to promote your brand inside the game, send me a message so we can discuss a personalized solution.I’ll keep the rights to alter or remove any element that shows someone else's trademark, inappropriate language, or any other element that could harm the game, the players, or other legal entity.I’ll provide a tool (similar to the game’s customization screen) for you to create the characters, choose the name of the team and a logo to represent it. Risks and challengesThis is the first water polo video game with this scale and complexity to ever be developed, so this is not a trivial task. Every mechanic will have to be built practically from scratch, since there are no other similar games to get inspiration from.However, I have good reasons to believe in a positive outcome:
Since I play water polo myself, I know the particularities of the sport well
For the things I don’t know, I have access to people with great experience in water polo who have been really helpful with this project
I’ll be involving the community in the development process, starting with testing the game since the early stages, to ensure people are really enjoying it. Your feedback will be crucial to make the game better
I put aside secondary features to be able to focus on the main gameplay, to make sure it’s fun and it behaves like real water polo. Gameplay is king
Although it would be easier to develop this game based on previously released water polo video games (if they existed), it’s still possible to use video games about other sports as reference
 Other ways you can helpThe success of this campaign greatly depends on how many people we can reach. This is why it’s so important that you tell your friends about it. Sharing this campaign on your favorite social media will be a huge help. Let’s make this game get to everyone in the water polo community!You can use the share buttons located on the top of this page, or you can just share this link:https://www.indiegogo.com/at/water-polo-revolutionYou can also follow the project on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter. This way you’ll be always up on the progress of the project. 
 
@wp_revolution

 
@waterpolorevolution

 
@wp_rev

story:
“Stella Save Us!” is a 2D Pixelated Single Player Adventure game that seeks to establish awareness about the importance of preserving the environment, flora, wildlife, natural sanctuaries and diverse endangered zones, through an entertaining voyage across the world.


Join Stella, our protagonist, and her loyal friend “Driver” in an adventure across distinct parts of the world; record taking pictures proof that reveals how deteriorated our ecosystems are and the respective environmental consequences.


Help us stop the true intentions of the “T Corporation” through the preservation and recovery of natural areas, creation of innovative technologies and participation in many activities involving humanitarian support and helping with natural disasters.


Together we’ll do it!


Grant us this wish: Take a moment, listen to our story and help us take this dream project to its finish line!


The Lore Comic

 

 

“Stella Save Us!” is an adventure game based around minigames in which the player travels around different places of the world in order to stop the destructive plans of the “T Corporation”, a worldwide corporation that’s guilty of burning forests, melting glaciers, sabotaging researches about global warming, hunting down endangered wildlife, etc. All for the purpose of gathering economical resources.
Said minigames will revolve around mechanics and varied perspectives, all with different progressions and upgrades that will allow the player to keep on progressing on the goal. The various locations in these missions are based around environmental biomes such as:

 

  • Fire: Fires, flames, deforestation.
  • Water: Seas, lakes, rivers.
  • Grass: Reforestation spaces, botany.
  • Energy: Cities, recycling zones, spaces of technological development.


The prime tool to battle the emergencies is “Ecoveh”, an eco-friendly vehicle designed by the assistant, equipped with multiple devices, each one appropriate for each type of challenge our protagonist can face.


The energy Ecoveh requires, to let our protagonist go into rescue missions and environment emergencies, is based in bio-organic waste, which can be obtained through harvesting activities.

 

Our protagonist is Stella, a well-known photographer, and environmentalist, notable for capturing the wildlife and flora’s beauty around the world, aside from her contributions to ecosystem research. Stella, before turning into an environmentalist would travel around the world portraying what her camera could picture, but faith would change her life after a big forest fire burned a big part of the place where she lives. After that day, her ecological side bloomed together with a worrying doubt: Who could be responsible for the fire that caused so much pain?

In one of her many trips, Stella meets driver, who unfolds well as a mechanic and inventor. Since that day they’ve been cultivating an unequalled friendship and fellowship, which has allowed them to travel to the most exotic corners of the planet.

In one of her adventures in Antarctica, during her seventh day of exploration, picturing beautiful places and marvelous endangered species, she notices that she’s not only aiming her camera lens at a beautiful herd of penguins with her children, but also what will start the collection of proof against the powerful “T” Corporation.
Stella and Driver are in deep trouble, now they’re wanted by the “T” Corporation, whose millionaire businesses can’t be menaced by nothing nor anyone.

 

The T Corporation is a multinational corporation known for shady and non-friendly environmental deals which are covered by the power of money. In this occasion a photography would mark the beginning of a research that could lead the T. Corporation to its knees.
The T. Corporation is known worldwide, formed by a multinational group of corporations in different headquarters, it has a maximum goal, achieving the highest economic benefits at all costs, inside this, the words “Ethic”, “Environmental awareness” and “Corporate social responsibility”, are a dead letter, since any sort of practice is valid to them.

 

“The interests of the Corporation will always be above anything else.” 
- Mr. T
His organizations have reached headlines in many research diaries due to their chaotic practices, especially those that harm the environment, the wildlife preservation and such… But to this day, they’ve constantly found a way to stay out of trouble in situations where they’re accused, since proof has never been enough.

 


In Antarctica and thanks to Stella’s picture, the first proof register that could take the T. Corporation to justice hands will start.
Stella is in danger; her photos could signify the end of multimillionaire businesses, Mr. T and his corporation will not allow this to happen.

 

The core of Stella Save Us! Merges around diverse environmental emergencies which take on from forest fires to undersea rescues. All these situations are presented through minigames with various mechanics and tools that Stella (along with his partner) must make use of to complete their objectives and save the planet from over-exploitation.
Gameplay is always coupled with beautiful pixelated art which emphasizes on beautiful details of our environment.


Art and gameplay join forces to create awareness about the unfortunate environmental disasters that harm the world day by day, caused mainly by the egoism of some.


Rescue animals, protect forests, help your friends, harvest your beautiful garden, take care of the sea and more in this beautiful adventure with Stella and friends!
All levels revolve around different areas that are usually in some type of environmental danger.

Visit the garage to take on your missions in your ecological vehicle EcoVeh!

(Our beautiful garage, concept art gif)

Take a look inside your beautiful house, where you’ll do most of the important things needed to take on your missions, upgrade your car, etc.

 

You will take on environmental emergencies seeking to reestablish, and aid affected areas, product of evil plans by the T Corporation, responsible for the damage and deforestation of green areas, creation of energy that’s not friendly to the environment and machinery that’s destructive to wildlife and vegetation of the planet.
Select your mission and go rescue!

 

 

Settle up your garden, collect and get energy for your vehicle, which will allow you to attend missions if you have enough bio-fuel. Not everything works as bio-fuel, but research and creation of new technologies requires different materials. Everything can be recycled!
 

 

Dynamic and diverse minigames will allow you to enjoy a love letter to games such as Mario Party, where gameplay will always be able to surprise you, with twin-stick shooting, platforming, sidescrolling, bossfights and more.

 

(Forest rescue adventure concept gif)

(Ocean adventure bossfight concept art)

 

Each task will become less complicated if you rely on the appropriate tools. Stella’s case is no exception.


Through her adventure she’ll find obstacles out of her reach, but this won’t stop her from progressing.


With the help of her skillful assistant and some materials, Stella will be able to create new technologies depending of the mission she wants to go for with her work benches, which will be located in the upgrade room.

(Upgrade room concept art)

 

The upgrade system for the tools of our vehicle Ecoveh, will be displayed in this panel, where you’ll pick based in a recipe system, what sort of objects to create from required materials, located on the right panel along with the object’s description.

Inventory, where you’ll see each one of the materials at your disposal; besides that, in case of having duplicate items you want to reuse, or experiment with, you can go to the recycling system, in which you can place 3 items to create a new one with higher rarity.

 

Discover and collect beautiful collectable objects through each one of the incredible adventures in the world, where you’ll join Stella.


Usually, you’ll find them on mission completion or secret locations; these are symbols of memories and support to our protagonist in her objective seeking.


How many objects will you collect?

 


Take a peek at your board from the commodity of your house to gaze at stickers and objects you’ve collected. Beautiful!

 

 

 

All donations will be extremely appreciated by the team, because of this, we’ve designed a set of rewards for every amount, we will even, for all donations higher or equal to $15, display their names inside the credits, thanking all these people.


Everything is digital, we don’t count on physical rewards sadly, in order to not increase our budget and risk the project’s budget.

 

 

REWARD DESCRIPTION

  • Wallpaper: Pack of high-resolution illustrations of our game, ideal for your desktop PCs or/and mobile-phone wallpaper.
  • Name in the credits: inside the options menu there’s a credits section, where it’s listed and thanked each person that donated more than $15 to the game.
  • Closed beta access: Before launch there will be a closed beta in order to test the main functionality of the game and receive feedback through comments, doubts, bug reports, etc.
  • Digital Art book: a digital book which includes concept art (protagonist, T. Corporation, etc.), photo album including assets (vehicles, enemies, etc.) and an entertaining comic with adventures of our protagonist.
  • Manual/Digital guide: a digital book that includes tips to enjoy the game appropriately giving respect to character story, various strategies, curious facts, etc.
  • Collectable design: You’ll design a collectable; you’ll pick where and how will it be achieved.
  • Portrait/Illustration by Eto2D: Portrait/Illustration of the Backer by Eto2D.
  • City design: You’ll design a city as a playable area along with the development team. It must be a real city, not a fictitious one. This city will hold NPCs and diverse stories, aside from being a main spot for some levels.
  • NPC Design: Design a non-playable character (NPC) together with the development team. You can design the story and missions the NPC will deliver aside from the personality, physical appearance and dialogues.
  • Advertisement in all the game: Throughout the game, in cities and other locations, there’ll be advertisement posters to showcase the control the “T. Corporation” has over the current worldwide economy. Any backer who’s in the appropriate Tier will be able to advertise their ecological organization through these posters (Obviously in a positive manner only, not negative like the T. Corporation).

 

Why Indiegogo? 
We are looking for help from the community to make Stella Save Us! Go beyond what we can achieve through self-funding.


The funding goals allow us to hire more programmers and developers, paying extra-workers to fine-tune the game and/or participate in videogame fairs and shows in order to promote the game.
If the campaign does not work well, we will unfortunately stop working on the project before it’s fully finished.



In order to reduce costs, bugs and time for release date, we’re using the Unity game engine. Our team has been working in Unity, allowing us to focus on gameplay and design instead of developing/struggling with a custom game engine.


Unity also allows us to potentially reach other platforms through future updates more efficiently in case we reach proper stretch goals and receive great reception.

 

Micro-company dedicated to creation, development and self-publishing of videogames located in the Valparaíso region, Chile!


We believe that videogames are powerful communication sources and a medium to explore new amazing worlds.

 

We’re anxious to connect with people that feel the same for videogames and we have the intention to keep on sharing entertaining, imaginative and inspiring titles in the world.


This is the beginning of our journey, this time in support of the environment, we’ll wait for you to follow us. Join us!


TEAM
- Gonzalo Romero: Programmer/Producer
- Mauricio Espíndola Naranjo: Programmer
- Jesús Alberto Pérez Valdez: Programmer
- Héctor Alvarez: Sprite artist/ Animator
- Marisol Arosa: Marketing
- Alexis: Music composer and SFX designer.

 

In today’s videogame industry, it’s a pretty big risk to develop something without fearing failure during development or even after the launch. An industry in which every day, new companies are created for videogame development, being their only objective to generate high amounts of money, only watching the result as an economical goal.
We’re trying to change this, and with this new challenge, launching a game in which the benefit is not only economical, but to also deliver a message about something that’s currently happening; places in the world coming to an end, animals disappearing and weather that’s changing increasingly, everything a product of man.


Ecological awareness using pixels, fun mechanics and an entertaining story, that’s our strategy to let the next generations know the problems that are currently going on in our world.

 

Download our presskit here
