story:
Renewal is a zombie survival, turn-based combat game based in a virtual world. It is currently in it's first beta version which is fortunately free to play. This game has been in development for over a year now, with myself as the sole developer of the game. There are many features in this game that are common to several other RPG games such as a quest system, inventory system, and NPC system. There are also a few features that await being implimented into the game such as buildings, and saving NPCs from the World Beyond (zombie territory).

Story

Hey guys, my name is Tom and I am the sole developer of Renewal. I have spent literally hundreds of hours developing this game since March 2012 (might even surpass 1000 hrs) and have come across so many issues during this time. Some problems that arose took me several days, and although I felt so urged to give up I pushed myself to continue because I wanted to make it a success. Doing many different aspects myself I found it a very stressful situation, but many times I was able to actually have some fun with it. In the recent months I began to add sound effects into the game, and this has been one of the most entertaining parts of development I must say (next to seeing the way the game is progressing). After looking for good sources online with free sound effects I came to the conclusion that it would be better and more consistent if I just made my own sound effects. So I downloaded a sound recording program and started doing crazy things to make sound effects that work. This took a lot of brainstorming and actually turned out satisfying for me. So anyways I am truly hoping that this campaign is going to make those insane hours spent on the game worth the time. I am trying my best to make Renewal the kind of game that anybody could enjoy playing!

So what makes this project better than the rest?

[Unlike many other campaigns Renewal is not only going to show you screenshots of the gameplay, you can actually try the current version of the game for yourself to really see its potential! If you are interested in trying it out before purchasing it, feel free to contact me at RenewalTheGame_Support@hotmail.com. Keep in mind it is still only in version 1.0 and a lot more content is to be added in the updates to come!]

*Edit* The game is openly downloadable to anyone interested for Beta V1.0. Download links can be found at the bottom of the page!

If you do not have time to download a version of the game and want to get a quick look at the game without browsing around take a look at the game trailer at:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eX8vAGWmaVs. Also keep in mind this trailer is for V0.5 and is missing out on a few features of the game (NPCs, stores, etc.)

*Note: Only the current beta version is guaranteed free, the full version of the game will not be free if this campaign is succesful*

Being a gamer has its perks when it comes to developng a game. I commonly find myself looking at comments on games and thinking to myself..."Wow I really agree with that". So I am confident to say I look for the same thing in a game as many of you probably do. I am also always open to suggestions from fans of the game and willing to give it my all to make everyone satisfied with Renewal.

Funding (Where the money is going)

I started this campaign to fund for certain aspects of the games development.

[$100.00]To submit the game on steam greenlight

[$150.00]To obtain a professional license to Stencyl. Needed to export (.exe)'s

[$800.00-$900.00]More money is also needed to help pay off for the developing system. While developing the first few months of the game, I had a system that was somewhat suitable to running/testing the game. But after so long the CPU began to be less and less effective to the point where the game would not run smooth on the system. For this reason I needed to buy a more efficient system, and I am hoping the game will be able to fund for this lost money.

[Remaining money] Help fund for publicising the game and potentially some new background music.

Features:

To summarize much of the game I have come up with a list of features within the game that are implemented as of V1.0:

-Inventory systems (Weapons, Ammo, Resources and Consumables)

-Dialog system (pop-ups, NPC conversations)

-Quest system (many more to be added to the game)

-Level up and skill progression (Over 80 Level symbols made)

-Number of days survived (displayed in banner at top)

-Currency and shop features

-AP and skills (Action points consumed to use skills with weapons)

-Weapon statistics (Durability, accuracy, ammo consumption, and damage)

-Combat systen (turn-based with many opportunities)

-Over 75 different items (Many many more to be added in the future

-Loot system (after killing foes, and when lootables are found in the world beyond)

-Randomly generated lootables (positions different every game you play)

-Randomly generated world beyond scenes (based on path presets)

-Randomly generated trees and weeds

There are more things to be added including bulking up many of the features already in the game, however that gives a good overlook of how much has actually been put into the game at this point in development. I also plan to add tutorials for one of the next releases to make the game easier to play for new players.

 

Perks:

 

There are some things that should be noted with the perks.

 

 

Level 1-4 Perks: Copies of the game refers to Steam codes when/if released on steam. Otherwise personal copies of the game will be distributed! If a multi-pack is purchased, [Level 2+] extra copies are able to be gifted to a friend. Name in credits will be put down as the name you desire.

Level 5: Choose any name you want an NPC to be given (legit name) as long as it is agreeable... (Not something ridiculous like, whale).

Level 6: Choose any name you want to give an NPC, then send me pictures of yourself/what you want the NPC to look like. Time will be put in from me as well as improvements from other pixel artists to make the NPC look like you/the picture(s).

Level 7: Special title given on credits must be something reasonable (can't be something like "Developer", or "Marketer")

Level 8: Name to be put on main menu must also be a legit thing, no ridiculous names for this either. I would prefer a real name, but username would work as well. IM/Skype time, your decision, I will answer any questions you may have about the games development and where we plan to go with it. I am also willing to spend some time with casual conversation! Depending on time on hand may have several different sessions over time, deal can be made!

*Note: All perks above Level 4 include a 4 pack of the game*

*Also if the campaign is a success any supporters Level 1+ Will be receiving free beta releases, as the game will become closed beta, only accesible by pre-order*

*Video states $30.00 will get you an NPC modeled after you, however this perk has changed to $50.00 because of the difficulty with doing so. Please excuse me for the mistake*

 

Want to help out but can't afford to!?

Help me out with spreading the word! Renewal is an indie project not widely known and it would be greatly appreciated if anyone could help me out with spreading the word. If you agree that this project is worth your time, please take a couple minutes to share this with your friends and family, as well as any gaming communities you are with!

 

Thanks for your time!

-Tgb

 

NEW!

 

I have finally got around to creating a twitter page! Link can be found below.

 

Multiplayer System:

One thing that hasn't been discussed with my followers very much as to the game is the multiplayer system. Many concepts have been designed for Renewal multiplayer system. This system will begin development as soon as the single player base game has been completed with features... In other words, I will continue developing multiplayer when the single player version only needs new content/items.

 

Beta V1.0 Free Download!

Windows OS:

http://www.filefactory.com/file/9220qtyw043/Renewal_Beta_V1.0_Win.zip

Mac OS:

http://www.filefactory.com/file/39kr6trnv3vh/n/Renewal_Beta_V1_0_Mac_zip

Contact me if you have any questions, comments, concerns, or suggestions for the next release, as ideas are always taken into consideration with my own concepts!

Keep in mind this game is not in it's full state and you may notice less content then a full fledged game. Beta V1.0 is focused on the game engine and gameflow of the game not the content amounts.  There is bound to be a lot of content added throughout upcoming releases, as well as new and improved features. This being said, there are some known bugs in V1.0, which have been fixed already. However the known bugs barely effect gameplay and so will be released when V1.1 comes out.

That's all to say about it, have fun, and don't forget to give feedback in the end, it is always highly appreciated!

story:
*FIXED CAMPAIGN 

Contributions are refunded if we don’t meet our goal.

Dakara: Episode 1 will be distributed via PWYW (Pay what you want) pricing system.

INTRODUCTION

There are people who die and people who kill in our world. And now just after leaving the forest I understood that those who kill had come for our souls. I threw the basket away and ran to the village. I didn’t even understand why I was running to the hell. I should have run back into the forest. Screams and clanging were everywhere. I couldn’t do anything. I could only hide, cry and wait till it's all safe. And hope that they won’t find me and I’ll live. I ran. I ran and no one looked at me. As always. There is always so much trouble in the village. I hid in the cellar and all I could do is listen. Listen to the sounds of the real world that was taking from me everything I had. 

Listen unable to do anything. It was the moment something broke inside of me. The demon inside has awaken …  

I was awakened by the buzzing silence. No sound was to be heard and it scared me. At first I thought it all had been just a dream. It was so light and the bright sun was dazzling me. With a throbbing head somehow I got outside. As soon as my eyes adjusted to the sunlight I understood it had been no dream. Everywhere I looked there were smoking remains of my village. Houses, sheds, granaries – everything was destroyed. And not a living soul around. Only horribly mutilated dead bodies. Slowly I walked through the village. I didn’t have the strength to bury the corpses nor to dig up mass graves. I could no longer understand whether it was the silence buzzing in my ears or the sound of a splitting headache. The sun was burning my eyes. I couldn’t look up. I could only look down and ‘enjoy’ the view of my own powerlessness.  

My name is Dakara. And I became the one who kills. 

When she was a child, Dakara felt strange powers inside of her, but she couldn’t understand what was going on. When she was 15, her tribe was attacked. Dakara was witness to the death of her parents and friends. She saw the flows of blood. It was the moment her abilities awoke. The demon inside of her has woken up.

THE GAME

Dive into the feelings of a young girl and help her to avenge her loved ones. Solve various puzzles, learn new abilities and fight with the fiercest enemies. The Story Of Dakara offers you incredible, full of thrilling adventures 5+ hour storyline (3 episodes) . The game will be accompanied by cinematic videos, professional dubbing and amazing effects. The project will become even better with your help! 

 

WHAT MAKES “THE STORY OF DAKARA” UNIQUE?

We are trying to make something new , something incredible. We want our game to have puzzles, stealth, action and logic elements. Unique storyline, voice acting, cinematics. "The Story Of Dakara" will blow your mind! Help us and we will not forget about you.

WHY DO WE NEED MONEY?

"The Story Of Dakara" is a platformer game and unfortunately, at this moment, we are unable to keep it alive , due to small amount of money. We  are working with this title from January 2012 and we really want to finish this project , but unfortunately we don't have a needed amount of cash left to complete the game , so we are asking you to help us! We are going to release a 3 unique episodes, so we can improve our game by reading your comments and make the second episode alot better !

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

With your money and help we can afford full-time work on our game and of course , pay for in-game graphics. Also we can hire new talented specialists!  We very want to finish this project and make it as best , as possible.

Of course you will be rewarded for your help. We will grant you beta and alpha version access , arts, postcards and more! Check out our perks list and choose, how you can help us.

 

The money will go towards five things:

1. Editing. The text is good as it is, but we'd prefer to get a professional editor to really polish it before release.

2. Sound effects, music and voice-acting. 

3. Art. We have an artist working, and we need to pay him.

4. Beautiful graphics! 

IndieGoGo & credit card companies take up to 11% of whatever we raise.

Art costs (estimated at $900-1250) + dubbing / videos . 

THE TIMELINE

Our plan for "Dakara: Episode 1" .

  • Closed Alpha ~ 16th October.
  • Open Alpha ~ 29th October.
  • First Trailer ~ 14th November .
  • Closed Beta ~ 25th November.
  • Demo version ~ 11th December.
  • Release (finally !) ~ Q1 2012.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We completely understand if you are unable to donate money, but you can help us other ways. You can spread the word about our campaign. Tell your friends, post this on facebook or other websites. The more people see our campaign, the better chance we have to make this work out exactly as we want it to work! We will also reward you for your help!
story_txt:
*FIXED CAMPAIGN 
Contributions are refunded if we don’t meet our goal.
Dakara: Episode 1 will be distributed via PWYW (Pay what you want) pricing system.
INTRODUCTION
There are people who die and people who kill in our world. And now just after leaving the forest I understood that those who kill had come for our souls. I threw the basket away and ran to the village. I didn’t even understand why I was running to the hell. I should have run back into the forest. Screams and clanging were everywhere. I couldn’t do anything. I could only hide, cry and wait till it's all safe. And hope that they won’t find me and I’ll live. I ran. I ran and no one looked at me. As always. There is always so much trouble in the village. I hid in the cellar and all I could do is listen. Listen to the sounds of the real world that was taking from me everything I had. 
Listen unable to do anything. It was the moment something broke inside of me. The demon inside has awaken …  
I was awakened by the buzzing silence. No sound was to be heard and it scared me. At first I thought it all had been just a dream. It was so light and the bright sun was dazzling me. With a throbbing head somehow I got outside. As soon as my eyes adjusted to the sunlight I understood it had been no dream. Everywhere I looked there were smoking remains of my village. Houses, sheds, granaries – everything was destroyed. And not a living soul around. Only horribly mutilated dead bodies. Slowly I walked through the village. I didn’t have the strength to bury the corpses nor to dig up mass graves. I could no longer understand whether it was the silence buzzing in my ears or the sound of a splitting headache. The sun was burning my eyes. I couldn’t look up. I could only look down and ‘enjoy’ the view of my own powerlessness.  
My name is Dakara. And I became the one who kills. 
When she was a child, Dakara felt strange powers inside of her, but she couldn’t understand what was going on. When she was 15, her tribe was attacked. Dakara was witness to the death of her parents and friends. She saw the flows of blood. It was the moment her abilities awoke. The demon inside of her has woken up.
THE GAME
Dive into the feelings of a young girl and help her to avenge her loved ones. Solve various puzzles, learn new abilities and fight with the fiercest enemies. The Story Of Dakara offers you incredible, full of thrilling adventures 5+ hour storyline (3 episodes) . The game will be accompanied by cinematic videos, professional dubbing and amazing effects. The project will become even better with your help! 

 
WHAT MAKES “THE STORY OF DAKARA” UNIQUE?
We are trying to make something new , something incredible. We want our game to have puzzles, stealth, action and logic elements. Unique storyline, voice acting, cinematics. "The Story Of Dakara" will blow your mind! Help us and we will not forget about you.
WHY DO WE NEED MONEY?
"The Story Of Dakara" is a platformer game and unfortunately, at this moment, we are unable to keep it alive , due to small amount of money. We  are working with this title from January 2012 and we really want to finish this project , but unfortunately we don't have a needed amount of cash left to complete the game , so we are asking you to help us! We are going to release a 3 unique episodes, so we can improve our game by reading your comments and make the second episode alot better !
WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
With your money and help we can afford full-time work on our game and of course , pay for in-game graphics. Also we can hire new talented specialists!  We very want to finish this project and make it as best , as possible.
Of course you will be rewarded for your help. We will grant you beta and alpha version access , arts, postcards and more! Check out our perks list and choose, how you can help us.

 
The money will go towards five things:
1. Editing. The text is good as it is, but we'd prefer to get a professional editor to really polish it before release.
2. Sound effects, music and voice-acting. 
3. Art. We have an artist working, and we need to pay him.
4. Beautiful graphics! 
IndieGoGo & credit card companies take up to 11% of whatever we raise.
Art costs (estimated at $900-1250) + dubbing / videos . 
THE TIMELINE
Our plan for "Dakara: Episode 1" .

Closed Alpha ~ 16th October.
Open Alpha ~ 29th October.
First Trailer ~ 14th November .
Closed Beta ~ 25th November.
Demo version ~ 11th December.
Release (finally !) ~ Q1 2012.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
We completely understand if you are unable to donate money, but you can help us other ways. You can spread the word about our campaign. Tell your friends, post this on facebook or other websites. The more people see our campaign, the better chance we have to make this work out exactly as we want it to work! We will also reward you for your help!

story:
ABOUT US                


Another World Miniatures is our dream to create a miniature line for collectors and gamers: for now only scale 1:61  (minis could vary between 30mm and 32mm).

Ideals for GdR, but also great additions to an existing army or simply collectible high quality miniatures.

This is a project just launched, and we already have available some great sculptures that are highly detailed and characterful.

These miniatures come unpainted and we cast them in two ways:

  • Resin highest quality limited numbered edition for collectors (80 ex)
  • Metal high quality unlimited edition

We guarantee the quality of sculptures and the quality of casting.


OUR MINIATURES






TO SEE THEM ALL, in every angle and details, please go to our website!

http://www.anotherworldminis.com/


HOW CAN YOU HELP US?  


This campagn will last 45 days and we will need a minimum of 1000 euros to proceed to improve website, invest on graphics and SEO, make illustrations and so on !
If we will increase this amount, we can cast special subjects and you will have opportunity to be the first to get them in this campaign and always at same great costs!

See stretch goals below...!!!

... and remember that limited edition resin figures are casted in a very small amount of numbered pieces!

Hurry up before they will become too rare!

We offer to all contributors, FREE SHIPPING WHEREVER YOU LIVE!!  This will be a great value due to the reasonable price of these jewels! 

And there will be also prizes!


I WILL SEND PACKAGES  TWO WEEKS AFTER FROM THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN!!!



THE BASIC PERKS


In order to help the campaign, we've produced metal and resin copies of Grusha!


*** GRUSHA METAL PERK INTRODUCED!!! ***

It will be available for the first time, be the first one to take a copy!

The only way to take GRUSHA is take this perk!

Here detailed photos of this masterpiece!

Greatly detailed, Love her dynamism... it's an incredible masterpiece at such a scale!

For all backers... ADD THIS PERK in order to obtain her with your order!!!



*** GRUSHA RESIN LIMITED EDITION PERK INTRODUCED!!! *** 

It will be available for the first time, be the first one to take a copy!

Here detailed photos of this masterpiece!

Greatly detailed, Love her dynamism... it's an incredible masterpiece at such a scale!

For all backers... ADD THIS PERK in order to obtain her with your order!!!

Here an example of the marvellous high quality resin casting:




*** SPECIAL CHARACTER PERK ( choose 1 metal figure between them!) ***

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk will give you access to one metal figure:

You can choose ONE miniature from the already existing 7 miniatures. 

At the end you will choose the one you want. 

This perk will only cost you 7.00€ (includes shipping worldwide, whenever you live!)

WHEN ORDERING, PLEASE REMEMBER TO ADD THE NAME OF THE MINI YOU'LL WANT TO THE INVOICE! 

ALEKSANDRA, BONNIE, CLYDE, JENNY, STAR GIRL, SELENE or KALITA

Since we will spend around 3 euros for each package shipped (depending where you live!), this is great discount for such a small amount pledged!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***



***  LIMITED EDITION CHARACTER PERK ( choose 1 resin figure between them!) ***

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk will give you access to ONE of the 5 special limited edition exclusive miniatures

These are miniatures available in resin with this perk and only 80 of these exclusive miniatures will be made; all of these figures will be numbered.

Till now, only 5 miniatures of our existing set are cast this way!

WHEN ORDERING, PLEASE REMEMBER TO ADD THE NAME OF THE MINI YOU'LL WANT TO THE INVOICE! 

ALEKSANDRA, BONNIE, CLYDE, JENNY or STAR GIRL

You must hurry, since only few perks will be available!!

This perk will cost to you 10€  included shipping worldwide, wherever you live!

Since we will spend around 3 euros for each package shipped (depending where you live!), this is great discount for such a small amount pledged!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***


*** FULL RESIN SET PERK ( 5 MINIATURES LIMITED EDITION 80 ex. RESIN) ***

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk will give you access the entire set of limited edition miniatures available till now... 5 beautiful sculptures, only 80 of these exclusive miniatures will be made; all of these figures will be numbered.

This perk will cost you only 41.00 € (included shipping worldwide, whenever you live!)

Buying the entire set, you will have always free shipping…that is less than what you will pay for 4 resin miniatures!  A Great choice!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***



***  FULL METAL SET PERK  ( 7 METAL MINIATURES) ***

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk will give you access the entire set of 7 metal figures available !

This perk will cost to you only 44.00 € (included shipping worldwide, whenever you live!)

Buying the entire set, you will have always free shipping…that is less than what you will pay for 6 miniatures!  A Great choice!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***


*** FULL SET! (12 MINIATURES - 7 casted in metal 5 in resin limited edition 80 ex.) ***

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk will give you.... ALL!

You will get the complete set of miniatures in both versions; Metal and the Limited Edition Numbered Resin Miniatures!!

You get ALL 12 figures plus a Special Steampunk Gift!

For only 80.00 €!

Buying this entire set, you will have always free shipping… A Great choice!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

*** PAINTED DOA METAL SET PERK  (7 painted metal miniatures) ***


*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk you will get the entire metal set already painted by a professional painter (Alessio Bonvini aka DOA)!

For the sum of only 180.00€, you will receive all seven hand painted figures carefully packed in a wooden box along with a Special Steampunk Gift!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***


*** PRO PAINTED WOLFBANE SET  (7 painted metal miniatures) ***


*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***

This perk will give you the entire metal set already painted by Multi-Golden Demon and award winner, Alessio Cisbani aka wolfbane !

For the sum of only 190.00€, you will receive all seven hand painted figures carefully packed in a wooden box along with a Special Steampunk Gift!

*** GRUSHA NOT INCLUDED !!!! SEE GRUSHA PERK! ***


To see complete details of each miniature and more photos, please stop by our Shop on our website!

http://www.anotherworldminis.com/collections/all


    STRETCH GOAL


    1000€ Unlocks ANGELINA steampunk commissar


    If we reach the goal of 1000€, the chance to take this marvelous miniature at an advantageous offer including free shipping and discount as part of the INDIEOGO campaign could be yours!!!


    2000€ Steampunk bits for all backers from "special character perk" and above!



    Steampunk bits for all backers who have joined the campaign from the "special character perk" and above (perks from 7€ and above!)

    (Perks "support us" will not be included in this offer)



      Risks & Challenges


      No risks! All perks are already available!  We only need two weeks after the campaign ends in order to prepare every blister package or box and begin shipping them! 

      I WILL SEND PACKAGES TWO WEEKS AFTER THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN!!!

story:
Do you feel pain on your wrist when you use your mouse?


  In spite of advanced devices such as smart phone, tablet, and others, I noticed we do not fully get away from using a computer mouse when it comes to dealing with urgent professional matters for long hours. Using a computer mouse for long hours has piled up stress on my wrist and I started ask myself a very simple question. That is,


“Why should I accept this pain as NORMAL?”



Even being vertical for a wrist…
a firm balanced grip is necessary

  After using several wrist-protecting-vertical mice while sharing opinions with friends such as graphic designers, software engineers, serious game players etc. we were not fully satisfied with the current products. By analyzing most of the vertical mice, we figured out that the lack of firm grip was the reason that we did not feel the same amount of efficiency, especially over long hours. Without a firm tight grip, we just end up using the mouse only for web surfing from time to time.



Ergonomic Design from Nature

  The concept of gently holding an egg has been used for many years and for many circumstances such as playing violin or piano as well as using chopsticks because its grip is considered to be the most balanced shape of hand for maximizing performance while minimizing stresses. We borrowed the same concept to strengthen a firm grip with efficiency & comfort for long hours of using a mouse


Here’s How It Works

  Simply imagine your typical mouse flipped vertically, but every single button is located within the range of each finger. Accordingly, you have a firm grip just like a typical mouse, but you don’t need to move as much as you do with a typical mouse and it protects your wrist. 


How we have reached our final design


 

We analyzed the shape of hands and have meticulously considered every detail of the NEST mouse to be aesthetically and functionally fit to most users, as much as possible. We already have two design patents in Korea and China and applied our design patent to U.S.A, EU, and other developed nations.


                  Upcoming Six Colors 




Founders


Why you support us

  We focus on products that value simplicity, efficiency and affordability. We search for inconvenient phenomenon in our daily lives and distill the core values that enable our users to distinctively enhance their lives by introducing our philosophy through our products, in this case, N.E.S.T mouse.  

We currently finalized optimizing the prototype and we are on the verge of establishing our production line. We secured the manufacturer who committed to supply plastic and electronic parts that satisfy our qualification. We also found some contributors who are specialized in post processing & assembly. So, the challenge we are facing right now is that the initial cost for preparation, such as plastic molding, is high and minimum quantity orders are around 1,000. 

Therefore, with encouragement from you, our supporters, we intend to solve these major issues and finally have a chance to introduce our NEST mouse to everyone who wants to protect their hands as well as improve efficiency for long work hours or just using your computer mouse.

By pledging, you are not just buying our product but have an opportunity to challenge the conventional concepts that have been accepted without doubt, ignoring pains just like the pain you feel on your wrist every time you use a mouse.

You can also support us by sharing this on any SNS such as Facebook, Twitter or by email to your friends or by simply talking about our product with someone who is interested.

Huge thanks for your support!!!




FAQ

Does it come in different sizes? 
  No. We analyzed and researched extensive amount of data to ensure the NEST mouse is designed to fit most of users. 


When will new colors/versions be available? 
  Since this is our first project, we intend to start with colors introduced on our campaign for now but we would like to hear color preferences from our supporters. If you let us know any particular color, we will update based on preference and the possibility to produce with the color you prefer.


Does the web page button at the bottom interfere when using wheel with thumb just like other vertical mice?
  The web page button at the bottom is designed to respond only by intentional click. We calculated the depth of the button just enough to be touched by the thumb joint, so you won’t be able to accidentally touch it.


Do you have a wireless NEST mouse too?
 It depends on the financial situation. We might be able to produce wireless too, but for now, we will focus on wired NEST mouse first under the assumption that people normally dislike "a sudden stop" over long hours of serious projects due to batteries (including games) especially in the middle of night. We will update and notify if this situation changes.


What about international shipping cost?
  Shipping has been always an issue for any physical products in Indiegogo and we try to minimize the international shipping cost as much as possible. We currently expect that the total weight for one product including full package would be around 500g (approximately 17oz or 1.10lb) We try to squeeze shipping cost near countries(Japan, Singapore, HK, China, Thailand, Vietnam etc) as much as we can and we intend to ship  less than $20 per one product worldwide. In terms of legal issues on each country, if there are any restrictions on customs in your country, shipping might take a little bit longer than we originally planned. Please check shipping cost when you contribute and let us know if there is any special restriction for our product in your country.

mouse first under the assumption that people normally dislike "a sudden stop" over long hours of serious projects due to batteries (including games) especially in the middle of night. We will update and notify if this situation changes.

What about international shipping cost?  Shipping has been always an issue for any physical products in Indiegogo and we try to minimize the international
shipping cost as much as possible. We currently expect that the total weight for one
product including full package would be around 500g (approximately 17oz or
1.10lb) We try to squeeze shipping cost near countries(Japan, Singapore, HK,
China, Thailand, Vietnam etc) as much as we can and we intend to ship  less than
$20 per one product worldwide. In terms of legal issues on each country, if there are any restrictions on customs in your country,
shipping might take a little bit longer than we originally planned. Please
check shipping cost when you contribute and let us know if there is any special
restriction for our product in your country.

story:
PLAY THE PROTOTYPE NOW!

WINDOWS  |  MAC  |  LINUX

Welcome!

Dogventure is a retro style 2D action platformer game inspired by the Megaman series, featuring RPG elements and an open world environment (or Metroidvania if you know of the term).

The video that you might've checked out at this point shows some of the game's mechanics and gives you and idea of how it looks and feels.

Where did the idea come from?

I'm a huge fan of old classics like Megaman, Metroid and Castlevania, and as modern games have grown and developed over time, classics like those have stayed in the past and apart from a very few games inspired on them or remakes/remasters, they are mostly just good memories now.

I miss them! So as a fan and a gamer myself, I'm trying to bring back what we loved about them, making something as fun while also keeping it fresh and interesting.

The game

You play as a dog, living in peace with his kind in Dog Village until a band of mercenaries break into their peaceful home and steal their sacred relic which has always protected them from harm. It's your duty as the player to track down the thieves and recover the stolen relic.

As a megaman inspired game, you face each mercenary individually and acquire their powers, which might be another mercenary's weakness or a way to access new locations that might reward you with extra abilities.

Unlike the classic Megaman, Dogventure will be open world and will feature upgradable abilities and shop items such as healing or temporary boosts.


(Pause menu's Inventory)

Why do you need the money?

As much as I'd love to, I don't have enough resources to invest in the project.
So far, the entire project has been done by myself alone (coding, art, music, sound effects, writing) and it's taken several months because I simply couldn't fully dedicate myself to it.

With your support, I'll be able to not only dedicate myself to it fully, but also hire talented people, distributing the workload, speeding up production and improving the overall quality of the game.

What languages will it be available in?

So far, English, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese translations are planned, but I might increase that number if I'm able to hire more people for the additional languages.

Can I suggest something?

Absolutely! I already have a complete idea of what the game is going to be, but suggestions are always welcome and our communication will help making the best out of it.

How else can I show my support?

Spread the word, share with your friends, on your social networks, wall street posters, help making the game happen.

Closing words

This is quite a big project, but more importantly, it's a passion for me and it's something I've been working very hard to make a reality.
I'll gladly work even harder if this project is funded.

Thanks for reading!

story:
mouse ver2 


If you use your computer for several hours in a day, just get your hands on the MOUSE ver 2  and you will never turn back to your old mouse. This will happen because you will be able to rest your hands without stopping your work.

A lot of people use mouse pad with gel for supporting their wrist .I used it too, but this isn't the solution .The correct / right solution is to alternate the way of holding the mouse

Using the Mouse ver 2, you will not use continuously only one muscle group of your hand. Instead, you may alternate the muscle groups of your hand you use. That way you can rest your hand without stopping your work. So you will not bring your hands to the limits of their injury.

eg 
If you need to walk a long way using only one leg then surely shoes with air soles will be helpful.But what really makes the difference is to use both legs alternately.











See the video below how it works




We have tested the work principle of mouse 2 in practice

We played with comfort starcraft 2 with the mouse 2.

We tried the mouse 2 and in strategy games. Everyone knows that strategy games have great demands from the Mouse.

The result was to play starcraft 2 enjoying the comfort of the couch. 

Surfing. 

Edit images.  

Check text in word. (when you write a text and want to check it out and fix, it is very convenient to use the alternative use of the mouse 2)

All the above convinced us that the mouse 2 will be surely the successor of the simple Mouse.


The mouse ver2 is not like the touchpad or the touch screen of mobile phones.


The power and immediacy of the mouse cannot be compared with any other device.

There are apps for smart phones with which they take control of the PC from your mobile. The virtual keyboard is convenient. Conversely if you use the mouse for mobile you will quickly understand how it doesn't compare with the real mouse.

The same applies to other devices that are substitutes mouse and handle them with your fingers. For example, the touch pad doesn't compare to the immediacy of the mouse. If you try to play a demanding game with mouse like strategy, then you immediately abandon the effort.

The mouse2 uses the power and accuracy that has the sensor.
The cat pad surface located on the bottom of the mouse 2 and makes the difference.

The mouse has an immediacy that does not have any other device. This is why it continues to be the number one device for controlling the computer.


What is the cat pad surface and what are its advantages.?

The catpad surface moves with ease and with great precision along the horizontal axis. It also rolls inside the smart mouse. Thereby, we have a huge surface which does not occupy any space. At the same time it can also move vertically.

 Finally, as these movements can be made simultaneously, it offers us the freedom to move directly to any desired position. That is, to be able to move diagonally with a single movement unlike TV remote controls in which the movement occurs by pressing buttons. After all, the normal mouse has for many years been the number one way of operating a PC because of its sheer simplicity and immediacy in the use.

The catpad is a real pad surface that you hold and move as you do with the classic mouse. It is not an immaterial surface across which you drag your fingers.

This is of huge importance and it makes all the difference. And, that is the main reason why the classic mouse has this unparalleled success over the years. Our brain recognizes the information of an object being held by the hand more directly and “aggressively”.

It can perceive this type of movement better than an invisible finger movement over a surface.





"smart and free kit"

The mouse 2 can combine it with a mini PC very small (like a DVD player) and silent operation specially for the Living room and bedroom.

We shall call "smart and free kit" this combination.



The idea to make the SMART and FREE kit started when I bought a

SMART TV .The disappointment was great because I realized that it was not

Smart.  I wanted my SMART TV to have the freedom and intelligence that gives my computer and not have mind young child. And the disappointment grew even more when searching the internet I realized that thousands of people have the same view as me.

Also the concept of SMART TV is more simplistic than a PC.

This can be ok for someone but not for me

I want to be able to run my favourite programs on TV. Also because my hobby is the photographs I would be able to make video editing on my TV when I'm in living room or play a game of strategy when I'm lying on my couch.

One solution is to connect my computer to the TV. But it is "ugly" and it is practically impossible to use the classic keyboard and mouse in the living room. If we want, we can put a mini computer ideal for living room but again the problem with the keyboard and mouse still there.

The idea that solves the above problem is the MOUSE ver 2 and the SMART and FREE kit.


Also as a chronic user of classic mouse (several hours a day) my wrists began to hurt. The alternative use of the Mouse 2 with the thumb and not with the wrist is a very pleasant change.


Highlights

What is the usefulness of this package?



<The idea to have the computer in the Living room is old. But the handling of the classic PC with mouse and keyboard is practically impossible in living room or bedroom.>


The mouse ver2 helps in resting your hand during the long hours on the computer without stopping your work or your fun.

The mouse 2 allows the comfortable combination of PC with the TV.

You can alter the TV to your super SMART TV  with this package. The new operation (due to MOUSE VER2) is the one that makes possible the use of computer in the living room .The MOUSE 2 is the one that fits with the living room. (Not the classic mouse and keyboard)

The user will hold the same keyboard on the road and on the couch.

The same keyboard which has become familiar.

The computer and TV have the same control.

All televisions will be converted in super smart TV with the  SMART and FREE kit.




Operating mouse ver2.

The mouse ver2 can be used in two ways. One is the known way of operating the mouse with the wrist. When the wrist is tired, the smart mouse can give the solution. Just turn it upside down and control the graphical user interface (GUI) of the computer with the thumb!. This leads into too many new features and innovations. Even in protection against some illnesses concerning the nerves of the hands caused by the use of computer.



(The picture shows how the user handles the MOUSE 2 with thumb simply moving it on a surface. (As in all other devices).  The user moves the finger on a mechanically supported surface  in  MOUSE 2  . This implies a very significant improvement in the functionality of the control pc with your thumb.)

The 1smart mouse is incredibly easy to use.

As soon as we get tired of using it as an ordinary mouse, we can simply flip it over and take control of our PC or TV using our finger.

This control is achieved by moving the catpad with our finger.

Our movements take immediate control of the cursor.

The catpad technology is located at the mouse base and operates with the thumb of the hand.




Adding in the base of MOUSE 2 a small virtual keyboard.

(For iPhone users will be issuing a qualified socket to put their iPhone.)


The mouse 2 is a “suit” for the i phone.

Once the i phone "puts it on", it can be converted into the ultimate controller of all the other home-use and office devices.

Τhe  i-phone can be put into the mouse2 with a simple move whenever the user wants. There is a dock on the smart mouse base where the user’s own smart phone can be placed.

This is connected to the computer via the control of a remote computer connected to another. This activates a virtual keyboard which is on the mouse base. So, in your hand lays a mouse and a keyboard for total control of the PC.

(we will combine the virtual keyboard  of  iPhone with the actual functionality of the mouse).





The MOUSE  VER2 will be built in two phases.

A)The  first version will have the main features of MOUSE ver2.

1)The mouse 2 for office " two legs"

This model is wired and has the main characteristics of the mouse 2. which will have the cat pad. It is addressed primarily for use in the office computer. With this model you can have all the benefits of alternative control computer. You can operate the mouse 2 and the classic mode and the smart. So instead of doing all the way with a "foot" you will be able to alternate with each other.

This will be the first version we are going to produce and you will get in your hands. The final design may be different from what has now been designed. However, the focus will be the same. To create an exclusive Mouse for living room and office.




B) Later after establishing a stable production line we will enrich mouse ver 2 with extra features (Remote, game pad, phone ,microphone)

1) The mouse 2 for iPhone

This model will be wireless and with the cat pad.It will have a slot to enable the user to introduce iPhone there. So you ll have in the same hand at the same time the mouse and the keyboard.

2) The mouse 2 for sstv (Super Smart TV)

This model has the catpad and a virtual keyboard. This model is wireless. It is ideal for use in the Living room , bedroom or office. It is proposed to be connected to a TV mini Pc refinement. The combination of the mouse 2 for sstv will significantly change the fun in living room.


Visit our site to see how we aim to eventually presend the MOUSE 2.

www.1smartmouse.com


We are passionate about the idea of mouse2. We believe that this will be the natural successor to the classic mouse.

The mouse 2 is a new invention that has been submitted to the industrial property organization.

We invest a lot of money and time in research, experimentation, the 3D design, engineers , lawyers and to the industrial property organization.

We have built several prototypes to test the idea. We have not built yet exactly what is shown in pictures.




Development time

    We need your help to develop mouse 2 and start mass production. Then mouse 2 will come the next generation mouse .You'll be the first to receive mouse 2  at a price significantly less than future retail price. We hope that you like the Mouse 2 and we are sure it will impress your friends, people you know and even your customers. It will also radically change the way you use your TV and your computer.

prototypes

Currently we don’t have the prototype that you see at this photos. Prototypes that we have done are to check the basic function of the MOUSE 2. Our task is to bring our model the closest to the technical ideal. We will do our best to achieve this. The individual elements of the Mouse 2 are technologies that exist.

Delivery time: We understand the seriousness of our work, that is why the terms include some extra time so we will meet the target date. You will be informed of the course of work and the date of delivery. 


Estimate development time
After the end of the crowd funding campaign                                              January 2015

Manufacture of individual pieces from the mouse 2                                        (2 months)
Assembling and testing                                                                                             (1 month)
Test prototypes with different materials and
maximum quality                                                                                                      (2 months)
Possible corrections and changes                                                                        (2 months)
manufacture of final product                                                                                 (2 months)
packaging and shipment                                                                              September 2015


Warranty period of the mouse2: 
1 year. In case of any problems, send your mouse 2  to us for repair or replacement. Note that we incur all shipping costs.

In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues after the campaign






1) 29$  send a mouse ver2 
A thanksgiving email. With every 2 perks that will have gathered we will send a mouse2 in a public university. Thus, students who use the pc many hours will be able to have a more comfortable and healthy use of their computer. We will also send it to the Foundation with a thank you sign with your name (if of course you want to be included). Furthermore you can specify a public institution, but in this case we need to collect at least 2 Perks.

2) 69 $  mouse ver2 for office "two legs" (official price 99 $ + vat. Profit $ 30) 
Improve the handling of your computer. Make the handling of your computer more comfortable and healthy. With the mouse 2 you can impress your friends colleagues and your customers! Why are you still handling  your computer in one way when you can have the freedom to change it?
This model is wired and has the main feature of the mouse 2. Τhat will have the cat pad. It is addressed primarily for use in the office. With this model you can have all the benefits of the alternative control of your computer. ( "So instead of doing all the way with one leg you will be able to use two legs".)
In prime discounted price 69 (just $ 14 more than the price that would be supplied to the OFFICIAL REPRESENTATIVE)
and a coupon (40% discount for any other model of Mouse ver2 you want - when it will be available).
So now you get two gifts.
1.  a great price in mouse 2 for your office and
2. later you can get a very large discount for the mouse 2 on TV or any other model of Mouse ver2 you want.  So you can radically change the use of the TV and your entertainment.

The shipping and taxes are not included,  you will be charged with the shipping.*



3) 130$     2 mice ver2 for office "two legs" (Profit $ 68$)
Take 2 mice ver2 for office "two legs"
Donate the other mouse ver2 in a loved one, or used at home or in your office.
Gift 2 coupons (40% discount for any other model of Mouse ver2 you want - when it will be available).
In prime discounted price  65$+65$ = 130$

The shipping and taxes are not included. and you will be charged with the shipping.*



4) 472$  8 mice ver2 for office "two legs" (Profit $ 320$)
Take 8 mice ver2 for office "two legs"  
This package is ideal for small businesses, Internet cafes, students etc.
Gift, 8 coupons (40% discount for any other model of Mouse ver2 you want - when it will be available).
In prime discounted price  8*59$ = 472$ (Profit $ 320$)
Also will immediately send you a poster presenting the Mouse ver2 and says that will soon have it on your place.
The shipping and taxes are not included. and you will be charged with the shipping.*


5) 1925$    Take 35 mice ver2 for office "two legs" (at 55 $ / piece  )
With this package you can be the EXCLUSIVE representative in your area (for areas up to 50 000 inhabitants). You will have very big discount and great profit.
Exclusivity is does not concern the internet. Also there will be a large multinational company with chain of stores that will have as well. It might have a branch in your area. However, the selling price of the mouse ver2 will be common for all.
Other words in your own area will be you who will have the mouse ver2 and maybe the branch of that company.

In prime discounted price 1925$  (Profit 1540$ )
We will also send you promotional posters presenting the Mouse ver2 for your shop.

Attention!
With two perks you will be offered exclusive rights to an area of four (4) times greater. Other words for 200. 000 inhabitants and you get profit 3850 $.


The shipping and taxes are not included. and you will be charged with the shipping.
If you want you can select the shipping company.
(If the desired area has been occupied by someone else you will be refunded.)



6) 4450$  Become an official sponsor
With this perk you can put your company logo for one year on all Mouse ver 2 which will released.
This will not apply to the number of mouse ver 2 on this campaign, but as there is mass production (2016)


* We attempt to have a representative in each country by the time we will  ship the mouse 2 for you. If there is a representative you will not get any charge for transportation. Otherwise you will get an extra charge of 9$.




                                   http://www.1smartmouse.com


through the contact form of our official site
http://www.1smartmouse.com/#!contact-us/c21nl

or via email
thesmartmouse@yahoo.com




GEORGE CHATZIAVGOUSTIDIS
He graduated from the National Technical University of Athens (Polytechnic). He is Master in surveying engineer and also an electrician who is licensed to 100Kwat. He has extensive experience in construction. (10 years) .He is the inventor of the mouse 2. The founder and he is the main responsible of this campaign.



VICKY MAKATSORI
She has graduated from the AST College and she is flight attendant. Vicky is a key partner and inspirer of Mouse 2. She is responsible for public relations and communication with customers.



HELEN CHATZIAVGOUSTIDOU
She has graduated from the Aristotle university of Thessalonica and has proficiency in English. Helen has a special talent in organizing and is a very important partner. She is responsible as regards the accounting and legal issues.



Please help us to improve the handling of the pc - TV and
create the next generation mouse ver 2
Thank you

story:
Hey guys, it's "Fattie" from the Unity lists.

It's Tuesday 23rd July - you can now buy a Leap Motion controller.  They're only about 90 bucks, even with shipping, so buy one immediately.

I've already got clients piled up who want demos and what-not of games using the Leap, and I'm sure you do too.

It's time for Leap, in the Unity Editor, for us developers.

Let's do it straight away.

You get the idea - you'll be able to turn objects in the editor and move them in 3D, by moving yout hand.

I know exactly what is needed here from fooling with it so much. And from spending 50 hours a week in the Unity editor fr a few years, phew! We need to be able to move objects around precisely - almost certainly with various lock-offs and step-offs.

There need to be a couple of general modes that you can use immediately, by sliding your hand over your keyboard, to affect the whole scene - rotating your view and so on.

The software needs to have a modicum of intelligence to understand the general scale of your scene and what you're after when you move your hand.

It's gonna be fantastic, so it's time for crowdfunding. Yeah! If, and only if, enough people are interested, let's do it. If nobody is interested, them the only thing wasted is me typing this much text. (And I seem to do that every day on the answers site, anyway - so no problem!)

Here's a quick demo of using the Leap if you don't have one yet...

That's Brad Larson's well-known "molecules" program with a Leap interface.

(Actually, I think most of the game demos as such available so far for the Leap pretty much suck - I think that demo is the best one. If you know of a decent game on Leap, let me know straight away, thanks.)

(By the way, I think the use of the Leap there is good, but could be even better. The damping and locking needs to be really thought out, particularly for our needs as Unity developers, which is exactly what I'm gonna do for LeapForUnity. As you know I am obsessed with input precision, and this is an unexplored field.)

(Here's a random one of my many, many zillion word rants on the philosophy of input in Unity and games generally... http://answers.unity3d.com/questions/292333/how-to-calculate-swipe-speed-on-ios.html don't get bored!)

Leap For Unity Producer Credits:

1. Simon Alkemade, Programmer

The fact is, us Unity devs need a Leap interface straight away. Hey - that's worth a chapter heading...

All of us Unity3D devs need a Leap interface...

let's do it straight away.

If 90 of you dudes sign up here, that's enough interest to do it.

If nobody signs up, forget it - that's the beauty of crowd-funding.

(Hey check it out - I can finally use as much CAPS and BOLD as I want with nobody complaining! :) )

By the way. I'm sick of these pansy-ass crowdfunding campaigns which appear these days with a lot of marketing crap and promotional fluff.

Everyone reading this is a top-of-the-line developer, you already know everything there is to know about marketing software.

You're totally capable of deciding if you want this to work with, without me playing you a jingle or having a stupid expensive logo made.

I reckon this should be called rawfunding ... when someone makes a no-nonsense crowdfunding campaign!

(1) it has to be the traditional "you only get the money if you reach your goal" type of campaign.

(2) you cannot have fancy production values for the campaign. you cannot pay for logos, mockups, design, illustrators and so on.

(3) youmust spend no more than three or four hours writing out the campaign. It's taken me about three hours to make this page on IGG (mostly because it took me 2.9 hours to figure out how the hell to move a video from my iPad to the page - and it still doesn't work right, but never mind).

So for me those are the rules of rawfunding!

Ultimate closing sentence!

Have you noticed these sort of articles always end with a "call to action"?

That's because the world needs action! If there aren't at least 90 people who want this, it's not worth bothering with and it won't happen. If you don't have a Leap yet, click over to Leap to get one now - it's less than $100, and everyone needs one in our field. And then, yes, click up there and please choose a $50 "perk" - this is rawfunding! Unless 90 people sign up, it won't happen!  Cheers!!

story:
Sleeves!

Card sleeves are still being sold in packs of 50 but we're playing games with more cards than ever. Let's change the way premium sleeves are sold by showing everyone that high quality sleeves can be shipped and delivered at a much more reasonable price!

Because the minimum quantity from the manufacturer is huge, we'll need to pool together to purchase a big order. To keep shipping costs down, we'll ship sleeves as densely as possible in the cheapest packaging possible. So get your friends to pool together to back the best perk for you and yours. Together, we'll protect our cards and our wallets.

  • 100 micron premium sleeves
  • transparent both sides
  • standard card game (63.5 x 88mm) and euro card size (59 x 92mm)

What if we pass our goal?

If we pass our funding goal we'll be able to purchase a buffer of card sleeves. We'll add a percentage of extra sleeves to every order to make them even cheaper and offset the occasional fluke sleeve.

If we pass our funding goal by a lot, we'll be able to customize orders to have a more specific mix of the two sleeve sizes. At the end of the project I will send out a survey and people can request a mix of sleeves more customized than they perk they selected. As the number of supporters increases (and therefore the level of funding) we'll be able to afford a big enough buffer that we can be more liberal with mixing sleeve sizes.

What's with the shipping quantities?

Each quantity is the largest we can deliver in the cheapest mode of delivery possible. In that way, the shipping cost per sleeve is as low as possible. All shipments will be going through USPS flat rate boxes. The 750 quantity is in the small box, the 2500 and 5000 are in the medium, and the 7500 is in the large flat rate box.

Can you tell me more about shipping?

We've made shipping as cheap as possible because it is a huge cost per sleeve. The table below summarizes the estimated costs.

The top, green lines are the actual projected cost of shipping to each destination. The red lines are how much extra it costs to ship to non-USA destinations. The blue lines are the premium we are asking from Canada and other International destinations. The purple lines are what is left of those premiums after Indiegogo, paypal, etc fees. The orange lines are the result of the purple lines less the red lines. In other words, the orange lines show how much we are subsidizing delivery to non-USA destinations (about fifty cents give or take). 

We're sorry it costs so much to ship internationally, but we cannot afford to subsidize deliveries more than we already are. Hopefully everyone understands. 

Why do you not recommend the 750 sleeve internationally?

If you want the 750 quantity internationally, go for it. We're happy to oblige, but it really isn't that great a deal since shipping costs so much. You're much better off finding a group of friends to go in on a higher quantity so you can split the shipping. 

Second, international shipments in small flat rate boxes do not allow package tracking. A lot of countries have unreliable postal services. If you decide to back a reward level that ships in a small flat rate box internationally, you'll be accepting the risk of non-delivery. For both of these reasons, we recommend quantities that ship in medium or large flat rate packages for international supporters.

What if I want even more?

You can add an additional order of any perk level to any perk level. That's a mouthful, so let's parse that out. No matter what perk you select, you can add another perk level by increasing your pledge amount by that perk amount. So if you are already an Addicted Standard Gamer in the USA ($185) and you want to also be an Addicted Euro Gamer in the USA ($185), you can pledge $370 and get both. You'll specify what you want in your additional order in the final survey. Unfortunately, we cannot offer shipping discounts for larger orders because we already have shipping as cheap as it can possibly get.

story:
Short Summary

We've all played it. We all feel that Phantom Pain. One way to alleviate it is to mod Hayter's glorious voice into the game. Current funding limit is is small, but let's do this. Let's raise some cash, waive in front of Hayter and make this happen. The guy is passionate about Metal Gear, I'm sure he'll be on board.

story:
Location: Paddock Halls 5 & 6, Sakhir, Kingdom of Bahrain
Date: 2014, December 26 & 27
Time: 10:00 AM to 1:00 AM
So here it comes, the next SaikoroWars, we will keep the same name and change everything about it.  Our previous SaikoroWars was an event for (Cosplay, anime,video games, board games and comics)



Every year we collaborate and organize an event, we always go ahead with what suits your needs and mostly you have a blast; this year however, we will do something different, now not only you can choose or suggest idea, you can actually contribute and force us to do it. NINXA & SandSeerS have been collaborating together to bring the best quality and enjoyment compacted within all their events since 2012.



The perks not only awards you tickets and freebies, we also make you decide which merchant and/or activity to include in the convention; we also plan to have guests included within the perks, pay for them and meet them!

Ticket perks
We have few kind of ticket it goes as following:

Shops & Offers
We are making deals with well-known shops, we will bring them for free if you fund them, some shops refuse to participate in events because it cost 30-50 BHD per table, and it cost us passes, renting tables, chairs, and advertising for them; so what we are offering them is to participate for free, but give away up to 25% discount for the people who help them attend, you can suggest any shop by mail to share@sandseers.com with contact number to make it easier. If we could fund them all, they will be here.

For example: GCC Otaku is willing to attend if his fans fund his table and in return he will give 20% off exclusive to the claimers.

Your idea to reality
During our previous events we always had our fans on Facebook and other social media websites suggest or rant about something saying “why don't you guys bring this DJ”, “create a trivia based on...” or “make a tournament in...”

Now you can just tell us by email: share@sandseers.com and we will add a perk for it, with the cost needed and number of claims, when its full funded we will make it happen!

Our first idea is Live Action Role Play or LARP for short; we may sell or rent the props (Helmet, Sword, Shield), for more information about LARP watch the video below:


One of the popular LARP events:

Meet your guest

  • Special ticket, pay for any Perk with a guest and you gain VIP 2 days + meet with the guest 1 on 1 for 10 minutes.
  • Suggest a guest via social@ninxa.com
  • Advertise for the guest you want, so we can bring him over.
  • We have to contact the guest and convince him to come over, and it will cost us a lot but it will be worth it.

Other Ways You Can Help
We accept all kinds of support to make this happen, finance isn’t the only thing we need, in fact volunteering might be bigger help than money in this phase, share the news and spread it out will help us reach our goal faster.


Are we joking?  Hmm I wouldn't believe it if I saw it in any other post, but well you know, its from your money so why not.

Ticket cost roughly 550 BHD, for 10 days, and 540 BHD for accommodation, 150 BHD pocket money per day for 10 days (1500 BHD). So that is 2600 BHD.

If we raise enough for it, we will award this to one of the lucky attendants at the event, in return the winner will promote us via pictures and videos containing our brands.

The trip will be after a month from the event, we might have to convert the funds, if it didn't reach the event amount, but that is highly unlikely.



The local currency is Bahraini Dinars (BHD); that is 1 BHD: 3.75 USD. 

After IndieGoGo and credit card fees the $18,000.00 will turn to approximately $16,415.00, which after exchange and transaction fees to something around 6,180.000 Bahraini Dinars.


This amount is going to be used purely to fund the convention as followed in details.

Venue:

Venue/ product

Quantity

Unit Value (BHD)

Total (BHD)

Paddock Lounges

4 Halls

600.000

2,400.000

Vehicle Attendants

12 BIC Staff

80.000

960.000

Wireless Internet

4 Lines

20.000

80.000

Wristbands

2000 Pcs.

0.100

200.000

Domestics

64 Hrs

5.000

320.000

Electrician & Assistant 

20 hrs

8.000

160.000

Sub Total 

4,120.000

Equipment:

Items/ Product

Description

Total (BHD)

Stage

1m x 6m x 4m

500.000

Speakers

8 units with mixer

350.000

Lighting

Moving heads and spotlights

350.000

DJ

2 days

150.000

Sub Total 

1,350.000

Staff:
20.000 BHD Employee/Day 20 Employees x 40.000 BHD = 800.000 BHD We will be short, to cover up we will personally invest a portion of the amount,

We are having all or nothing campaign so if we didn't reach, we won’t be able to do it. 

Reason is our experience with events, we were badly financed by less than non-existing sponsors and we had to pay from our personal accounts and this time we can’t afford doing that.

Location: Paddock Halls 5 & 6, Sakhir, Kingdom of BahrainDate: 2014, December 26 & 27Time: 10:00 AM to 1:00 AM

So here it comes, the next SaikoroWars, we will keep the same name and change everything about it.  Our previous SaikoroWars was an event for (Cosplay, anime,video games, board games and comics)



Every year we collaborate and organize an event, we always go ahead with what suits your needs and mostly you have a blast; this year however, we will do something different, now not only you can choose or suggest idea, you can actually contribute and force us to do it.



NINXA & SandSeerS have been collaborating together to bring the best quality and enjoyment compacted within all their events since 2012.The perks not only awards you tickets and freebies, we also make you decide which merchant and/or activity to include in the convention; we also plan to have guests included within the perks, pay for them and meet them!Ticket perksWe have few kind of ticket it goes as following:Shops & OffersWe are making deals with well-known shops, we will bring them for free if you fund them, some shops refuse to participate in events because it cost 30-50 BHD per table, and it cost us passes, renting tables, chairs, and advertising for them; so what we are offering them is to participate for free, but give away up to 25% discount for the people who help them attend, you can suggest any shop by mail to share@sandseers.com with contact number to make it easier. If we could fund them all, they will be here.For example: GCC Otaku is willing to attend if his fans fund his table and in return he will give 20% off exclusive to the claimers.Your idea to realityDuring our previous events we always had our fans on Facebook and other social media websites suggest or rant about something saying “why don't you guys bring this DJ”, “create a trivia based on...” or “make a tournament in...”Now you can just tell us by email: share@sandseers.com and we will add a perk for it, with the cost needed and number of claims, when its full funded we will make it happen!Our first idea is Live Action Role Play or LARP for short; we may sell or rent the props (Helmet, Sword, Shield), for more information about LARP watch the video below:One of the popular LARP events:Meet your guest

Special ticket, pay for any Perk with a guest and you gain VIP 2 days + meet with the guest 1 on 1 for 10 minutes.


Suggest a guest via social@ninxa.com


Advertise for the guest you want, so we can bring him over.


We have to contact the guest and convince him to come over, and it will cost us a lot but it will be worth it.

Other Ways You Can HelpWe accept all kinds of support to make this happen, finance isn’t the only thing we need, in fact volunteering might be bigger help than money in this phase, share the news and spread it out will help us reach our goal faster.Are we joking?  Hmm I wouldn't believe it if I saw it in any other post, but well you know, its from your money so why not.Ticket cost roughly 550 BHD, for 10 days, and 540 BHD for accommodation, 150 BHD pocket money per day for 10 days (1500 BHD). So that is 2600 BHD.If we raise enough for it, we will award this to one of the lucky attendants at the event, in return the winner will promote us via pictures and videos containing our brands.The trip will be after a month from the event, we might have to convert the funds, if it didn't reach the event amount, but that is highly unlikely.The local currency is Bahraini Dinars (BHD); that is 1 BHD: 3.75 USD. After IndieGoGo and credit card fees the $18,000.00 will turn to approximately $16,415.00, which after exchange and transaction fees to something around 6,180.000 Bahraini Dinars.This amount is going to be used purely to fund the convention as followed in details.Venue:

20 Employees x 40.000 BHD = 800.000 BHD

We will be short, to cover up we will personally invest a portion of the amount,We are having all or nothing campaign so if we didn't reach, we won’t be able to do it. Reason is our experience with events, we were badly financed by less than non-existing sponsors and we had to pay from our personal accounts and this time we can’t afford doing that.Cover image credits: @fujoshisama22, @cyber_gregar

story:
世界樹: Yggdrasil Windows v 1.0/ Mac v1.0/ Linux  v 1.0/ Android v 1.0



Sekaiju: Yggdrasil as the name implies is a visual novel about the world tree Yggdrasil that is on the verge of death and due to that, throughout all of the nine worlds, huge earthquakes begin to manifest.

  The story takes off where our protagonist gets badly wounded and dies after he saves his childhood friend from a car losing control. He wakes up in Alfheim where he is told that he was resurrected with a fixed time limit to be interrogated.


 ✓Full Voice Acting
✓Original Soundtrack
✓High Quality Artwork
✓Full HD 1080p
✓Interactive storyline with multiple endings
✓Music Gallery
✓CG Gallery
✓Scene Gallery (aka scene replay gallery)
✓Some ecchi of course because why not? :P

After reading all this you are probably thinking,hmm, this looks nice and interesting. The art looks good, the music sounds good but who are these people with their pretentious name?

Well for a long period of time we were nameless. We were just a group of people that liked anime, manga, visual novels and almost any kind of mythology. You can say we started making this game out of our passion for the things we love and a few sleepless nights.

The name Prose Edda came from the norse mythology and is the very first poem in which Yggdrasil, Odin, Thor and Loki are mentioned. Also prose can also be taken literally meaning telling a story which is actually very fitting for us since we are telling you our story.

Main Staff:

Prose Edda

Artists:

Character Design: Rebeca Akeil and pinguin-kotak
Backgrounds: Uncle Mugen and Aswaforce.
CG: Artemisumi
Logo: LucaMadison
GUI: Aleema

Writers:

Writer: MoonStar
Voice Actors Scripter: Marisa Lenti and MoonStar.

Music:

Composer: Florenz Dominic Sison (composer for Exogenesis also) and N.H.C

Voice Cast:

Yamakazi Kusanagi: Matthew Curtis ( En-Vision America; The Adventures of Lord Dinby, Duke of Space!; Conquest of Champions; LEGO Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix.)
Kogara Sachi: Helen Ni
Alvaerele Ikeshia: Marisa Lenti (Hasbro/Playdate Digital: My Little Pony: Twilight's Kingdom App: Princess Celestia & Cadance; ScrewAttack: DEATH BATTLE!: Noin; MirageV: Sacred Earth: Promise: Relima; A Wolf's Tale: Lina; The Mouth: Dragon)
Elisven: Adoxographist

On standby for full release :  Brittany Bree Lauda (Holyknight: Cammot; Queens Blade: Rebelion (TV): Mirim; HuniePop: Audrey; Portal: Companionship- Chell)

Voice Editing and Leveling:

Cylight Studios and Prose Edda

5£ - Our everlasting thanks and appreciation.

10£ - You will receive a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil.

15£ - You will receive a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

20£ - You will receive a physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil.

25£ - You will receive a physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

40£ - You will receive digital art book with all the art in the game signed by each one of our artists + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

50£ – You will receive an exclusive kickstarter only set of digital wallpapers + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

80£ - You will receive a physical art book with all the art in the game signed by each one of our artists + a physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

100£ - You will receive a limited edition Kickstarter exclusive set of wall scroll + a physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + physical copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

300£ - You will receive first hand news about the alpha stage and will see first-hand the changes and updates that will happen and access to the beta tests. Also you can contribute with your ideas and suggestions. + receive a exclusive kickstarter only set of digital wallpapers + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil + a digital copy of 世界樹: Yggdrasil OST.

500£ - You will receive a limited edition Kickstarter only edition of Making of 世界樹: Yggdrasil Pack. Containing a full documentary about the making of 世界樹: Yggdrasil, the making of the art including speed paint, gags from recording etc. Audio cd with brainstorming ideas for the story. And last but not least a copy of the script signed by the producer, writer and scripter.

1000£ - Your name or nick name will be displayed on a monument rock in game and will not only be part of the story but also mentioned as an important factor in the story.

Plays and comments

"I have seen, heard and played quite a few visual novels in my life. But i have to say that Prose Edda´s and Moonstar´s “Sekaiju Yggdrasil” tops most of them.

Just the voice acting (there´s some really talented voice actors in the game!) and humor alone makes Sekaiju Yggdrasil worth a try (the game has awesome graphics as well)."  Robin “V-Act” Ek The Gaming Ground
